story:
Short Summary

Launched in 2016, ForeverMogul.com is a progressive online publication with a distinct editorial focus on everything business mogul.

At ForeverMogul.com we concentrate on four categories that are at the core of being a mogul. These categories are: 

Mogul Business

Moguls possess innovative ideas. They have a willingness to take risks and the keen business sense it takes to make their ideas possible and their risks profitable.

Power & Money

Moguls commonly exercise a great deal of influence in the political, economic and social spheres, often providing large sums of money to political candidates and new business ventures.

Fine Living

Moguls take risks. So when their risks are profitable, they enjoy the rewards of fine living and luxury lifestyle. Moguls enjoy the best and most luxurious of cars and private jets, luxury hotels and penthouse suits when they travel, the exclusive resorts, private islands, and luxurious spas. The very wealthy of moguls, the 1% of the 1%, get to enjoy luxury travel on their mega and superyachts. Of course, we cannot forget, the stunning luxury properties and homes around the world that moguls enjoy. Our hope of focusing on fine living and the luxury lifestyle is to inspire and motivate entrepreneurs to reach their full potential and be successful in their business so they can enjoy the rewards of their risk.

Philanthropy

Moguls believe in giving back, providing their time and large sums of money to charitable causes. While moguls benefit from the fruits of their labor, everything is not about luxury alone. They are equally passionate about giving back, making a difference in their community and around the world.  Here at ForeverMogul.com, we believe in ‘To whom much is given, much is required.’ This is why we focus on Philanthropy.

Our Readers

We are very passionate in our mission to share engaging content designed to empower, educate and inspire. Championing entrepreneurship, fine living and life’s pleasures, wealth, philanthropy and social conscience, with a truly global outlook.

Our readers are global. They are ambitious, fearless, passionate, and dedicated to building their empire with a mindset of success, fine living, and giving back.

Our readers are successful entrepreneurs, aspiring entrepreneurs, those who enjoy the finer things in life, and most importantly those who believe strongly in philanthropy and giving back. These are the people who have written to us, inspiring us to provide more content, encouraging us to keep going.

Here are a few of the comments sent to us from our readers:

  • Just dropping by to say keep up the good work, you are such an inspiration to so many people.
  • Your website is fire.
  • Such an inspiration.
  • I can’t get enough of your content.
  • Thank you for everything you do.

This is what we do! This is who we are! We are ForeverMogul!

What We Need

We need your help to build upon the great first year we had: In this initial round of funding we are seeking to raise $7000, hopefully, more, so we can continue to share engaging content to empower, educate and inspire. The ForeverMogul.com online magazine is a small team who all volunteer their time to provide great content to help others. 

We have five spaces available at the $3000 pledge. If all five spaces available are filled, we will exceed our goal of raising $7000. What does this mean for us? It means a great deal. We can invest that money to start what we want to do next.

What do we want to do next?

We are looking to expand our brand and magazine reach with other products/services. We hope in 2018 we'll be able to introduce a quarterly digital magazine to give our readers more access to our content from any device. 

We also aim to add new website features that will allow our readers to save and share content on their account. New features will include a collaboration section on our website so entrepreneurs can exchange ideas, post inspiring and motivational messages, and get help to grow into successful moguls. 

Our mission is to educate, empower, and inspire, and with a new content marketing strategy, we will be able to do just that. Content marketing is essential to our mission. This will allow us to reach more readers on whatever device they use.

We hope you feel inspired and empowered to give so we can continue to give back.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pledge money towards our goal you can still contribute in other ways:

  • Spread the word about ForeverMogul.com.
  • Visit our website forevermogul.com and share our articles on your social media.
  • Follow us on all of our social media. Visit our website for links to all of our social media.
  • Visit our website and subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest from ForeverMogul.com

We appreciate anything you can do that would help us to continue to inspire those who visit our website.

For more information, please visit our website and ForeverMogul.com or send us a Direct Message on our Facebook page, Twitter, or Instagram. Also, you can send an email to info@forevermogul.com

Thank you in advance for pledging to our movement.

story:
The Life She Designed planners were created to fill a void for women like me who lacked inspiration and found it difficult to relate to current planners on the market. Women of color share a set of unique experiences and to showcase those experiences in a positive way is the goal. Women of color are strong, resilient, creative, and loving. We are fighters but, we also have struggles. This planner is meant to encourage every woman of color to fight beyond the moments of pain, heartache, and insecurities. This planner is a way to encourage you to believe in yourself and the dreams that you have. 

 

Motivational

The Life She Designed Planners are the first big production items released by Hope In Her, Inc. I took a chance on myself after years of self-doubt and worry of judgment because I wanted to share with the world how special and connected we are.

 

To grow past dark places, we have to learn that we cannot do it alone. We need each other - not only for emotional support but to remind ourselves of the potential we possess, even when we cannot always see it within ourselves. This is what it means to have HOPE in her.

 

Features

  • Each planner comes packaged in a matching gift box.
  • Over 160 pages, with gold wire binding.
  • 12 Month Planner: May 2017 - April 2018 (no need to fight New Year’s crowds for a new planner PLUS it will make a great Mother’s Day gift!)
  • Weekly & Monthly Layouts
  • Extra Note pages to store your ideas
  • Full color inside pages with high quality 200 GSM paper with no bleed through!
  • Pockets inside the front cover to keep stray papers and an elastic band to keep it together!

 

   

 

Hope In Her Signature Tee

This unisex tee is extra soft and non-restricting. This may be a unisex tee but, it isn't boxy yet rather form fitting. 

The signature tee is made with 100% ring-spun lightweight cotton. Pre-shrunk. Removable tag

Sizes Available: S, M, L, XL

***IMPORTANT NOTE***

When ordering a perk that includes an HIH tee, please email me at letstalk@hopeinher.com with your size. Thank you!

 

 

Born in Memphis, TN, I had to learn early on what it would mean to overcome trauma and hardship. From the story of my birth until the present day, I have had traumatic experiences that resulted in my own personal struggles in nearly every aspect of my life- relational, mentally, academically and so on. During those moments, I could make absolutely no sense of them but, I have come to understand that everything I have faced and endured has built me to be the person I am today.

story:
Comprendre comment les gens voient la nature, comment l'environnement agit sur eux et comment eux agissent sur l'environnement. Pour de nombreuses communautés, cela veut dire étudier leurs chansons et leurs contes populaires, car cela a été pendant des siècles leur mode d'expression principal et que c'est bien souvent la seule trace qu'ils ont laissée.

Des débuts prometteurs

Ce sujet inédit et les premiers résultats obtenus m'ont permis d’être conviée à une conférence internationale à Valence en Espagne en mars 2017, qui s'est très bien passée, et à la conférence de la prestigieuse Société européenne d’histoire environnementale qui aura lieu à Zagreb et où je présenterai mes recherches fin juin 2017.

Mais si mon sujet et mes travaux plaisent, je n’en suis pas encore au stade où l’on me paie le séjour, et entre les billets d’avion, le logement et l’inscription, ces deux conférences m’auront coûté plus de 1600 euros.

Par ailleurs cette recherche nécessite d’aller explorer des archives et d'interviewer des gens sur le terrain, et je m’envolerai très bientôt vers le Mississippi pour une première étude de terrain de 3 semaines que je suis impatiente de démarrer, mais qui elle aussi va me coûter très cher (plus de 3500 euros), à un moment où, pour mettre toutes les chances de mon côté, j’ai décidé de me mettre à temps partiel pour les 2, voire 3 années qui viennent. En effet, il est quasi impossible de mener une thèse de qualité tout en travaillant à temps plein (ce que je fais depuis 1 an et demi).

Avec déjà plus de 5000 euros dépensés en 4 mois, et dans une période de restrictions budgétaires où il devient très difficile d’obtenir des financements, j’avoue être un peu inquiète, d'autant qu'il faudra que je retourne sur le terrain plus longuement l'an prochain.

Mais comment vais-je faire ??

Alors j’ai repensé à toutes les fois où j’ai reçu des invitations à financer des projets via le financement participatif, j’ai repensé à toutes les associations, les lieux culturels, les disques, et les films que j’ai soutenus par ce biais au fil des années, et à la joie et à la fierté que j’ai ressenties à l’idée d’aider une cause qui me semblait juste, des créations qui me semblaient prometteuses ou des gens que j’aimais tout simplement.

C’est pourquoi je m’adresse à vous aujourd’hui en espérant que vous aurez envie de m’aider et ainsi de participer à cette belle aventure. Rien ne vous oblige à mettre beaucoup, ce sont les petits ruisseaux qui font les grandes rivières, qui font le Mississippi !

Mais si vous avez l'envie et la possibilité de donner une grosse somme, ne vous gênez surtout pas. Si vous connaissez quelqu'un qui pourrait avoir envie de participer à ce financement, n'hésitez pas à lui en parler. J’ai décidé de mettre la barre à 2800 euros, et ce sera merveilleux si cette barre est atteinte. Mais comme vous l'avez constaté, le coût de ce projet est, et sera, beaucoup plus élevé. Si ce projet vous plaît, n’hésitez donc pas à dépasser allègrement cet objectif même s'il est atteint ! (d'autant que le site prend une commission).

La collecte servira à financer les nombreux déplacements nécessaires à cette recherche, et notamment mon voyage dans le Mississippi.  Dites-vous que chaque euro sera un pas dans le bayou de Louisiane, et un pas vers l'aboutissement d'un magnifique projet. Et que le jour où je soutiendrai cette thèse, ce sera en partie grâce à vous. Et que si un jour j'ai un poste de Maître de Conférence à l'université, et que je peux y enseigner l'histoire, et les liens entre cultures et environnement, ce sera aussi grâce à vous, et on aura accompli ça ensemble.

Je vous remercie infiniment

Stéphanie Denève

story:
Update March 15, 2017

I started Cluster of Billionaires as a book about self made billionaires whom I knew personally or whose many hours long interviews I watched on the web with the old headhunter’s scrutiny. I’ve spotted some common features in them and decided to season them with a gravy from neuroscience, psychology and biology to add more taste and flavour.

Every book, however, starts to dictate its own terms after you write maybe 50 pages or little more. First, a comparison between human and ant behavior grew from a metaphor into an important line of thought. Then, Bayesian probability and Markov process popped up out of nowhere.

The tipping point took place at the third day after I’d launched a crowdfunding campaign for the book and began to record interesting thoughts about the book on video. When I spoke about epigenetic transformation in ants it suddenly struck me that changes which I observed in billionaires may also be epigenetic by origin.

Epigenetic changes take place with many species in nature when some genes already present in their DNA get turned on or off by either social or environmental factors, or a combination of both.  In the case of ants such changes  are very deep internally - they totally change their physiology - but have no visible  signs at the outside. They are achieved by ants taking part in ritualized fightings in which they fight long and hard but without hurting their opponents. As a result they make their dopamine level to rise 3-4 fold with that effect lasting for hours. So they achieve powerful and long lasting enough effect to trigger and complete an epigenetic mutation.

Let’s have a closer look at many self made billionaires. With all their passion, lust for action, readiness to take risks, resilience to failures they expose themselves to factors which have rather strong effect each taken separately but produce a totally overwhelming impact if they are combined and last for years. Can we imagine that some epigenetic mutations may well take place altering the physiology of their brains? My answer is: “Yes.”

The process of transformation had to start long before they actually became billionaires. If we know what we are looking for, we will be able to spot future billionaires and maybe even to nurture them.

 

The wild idea came to my mind less than a week ago. Now I know that epigenetics is a hot topic in neuroscience because the human brain undergoes more epigenetic transformations than any organ of any other species. Now I want in this book to explore the factors which trigger and support the 'billionaire mutation' and to observe the implications of such a mutation as well.

The word mutation is a bit provocative, of course, especially given the fact that it is reversible because genes can be switched on and off, but I use it to emphasise the power and depth of this invisible but radical change.

As the crowdfunding campaign already inspired such a breakthrough I wish to make another try with it. The deadline is soon but it can be postponed if we see traction. Actually it is rather a presale of my book than a funding exercise. Fancy hardcover paper books will be only available through this campaign. They will enlighten your mind and entertain your senses. Come on! Order your copy now!

*** Original Pitch ***

I am a former diplomat, a former executive search consultant and a serial tech entrepreneur. On my way I was lucky to meet a lot of outstanding people. I learned a lot from them. They keep inspiring me. Now I am writing a book about them to share my knowledge and inspiration.

I've started from the ways how they use their brains and their time. My initial research was based on my personal experience of working with some of them and on video interviews of many billionaires freely available on the web. My findings inspired me and challenged my curiosity.

Step by step I found myself reading scientific papers about brain coupling, second order neural networks, Bayesian probabilities, Markov process, deliberate practice, metacognition, cognitive biases, inverse reinforcement learning and more. The future doesn't depend on the past if the present is defined, - that's a simple definition of Markov process. That's exactly the principle which people whom I researched are following. They don't rely on probabilities calculus based on past outcomes under the same conditions. They move ahead by iterations and instantly use the information obtained on the go to predict what will happen next. 

Did you know about winner-winner fights of ants which without genetic changes produce an entirely new breed of worker-queens? These ants transform physically after winning together. Their life span, for instance, grows tenfold. Their transformation can be, however, stopped by their fellow ants if there are no other transforming worker-queens around. It's not only about ants. It's about a special type of outliers among people as well. It's about the cluster of billionaires.

I thought if I should name this book Investors of Time or Masters of Probabilities because all members of the cluster of billionaires whom I researched did not necessarily own billions. Probably I will not change the name because each of them is worth billions and can produce billions even though we - the consumers rarely understand it.

I believe that I am writing a valuable book that will inspire a lot of people and help them learn how to achieve more personally and to contribute more for the wellbeing of our society. I wish as many people as possible to read it. I invite you to support my campaign and to be the first to read this book. Maybe, you are one of them? The probability is much higher than you think. I want to make some money on my writings but even more importantly I wish people enjoy and learn while they are reading it. In December 2016 I published an article in Russian about the concept presented in my book. In two months almost 50 000 people have read it and over 2 000 shared it on Facebook. This way I learned that this book should be written, published and distributed.

I believe that our world is transforming into a very uncertain and constantly changing place. The capabilities of billionaires described in my book will help us all to survive in the new environment. There are thousands, maybe, even millions of people out there right now who have these capabilities but they yet don't know who they are and whom they may be. If they are surrounded only by people who don't understand them, they may lose their unique capabilities or they may be developing much slower than they can. Think, you are not just helping me - you are helping them. There are no losers in the evolution of the cluster of billionaires. There are only winners. You will see why when you will read my book.

At least half of your funding will go to the production and mailing of perks. The rest will be spent on finishing of the text, editing, publishing, promotion and marketing of the book.

I am a former diplomat, a former executive search consultant and a serial tech entrepreneur. On my way I was lucky to meet a lot of outstanding people. I learned a lot from them. They keep inspiring me. Now I am writing a book about them to share my knowledge and inspiration.
I've started from the ways how they use their brains and their time. My initial research was based on my personal experience of working with some of them and on video interviews of many billionaires freely available on the web. My findings inspired me and challenged my curiosity.
Step by step I found myself reading scientific papers about brain coupling, second order neural networks, Bayesian probabilities, Markov process, deliberate practice, metacognition, cognitive biases, inverse reinforcement learning and more. The future doesn't depend on the past if the present is defined, - that's a simple definition of Markov process. That's exactly the principle which people whom I researched are following. They don't rely on probabilities calculus based on past outcomes under the same conditions. They move ahead by iterations and instantly use the information obtained on the go to predict what will happen next. 
Did you know about winner-winner fights of ants which without genetic changes produce an entirely new breed of worker-queens? These ants transform physically after winning together. Their life span, for instance, grows tenfold. Their transformation can be, however, stopped by their fellow ants if there are no other transforming worker-queens around. It's not only about ants. It's about a special type of outliers among people as well. It's about the cluster of billionaires.
I thought if I should name this book Investors of Time or Masters of Probabilities because all members of the cluster of billionaires whom I researched did not necessarily own billions. Probably I will not change the name because each of them is worth billions and can produce billions even though we - the consumers rarely understand it.
I believe that I am writing a valuable book that will inspire a lot of people and help them learn how to achieve more personally and to contribute more for the wellbeing of our society. I wish as many people as possible to read it. I invite you to support my campaign and to be the first to read this book. Maybe, you are one of them? The probability is much higher than you think. I want to make some money on my writings but even more importantly I wish people enjoy and learn while they are reading it. In December 2016 I published an article in Russian about the concept presented in my book. In two months almost 50 000 people have read it and over 2 000 shared it on Facebook. This way I learned that this book should be written, published and distributed.
I believe that our world is transforming into a very uncertain and constantly changing place. The capabilities of billionaires described in my book will help us all to survive in the new environment. There are thousands, maybe, even millions of people out there right now who have these capabilities but they yet don't know who they are and whom they may be. If they are surrounded only by people who don't understand them, they may lose their unique capabilities or they may be developing much slower than they can. Think, you are not just helping me - you are helping them. There are no losers in the evolution of the cluster of billionaires. There are only winners. You will see why when you will read my book.
At least half of your funding will go to the production and mailing of perks. The rest will be spent on finishing of the text, editing, publishing, promotion and marketing of the book.

story:
“Real bands save fans, real fans save bands” - Michael Clifford

It’s incredible to see how much 5 Seconds of Summer have grown since they first started in 2011. It’s an incredible story that gets to be shared globally. From media outlets, social media and even their own book. But what about the people they impact? 

This project is time to shine a light to show how much music and bands can actually change a person. Whether it’s something small like creating new friendships or actually helping someone in their darkest hour, it would be incredible to shine a light on what this band has done to help their fans. 

Now, a fan book may sound very typical, but this is something on another level. The aim is to compile real stories from real fans from around the world and put them into an actual book. A properly printed book. At first, it will just be the one copy which we will contact 5SOS’ PR and ask for a direct address for them to guarantee they can give this book to the boys themselves. If the book is proven to build a popular interest, then this could potentially lead to getting multiple copies printed and putting them for sale online for fans to purchase and read themselves. Either way, let’s make a book and show people how beautiful music is and how it can change lives. 

HELP US FUNDRAISE

In order for us to be able to get this book to 5SOS, we need to raise the money to print and ship to them. We have the details, we just need to fundraise. We're also aiming to be able to get a few extra copies to be able to give away to some fans! 


Want to be in the book?

You can submit your story to 5sosfanstory@gmail.com along with your name, age and country (no more than 1,000 words) for us to be able to help share to the boys how they’ve changed your life. Made an amazing friend because of the band? Been inspired to follow your dreams? Seen light at the end of the darkness? Tell us and we’ll put your story in the book! We’d also love to hear about any fan projects, too! 

If you don't want to share a big story but still want to be in the book, click here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/11g-2hffBmKLvz0Tux4k7pJu9XR5GXZehxUymcXGmrmc/viewform


We’ll also be looking for fan artists to put designs in to make the book really stand out. You can email your artwork to 5sosfanstory@gmail.com and we can add them in.

story:
Buy the books and get cool benefits by clicking on the PERKS to the side! ¡Compre los libros y obtenga beneficios al hacer clic en la RECOMPENSAS (a la derecha)!

We appreciate all the donations, but we are also pre-selling two books here: both the bilingual beginner's guide to poetry and Benjamin Raymond's The Lost Stories of Lesser Known Gods. 

Apreciamos sus donaciones, pero también estamos vendiendo dos libros por anticipación aquí: el libro bilingüe de poesía para principiantes y Las Historias Perdidas de Dioses Menos Conocidos por Benjamin Raymond.


Let's make a bilingual beginner's book on how to appreciate, create, love, and live the poetry that surrounds us.

Hagamos un libro bilingüe para principiantes sobre cómo apreciar, crear, amar y vivir la poesía que nos rodea.

  • My name is Benjamin Raymond and I am an educator and writer from Santa Cruz, California who has been living in the glory and greatness of Quito, Ecuador for the last three years. But I am leaving soon and want nothing more than to finish and publish my book.
  • Mi nombre es Benjamin Raymond y soy un profesor y escritor de Santa Cruz, California que ha vivido en la gloria y la grandeza de Quito, Ecuador por los últimos tres años. Pero me voy muy pronto y quiero nada más que terminar y publicar mi libro.
  • This book shares with my students and the world the beauty and power of poetry, helping beginners learn how to read poetry, write poetry, and live a poetic life.
  • Este libro comparte la belleza y el poder de la poesía con mis alumnos y el mundo, ayudando a los principiantes a aprender a leer poesía, escribir poesía, y vivir una vida poética.

But we need your support! Necesitamos su apoyo!

In order to accomplish this dream, we need $7500 to pay for/ Para lograr este sueño, necesitamos $7500 para pagar:

  • Expert translators to help me with my Spanish translations 
  • Traductores profesionales que me ayuden a traducir al español
  • Graphic designers that will create the illustrations within the book along with the book's cover art 
  • Diseñadores gráficos que crearán las ilustraciones del libro así también como la portada
  • The printing of the book 
  • La impresión del libro
  • The hiring of a publicist 
  • Contratar una publicista
  • And finally, the press and publicity to motivate the sales and get this book into homes and classrooms here in Ecuador, and hopefully back in the United States.
  • Y por último, la prensa y publicidad para motivar las ventas y ubicar este libro en las casas y aulas aquí en el Ecuador, y con optimismo, en los Estados Unidos.

The impact of the book / El impacto del libro 

  • Poetry has been a fundamental part of my life since I was in grade school, and serves an important part of my teaching today. Poetry is a philosophy. Poetry is magic put into words. Poetry teaches us to die for love and to love till death. Poetry reminds us how to live.
  • La poesía ha sido una parte fundamental en mi vida desde que estaba en la primaria, y me ha servido en mi enseñanza hoy en día. La poesía es una filosofía. La poesía es magia puesta en palabras. La poesía nos enseña a morir por amor y amar hasta la muerte. La poesía nos recuerda cómo vivir.
  • And as I am moving out of Ecuador, I want to leave behind a book on how to read, write and live poetry so that both my former students and whoever may pick up the book will find a way to connect to each other and see the infinite heavens and hells we all possess within even our smallest smiles 
  • Pero como estoy mudándome del Ecuador, quiero dejar un libro sobre cómo leer, escribir, y vivir la poesía para que ambos, mis ex-alumnos y quien sea que lea mi libro, encuentren el camino para conectarse el uno con el otro y vean los cielos e infiernos infinitos que todos poseemos hasta dentro de nuestras más pequeñas sonrisas.

AND THE BEST PART! Y LA MEJOR PARTE!

We’re going to donate 50% of all the proceeds we collect after we reach our goal to Ecuadorian earthquake relief for all those that are struggling here on the coast.

Donaremos el cincuenta porciento de las ganancias que recolectemos después de alcanzar nuestra meta para ayudar a las victimas del terremoto de la costa ecuatoriana.

Thank you for your time. Gracias por su tiempo.

Please check out the perks on the side and help us in any way possible. 
And thanks again from the bottom of our hearts.

Por favor miren las recompensas al lado y ayúdennos con todo lo que les sea posible. 

Y gracias de nuevo del fondo de nuestros corazones.

story:
Getting Ready for V2

"This magnificent book will change your life!" Based on biographical research, in the first edition of "A Lifetime of Personal Power" Dr. Janin tells us about numerous transformations she has been involved with. Transformations which have already changed the lives of so many people in South Africa!
After meeting Erno in March 2017 in South Africa, Dr. Janin offered him a copy of her book. After being captivated by the introduction, that same day Erno read all 260 pages and he realized he had struck gold: "This is an amazing book which should become available to everybody anywhere in the world!"

 

Praise over the First Edition

This book has proven to be attractive readers from all over the globe, from all age-groups and from completely different cultural backgrounds.

"I feel the power when I read this book. The message is presented in a brief and simple way. Interpreting the word "develop" into de-envelop really attracted me. This book has opened my mind to motivate my students towards their own development. Through education, human civilization can be developed towards a better and modern society." (Wahyu, ID, 35 y.)
"As I'm completing my Master in Artificial Intelligence at the University of Edinburgh, I'm surrounded by brilliant people from every continent of our globe. Dr. Janin's book makes me release how important this exploratory phase in my life is and how fortunate I am to be a "global citizen". This book was a really great gift, awesome!" (Marcel, UK, 24 y.)
"Revealing about ourselves, this book is a real eye-opener. The sharing of real-life stories, including stories about Janin's own life, makes this book step away from the strictly theoretical approach. You can see these people sitting on the coach near the fireplace, learn from their experiences and their changes. This was wonderful!" (Henry & Vanessa, ZA, 55+)

 

Our Book Fund & Global Team

The last 20 copies of the first edition were shipped around the globe to people from all age groups. Their immediate responses: "Powerful", "Transformational", "Revealing", "Biographical", "Life changing", "I love the 7 Year Cycle of Life", "I now have a clearer understanding of why things happen in my life".
For Erno this was the reason to reinstate his global book fund. This initiative, "Powered by PLLLLus.org", allows authors to focus on creating beautiful and meaningful content. Our  global community takes care of everything else. Working with Mawethu and Henry, they assembled the global team to create V2 of this great book.

 

Upgrading Content V1 -> V2

In the first edition of her book, in 260 pages Dr. Janin created a very well balanced mix of theoretical backgrounds, real-live experiences from her interactions with clients (obviously anonymous) as well as experiences from her own life. And these ingredients make this book so inspiring and captivating.

Imagine reading chapter by chapter, based on the 7 year Cycle of Life, about different stages in your own life. The book will explain experiences from your past. Even better, it will prepare you for what is still coming - you will want to read on and learn more. You will agree: very powerful content!

TIP: Are you interested in the chapter "Introduction" from the first edition of this book? Just click here to request your preview.

The second edition will offer even more: Dr. Janin is currently writing additional CONTENT, so a new chapter can be added. With your support, our expert layout designer Jacob will refresh the content & layout to create a print-ready document with almost 300 pages of very exciting and revealing content. 
 

Upgrading the Look & Feel

The first edition of the book was delivered as a softcover paperback. We really appreciate & need your help, as we believe V2 of this excellent book deserves a HARDCOVER with a completely new DESIGN.

WIN BIG: You can be the lucky winner of our perk "Support (Re)Design & Get All" worth EUR 250!

The splashing new DESIGN of the cover will be created by our in-house artist Tracey Schoemaker.

And you can both Help & Win Big! Download this PDF (13 Mb) and follow the simple instructions to help us to select the new cover.

At the end of the whole process our printing genius Raymond will make sure the new HARDCOVER edition of this book will be perfectly printed, so we can ship it to your doorstep to almost any place on our tiny globe.


What We need from You &
What You will Get from Us

Although our V2 project is well on its way, your support & funding will allow us not only to create V2 of this great book, but also to:

  • Create a beautiful and powerful new DESIGN for the cover;
  • Upgrade the appearance of the book by changing to HARDCOVER;
  • Add more & streamline the CONTENT of the book;
  • Offer this book to our global AUDIENCE, via this IndieGoGo campaign as well as via Amazon.com.

So please help us by:

  • Selecting one of the following perks.
  • By "Liking & Linking" us on all social media.

>>> We appreciate your support very much! <<<

 

Frequently Asked Questions & Answers

Q: Are there any risks in this project?

Well, not really. Basically V1 of the book is there, so if everything fails we can do a reprint of V1, without the newly DESIGNED HARDCOVER and the additional CONTENT. Although that would not make us happy, we can and will deliver what you have paid for - an awesome book!

Q: How about import duties?

Good news: while all duties and taxes are expenses for you as our backer, books are seen by most countries as "documents". Therefore, in many countries there are no import duties to be paid. Obviously we can not guarantee this, so when in doubt please check with your local custom office.

Q: Why is shipping is not free or included?

Lets be honest - shipping is NEVER free, although some webshops seem to offer it for free. At the end of the day, you have paid for it somehow. PLLLLus.org is a not-for-profit organization and we want to offer fair pricing to our backers, with discounts as high as 50% on the books. Also, when you order more books, the savings on shipping can be as high as 88%! We think this is a pretty fair deal, don't you think?

Q: You offer both global  and local shipping?

Yes, we are proud to offer global shipping, While pricing across the globe differs country per country, at the moment we process all shipments from one location in Europe. However, we might want to expand to more locations, as shipments made locally are obviously at lower cost. We will notify you if shipping costs for your location will be lower and reimburse you for the difference. Or: you could allow us to use those savings to strengthen our book fund!

story:
Who? A bit about me ...

My name is Jana Gatien. I do all the conceptualizing, art and text for these books. I live on Salt Spring Island, BC, Canada. I had an idyllic childhood by current standards. A rocky adolescence (7 highschools … I was not conformable). And a trek off the beaten path ever since. I’m a mixed media artist, writer and illustrator. I waitress to pay rent while I create stuff. It doesn’t sound glamorous, but it allows an independence from the book and entertainment industry that helps me keep a certain level of quality and integrity in my work, which I’ve been asked to compromise on numerous occasions. I moved out West from Toronto 2.5 years ago, where I was a ghost-writer, waitress, food stylist/cookbook producer, yoga instructor and event manager over a 15 year span. I’ve also lived in Atlanta, Montreal and Hawaii.

WHY This Project Is Important to Me
When I was little, I felt an eerie absence of context. A lack of orientation in how to proceed into life. Everything seemed fragmented and incohesive. I didn’t know my role, my story or my relationship with the world. I didn’t know how to be effective, what I’m responsible for, how to think logically, and how not to uncontrollably worry about the disempowerment entailed in not having what seemed like basics. Things felt clunky, convoluted, inefficient, seemingly random and irreconcilably (sickeningly) contradictory. Shattered even. Was life really so precarious and undeterminable? Was I doomed to perpetual confusion? Is hypocrisy natural? Am I really supposed to be quiet and do as normality dictates? There’s more, right? You’re gonna tell me the good stuff soon, right, Pa?

I remember in fourth grade listening to my homeroom teacher offer a tired, scripted explanation of how clouds are formed. Noticing her faraway, gossamer-framed eyes, the boils on her neck, and her defeated, bland tone, it dawned on me that she didn’t embody a speck of knowledge. She was like the walking dead, “nice” as she was. I started to pay attention to others, whether they employed bravado, swagger, sternness, meekness, authoritativeness, whatever … it started to dawn on me that no one knew anything. Not the teachers. Not my parents. Not the experts. Not the textbooks I was to take as gospel. It was just a weird script they were pushing. I further realized that such a bleak situation thereby implied that I had to figure out and clarify very big questions for myself. Tall order, I suppose, for a 9 year old. I didn’t even know how to articulate what I knew I needed to do. I just knew I wasn't going to go along to get along. That would never be my way. 

So the Bobby Books really represent what I wished I’d had as a little person: a working model of reality and my relationship with it. Some vocabulary for universal ideas that I could always feel, but that were painfully omitted from the “normal” lexicon. As well as a character model that’s exhibits independent questioning, contemplation, troubleshooting, investigation, creativity and self-determination within this reality. Someone who discerns when he’s defaulted into mindlessly running someone else’s script … or whether he’s writing his own.

Of course, the books don’t give all the answers about everything. I too wanted to figure stuff out for myself in my own unique way. I didn’t want someone else to ruin the satisfaction of personal discovery. But I certainly would have appreciated not being coerced into going in the completely wrong direction; to not have had my sensibilities set up against my own growth. I would have welcomed something helpful and wise on my bedside table; a gentle compass to orient me in thinking and living. Something that encouraged the mindset that I could and indeed should take things into my own head, heart and hands, figure stuff out and determine my own way to go.

It is my sincere hope that this series strikes a chord with small folk and parents alike, and that it brings a valuable influence in the growth and formation of true-hearted, right-headed individuals.

The Bobby series could easily be adapted to complimentary mediums like animated web series, games, toys, educational material and so on. I have developed a full-blown treatment for an animated series, complete with a season’s worth of episode synopses and 3 scripts. There are also 17 more Bobby Books at different stages of progress.

If we make the financial goal, we’ll get 3 books rolling into print and distribution, with 500 hard copies of each. If we make less, then we get 1 or 2 books rolling. If we make more, we can do more books, playbooks (activity books) and animated projects. I’ll leave this all to be determined according to your feedback, desire and support for such a project to grow.

WHAT WE NEED
We will be printing Bobby Books with Friesen Press, a reputable family-run, century-old publishing house that publishes (publishing = print and distribute) rather than merely lays out and prints, as do many self-publishing outlets.

The fee before taxes, per book (laid out, templated, formatted for paper and digital, barcoded, reviewed by book critics and synched into 39,000 distribution channels … and to manage sales and printing runs from there on end) is $1785.11 ($1699.11 w/out tax) per book for the first two books only, which I’ve committed to do with Friesen at a first-time-only discount of 15% from their usual fees … this price applies only for the first two books). The third book would be $1999 plus 5% tax (so $2100). Each physical copy of the book costs approximately $2.97 per unit to print (and then retails at approximately $12.99). So:

FRIESEN SET UP: 1785.11 + 1785.11 + 2100 = $5670.22
HARDCOPIES: $2.97 x 500 = $1485 x 3books = $4455
$5670.22 + $4455
FOR A TOTAL OF= $10,125.22

Let’s also consider fulfillment of supporter perks and mail costs at $375 for a
GRAND TOTAL OF $10,500

WHAT YOU GET
In addition to a book series now in existence that exhibits the psychological architecture of good character and wholeness of being, you get some personal stuff yourself to reward your support. Please check out the Perks/Rewards section for specifics. There's some fun ideas in there. 


THE IMPACT ON/VALUE IN WORLD
In recent years, I see many minds (of all ages, really) oriented to victim mentality. The victim’s virtual reality goggles divides people and holds everyone else responsible for their experience, which is not technically possible nor helpful. In fact, such powerlessness enrages, frustrates and spiritually devastates. It’s implications are crazy-making. To offset the potential damage of such the blame-game/lifelong baby mentality, I feel it’s important to present the architecture of individuality, self-responsibility and self-determination, to help form healthy, discerning, empowered, innovative and courageous people. The world is not safe. You’ll fall on your bottom and tear your jeans here and there. A synthetic safe womb builds babies who always look for someone to take care of them, decide for them, direct them and tell them what the answers are. A natural world builds responsible, capable humans who learn, discern and decide based on experience. A natural world demands we rise to its challenges, rather than shrink from them.  

Bobby Books model a blossoming self-empowered individual. In learning to manage his imagination, mood ‘n tude, Bobby comes to understand how to take responsibility for himself and do his own thing, without needing conformity or consensus from others. To be change, rather than demand it (or blame others for the way things are!). To have the courage to see dishonesty and to be honest, even if it's unpopular. To embrace a challenge, even if he may fail. To ask hard questions and do the work to find the answer himself. To refine his focus and imaginational skill in order to create something awesome … like an ocean voyage, balcony seats at the moovies, an epic treehouse, a roadtrip to Weazel World, a role in Cirque de Poulet, a smile, a laugh, an inspiration, an insight … a better world. A better Bobby.

I’ve spent many years refining Bobby’s concept, character and world. He’s not gimmicky. He’s specially designed and calibrated for today’s condition and potential. There are no intellectual and spiritual dead-ends in its architecture. No irreconcilable contradictions. No incohesive fragmentation. No self-diminishment quietly implied. No imprisoning consensual norms repeated over and over.

In 2012 I self-published “The Well in the Frog,” my first illustrated storybook. Like all of my work, themes explored in the frog book are universally relevant, as I’ve found that the most valuable creations have lots of strata to deepen meaning and delight with maturity. The books encourage the ascendant human, be they small, medium or large.

In publishing “The Well in the Frog,” I did not have a means of distribution, which Friesen Press can now take care of for the Bobby Books. I suppose it was really glorified printing back then. But live and learn. I have managed to sell close to 1200 copies of the Frog book at bookstores in Toronto, online, via word-of-mouth and locally here on Salt Spring Island. A good learning experiment preparing me for the Bobby books, which I feel are more valuable, more far-reaching and more refined and timely in their relevance. A product of greater understanding on my part.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES
As an artist that shares what I create with the world, there is always the risk that people won’t like my work. That they’ll criticize it. That it won’t do well. That someone might fall out of bed while reading a Bobby Book and sue me. That someone may act independently, make a mistake and blame me or call Bobby Books dangerous. I guess these are the risks I take.

I’m sure there are challenges and crossroads up ahead. There are things I don’t like doing. I don’t like networking and marketing on social media. But if I need to do that, I will. I do have 2 friends who’ve offered to help with that stuff. Thus far, I won’t compromise on my work. Not out of vanity, but because of (what I feel to be) my material’s thematic soundness. It was hard work to refine my understanding, embody it and infuse it into art. Still a challenge. Always a work in progress. I still have days when I’m lazy and default into mindless patterns. But one thing is clear to me throughout this refinement: that when personal excellence is the exercise, which it is for me, artistic compromise = corruption. Rotten fruit is not what I wish to provide.

I knew, back when I had my first contract offered from YTV for my own animated TV show, that a time would come when I would be able to get stuff out there on fair terms, without the stuff getting corrupted and pimped out for plastic toys; without my getting gipped, minimized and exploited (and then so demoralized that I’m grateful for it!). Where I could retain creative control over my characters and stories and preserve their integrity, as I preserved my own. If I can’t keep that, what’s the point? Anyone can create a cute character and slap it on lunchboxes. So I walked away and decided, that in the meantime, I would just keep making things better and better. No doubt, my works have benefited from time and maturity. 

Yeah, so I don’t know what challenges I’ll face doing this on my own, without studio big-wigs, government grants, focus groups, marketing departments, and so on. But no challenge means no friction to strike the match of illumination, creativity and growth … and I want those things. So let’s get on with it.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
If you are unable to contribute financially but would still like to assist this project coming into the world, you can always just tell people about it. Mention it at the playground, in the school parking lot or at family gatherings. Email your sister about it if she has kids. Are your neighbor’s kids horrendous? Tell her there’s hope. Also, your local teachers and childcare workers may be interested in knowing about a project like this. There are many good-hearted people out there who are aware that something is profoundly outta whack with normality and the way our young are being shaped by the system. Sometimes it’s just hard to know what to do about it. But it is both my deep feeling and logical conclusion that the solution for these big, mindless collective norms is true, competent individuality.   

Good luck to all of us. These are interesting times, indeed.

story:
Short Summary

"Great things are done by a series of small things brought together."

                                                                     - Vincent Van Gogh

The bright, whimsical illustrations in Ten Little Crawfish may not match the genius of the impressionist master, but at Wagging Tales Press, we believe in Van Gogh's sentiment.  Even though we are a small company, we are passionate in the belief that with your help, we can effect a huge impact on illiteracy around the world and bring a deliciously fun new story to a child you know and love as well.

What We Need & What You Get

Ten Little Crawfish is a deliciously entertaining concept board book for children. Our ten, tasty crustaceans traipse through New Orleans and count down the fun to be had in the famous Crescent City.  Written and illustrated by international award-winning author Melinda Taliancich Falgoust, the book will be proudly manufactured in the United States by Pint Sized Productions to follow CPSIA and ASTM safety testing compliance requirements to ensure that everything is safe in your child's hands.  This tasty title is ready to go to print.  We are seeking funding to cover:

  • Printing Costs (1,500 copies)                   $ 4,500 USD
  • Shipping Costs                                               $ 1,000  USD
  • Indiegogo/Credit Card/Paypal Fees      $ 500     USD
For funds raised above the campaign goal, 20% will be donated to literacy charities around the world.

The Impact

Concept books play an integral part in early literacy development.  They help children clarify categorical information that aids them in understanding their world. However, because they are brightly colored, printed on thick cardboard, and often have special elements to them, board books are traditionally very expensive to produce compared to their retail price. This means there is a very small profit margin for major publishers and they are unlikely to take big risks in acquisitions for this market.   

However, Ten Little Crawfish is important to us as publishers...

...educators...

...and, most importantly, parents.

We want our children to succeed.  Starting with books like Ten Little Crawfish can help them:

  • Gain access to information and resources;
  • Have a voice to express ideas and opinions with confidence;
  • Take action to solve problems and make decisions without having to rely on others; and
  • Develop lifelong learning in order to keep up with the changing world.
Ten Little Crawfish  provides a solid start in building early, key literacy skills, too, like:

PRINT MOTIVATION
  • With its ten, tasty crustaceans, the savory silliness appeals to a young reader's developing sense of humor and helps them create a positive association with books.
  • The patterned text also makes it easy for preschoolers to jump in and participate.
  • The sights and sounds of New Orleans encourage young children's fascinations about the world around them and lets them know the things they love can be found in books!

PHONOLOGICAL AWARENESS

  • Like a good Dr. John tune, Ten Little Crawfish has got rhythm and rhyme to bolster phonological awareness.

NARRATIVE SKILLS

  • As children count down through this spicy, number concepts "tail", they can practice predicting what comes next in the story.
Your contribution can earn some fabulous PERKS, too!  We have school author visits and Skype visits up for grabs as well as as plenty of opportunities to get an autographed copy of the book!  Fancy a live tour of New Orleans to see all the sights featured in the book?  That's a perk, too!  So, whether it's a sprinkle of hot sauce or a handful of filé, please join us in cooking up a tasty treat for young minds around the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Help me get my book into the hands of artists.

My name is Christ John Otto and I am an artist and writer.  For ten years I have been directing a non-profit organization called Belonging House.  We raise up artists who are committed to building Jesus Christ a throne in the earth.  

Mary: When God Shares His Glory, is the second book in a 5 book series.  The series is a follow up to my first book An Army Arising: Why Artists are on the Frontline of the Next Move of God.  

My new book is all about identity.  In my books I try to answer the important questions people are asking: 

“Do I have value?” 

“Where do I belong?” and

“What is my true identity?” 

At the same time, I believe that creative people are "priests" to a digital visual culture.  They need to grasp the foundational truths that will serve as a foundation to their creative output.  Your inner life determines your creative output.

An Army Arising sold over 4000 copies without a marketing campaign or strategy.  With Mary we would like to sell 5000 copies.  We believe we can achieve most of this goal before the end of 2016.  In order to do this we will need to invest in marketing, advertising, and travel.

Your contribution will help meet these goals, and help empower the men and women equipped to transform a digital visual culture.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The book is already in the design phase. 

  • $1000 would pay for the design costs of the book.
  • $1000 will pay for flights to do a book launch in the UK and the US (My books have developed a large following in the UK).
  • $1000 would be used to develop a Youtube channel around my books.
  • $2000 would be used to purchase online advertising.
  • The remaining $5000 would be used to develop and design a large format picture book that contains most of the key ideas from An Army Arising, Bezalel, and Mary.  We believe that we are not reaching our target audience simply because we are using a traditional book format.  

As a thank you for contributing you will receive:

  • For $25 I will send you a signed copy of Mary: When God Shares His Glory
  • For $50 I will send you a signed copy of Mary and Bezalel: Redeeming a Renegade Creation.
  • For $100 you will receive a signed copy of Bezalel, Mary, and a “Scripture in a Bottle” necklace.
  • For $1000 I will have coffee with you (in the continental US) and we can ask me any question about art, artists, and our books.

If we don’t meet our goal we will use the funds toward the design costs and travel.  Anything else will go to the continued work of Belonging House.

 

The Impact

I have received hundreds of emails and letters from readers whose lives have been changed by my books.  By helping with this campaign you are helping a men and women called to work in the media, arts, and entertainment develop a foundation that is impacting the world through theatre, drama, public radio, advertising, and music.  You are helping men and women who are shaping culture know that they have value, and they belong, and they are making a difference.

Other Ways You Can Help

Check out our website, Belonging.House

Tell your friends about Mary: When God Shares His Glory

Watch for the book on Amazon.com.

Share this campaign with the Indiegogo share tools.

You telling another person is the most important thing you can do.  Thanks for your help, and for taking the time to read this.

story:
Moin

• Mein Name ist Julian Werner, ich komme aus der Stadt Paderborn und seit recht langer Zeit schreibe ich. Die "Never Happy Ending Stories" sind dabei der Hauptteil der Arbeit geworden. Es sind morbide, teils ekelhafte Kurzgeschichten, die alle eine Möglichkeit spiegeln, wie das Leben der Protagonisten verlaufen, oder eben auch nicht verlaufen könnte. Eine einzige Möglichkeit, von sehr, sehr vielen. Und wahrscheinlich eine der Schlimmsten. Nun ist es soweit, und die erste Anthologie mit eigenen Kurzgeschichten soll erscheinen.

•Um dies zu ermöglichen, habe ich diese Kampagne erstellt, denn: Bücher drucken zu lassen kostet, wie alles auf dieser Welt, Geld. Ohne große Verleger oder ein vorhandenes Geldpolster ist dies nicht so ohne weiteres möglich. Also suche ich eure Hilfe!
 

 

 

Was du gibst & was du bekommst

 
 
  • Du hilft mir dabei, den ersten Schritt zu machen, und mein erstes Buch zu veröffentlichen. Damit hilft du mir, den Grundstein für eine kleine oder große Künstlerkarriere zu legen, und bist von Anfang an mit dabei.
  • Es besteht nicht nur die Möglichkeit, bei der Vollendung der Anthologie mitzuwirken, sondern auch, selbst Teil der nächsten Geschichten zu werden. Diese werden dann persönlich per Post verschickt.
  • Außerdem gibt es für einige Wenige, die bereit uns willig sind, die Möglichkeit zur ersten Lesung der "Never Happy Ending Stories" zu erscheinen. 
 

 

 

Die Folgen

 

Mit deinem Beitrag
 

 

  • unterstützt du die Produktion des Buches
  • unterstützt du die Organisation und Realisation der Lesung 
  • Hilfst du einem jungen Künstler bei seinen ersten größeren Schritten
 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

 

Manche können einfach keinen Beitrag leisten, das heißt aber nicht, dass sie nicht helfen können:

 
  •  
  • Teile diese Kampagne im Social Media oder sonst irgendwie
  •  
  • Erzähl es Freunden
  •

story:
WHERE YOUR DOLLARS WILL GO:

We want Leash Up Your Dog Podcast to be available worldwide & as high quality and educational (and fun) as is possible. To make that happen, we need your help! We're creating a home studio from scratch, but unfortunately, we aren't exactly rolling around in money (but what dog owner is?)!

Every dollar you donate will be put towards audio interface, microphones, cables, stands, headphones, amplifier, web & file hosting costs, Indiegogo fees, & studio stocking necessities.  Maybe even a dog treat or two (just kidding).

Our goal: we want to create a nice-sounding podcast, at the lowest expense possible, without going broke in the process. We want our dog friends to have a podcast they can listen to and enjoy.  The more we raise, the more we can invest in our podcast and maybe like go on the road and broadcast from different dog events! If we end up completely above & beyond our goal, we can do some really neat things even create a video podcast for demos on Leash Up dog training!

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET:

Your funding will cover the following basic podcasting needs:

  1. Yeti Pro Microphone - $249 (on Amazon)
  2. Mickey Digital Microphone for Travel - $99 (on Amazon)
  3. Roland Digital Recorder for Travel - $199 (on Amazon)
  4. One year of Adobe Audition - $240
  5. One year of Libsyn - $120

Total - $907

If we go above and beyond our basics here, we will add the following:

  1. Swivl C Series Robot for iPad to use to video record training - $598 (on Amazon)
  2. 2-year replacement warranty - $80

Our perks will be anything from a copy of our “Lost Dog” article to having your dog featured on the cover of a “Leash Up” book.

If we don’t reach our goal, we will purchase at least one microphone!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please share on every social media site you know, particularly Facebook!
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you and woof!

story:
"While citing details of his own personal journey from South Africa to Israel, David engages the reader with narratives that identify a more realistic perspective of life in Israel and provide a glimpse into the inner soul of the Israeli people." 

From rescuing victims in the aftermath of natural disasters worldwide; going undercover to help people in need in hostile dictatorships; providing life-saving solutions to people in the third world; exercising the highest levels of morality in combat zones; supplying untold amounts of aid to its Palestinian neighbors, in spite of the ongoing conflict; rallying together in times of need at home; protecting the environment and so much more, UNITED NATION captures the unique level of concern, benevolence and uncompromising desire for the protection and preservence of human life within Israel today. 

Why UNITED NATION?

Today, a great disconnect exists in the general perception of Israel throughout the world. Israel is the only country where a global boycott and sanctions movement against it continues unabated on most college and university campuses in the United States and elsewhere and there are more United Nations resolutions against Israel- 62 in total – than all other countries combined. However, the reality of life in Israel is totally different. In truth, Israelis embrace a deep appreciation and responsibility for life despite the many challenges they face on a daily basis and this is evident by the thousands of different charitable organizations currently working in Israel and all over the world.   

The Plan of Action:

In order to make the book happen and get it to the first-round of production, I need to sell at least 100 copies. The money raised goes towards designing the book to make it appeal to a wide range of audiences and then an initial bulk print. The first batch will be used in providing your gifts in return for your contribution and then as an opportunity to get the book in front of educational organizations on college campuses, schools and communities. I also plan that the book will serve as a catalyst to launch further educational initiatives including a workshop that explores the central themes of the book; publication of further stories of Israelis making this world a better place and even a student trip to Israel to discover the narratives of UNITED NATION in person. JOIN ME in making this happen!! 

Who should Read the Book?

United Nation is for anyone who wants to deepen his or her knowledge and understanding of what the State of Israel is all about and what motivates Israeli humanitarian efforts. For those who are intimately connected to Israel and for those that are not, the stories included in this book will unlock the doors to an undisclosed side of Israel and her people. 

Table of Content:

Introduction

One: The Common Thread: Value of Life

Two: Four Corners of the Earth: Global Aid

Three: On our Northern Border: Syria

Four: Africa & The Developing World

Five: Life-Saving Innovation

Six: Soldiers with Heart

Seven: Aid to Palestinians

Eight: Volunteering Spirit: Help at Home

Nine: One World: Protecting Our Planet

Ten: Breaking Stereotypes

Eleven: Conclusion: Win a ‘Green Card’

How you can get involved?

There are a number of awesome Perks that you can claim on this page - each contribution goes a long way to making the book happen and you will be rewarded in kind through the offers listed! I THANK YOU in advance!!

story:
Let me introduce myself...

  My name is Jennifer Waddell. I am, first and foremost, a mother, lover of the natural world, and an entrepreneur. Through the many years I spent teaching preschool and raising children of my own, consisting of countless trips to the library to satisfy our story time and bedtime rituals, I had yet to come across a book that illustrated greater concepts such as gratitude, peace, community and connectedness in a way that children and their caregivers could relate to, engage with, and use as a jumping off point for expansion and conversation around these topics.

So, I decided to try my hand at creating just that.

The text came to me fairly easily, with some tweaking, adding and polishing over time. The illustrations, I was sure, would just have to be done by someone else. (How would I ever find the time?) I searched for the right person for 5 years until I realized, this was my vision, and no one else (without being offered thousands of dollars) had the passion to bring it into form. So I began. Two and a half years of many miraculous spurts of creative energy and its finally complete!  Those who I have shared it with have responded with heartfelt praise and encouragement to get it out into the world.

Valued aspects of the book

Children love the predictability and flow of rhyming text, and repetition is welcomed by toddlers, preschoolers and emergent readers.

Hidden hearts on every page add an element of fun, challenge and participation to story time.

Vibrant illustrations capture the beauty and wonder of the natural world.

What I need, and what you get:

I need to raise  $5,000 to fund the printing and shipping costs of my first offset printing of this book. After much research, I learned that the option to self publish through a POD (print on demand) outlet, does not yet exist for books that are created in the landscape format (wider than they are tall, as many childrens books tend to be.) So, after quite a search, I finally found a printing company in the U.S. that feels, knowledgeable, informative and can offer me a unit price that will allow me to effectively market and distribute my book! 

For every $25 contributed to my campaign you will receive a signed hardcopy of my book to keep or gift to a someone special, and to boot, every book purchased, funds planting a tree through my partnership with onetreeplanted.org!

The Impact

Spread gratitude! It has been scientifically proven that gratitude improves our health, and creates more joy in our lives. It reminds us that this life is a gift, and inspired at an early age, can create a lifetime ritual of giving thanks, and a sense of  connectedness to nature, spirit, and our loved ones. 

Our youth are the next generation of stewards of the earth, so lets give them great tools for the future!

Other ways you can help

You can help me to reach my goal by spreading the word! Don't forget you can use the Indiegogo share feature  to get the word out :) Thank you for your support!

story:
'I didn't ask for this tongue, mother

But now I have this mother tongue

I'll play Caliban...

Our Story

On The Water is a collection of prose, non-fiction, performance writing and poetry, which has been written and assembled by writers from Southampton.

It's published by Solent Press, which is staffed by students of Southampton Solent University. We want to show off the diverse range of talent and imagination within our university and in Southampton and share it with the broader public as well.

The call for submissions went out last autumn: we received 110  from a range of authors; a mixture of students, members of staff and people from Southampton. After blind editing, the selected pieces were sequenced and illustrated.

The book is arranged to take the reader on a journey. It's not organised into sections of prose or poetry but from the feel of the pieces. We begin with the most emotional and personal pieces and end with the most universal and abstract. This is our own interpretation of being 'on the water'.

I wonder what the woman whose voice is blared through loudspeakers across the country is like herself. I wonder if she's even alive, I wonder how she'd feel knowing her voice announced deaths a dozen times a day in the most loosely veiled code commuters know. I wonder how many voices break a year to her voice.

Our illustrator Patryk Wirenski is a Solent alumnus and our Artist in Residence for Illustration at Solent. His illustrations are available in the book, as badges, postcards and prints.

Why We Need Your Support

We need support to produce and distribute this anthology. Our goal is to raise £1,000 to cover costs involved with the production of On the water. We have a range of perks available to those who support us, including badges, posters and postcards and your own copy of On the water of course, for lending us a hand.

Please support our book. Buy one copy for yourself and one copy for a friend!

Some said it was a gremlin, some swore it was a beautiful girl, one particularly wise woman thought it was whatever you wanted to see; a shape-shifting phantom with the power to read your deepest emotions. One thing every story had in common however, was that no one could ever actually profess to having witnessed it themselves...

The Impact of On The Water

Waterstones have already told us that the book is one of the best productions they have ever seen...

This is not the first time we've attempted a project like this. Many of the students within the Solent Press unit have produced magazine articles and fanzines. Our staff—namely Dr Matthew Cheeseman and Tom Fowler—are experienced publishers.

Not only are we hoping that On The Water could make an impact on the local literary scene, but we are also aware of how the production of our anthology could have an effect on the environment. For this reason we chose to produce On The Water with vegan-friendly ink printed on recycled paper, to minimize our damage to the environment and to the other animals who share our world.
