story:
The Problem:

 

We realize that politics is usually boring and entertainment is now one of America’s major food groups. So we’re putting the two together - adding some caloric value to entertainment while putting our politicians in the spotlight, forcing them to get back to work.

The Solution:

 

 

Your remote control to the show’s content. When your government is about to vote on something big, we let you know with a quick 30 sec video explaining what it is. Then you voice your opinion by voting YES or NO. You can also share a short video or comment regarding your thoughts on the issue.

Let’s face it - Facebook friends are far more receptive to kitten videos and selfies taken in exotic places. If you post an investigative report, you’ll get something like two likes and one angry face. Post a selfie of yourself in bed with a kitten? Well, you catch my drift. We’re all on Underground’s social network platform for the same reason - to take back control of our government. 

Underground Network’s site is up and running -- we're starting to populate it with articles, tutorials, profiles and much more - so hop on, create an account and join the fam.

The online show is powered by your votes from the Underground Network app. When you vote on that big issue, we keep track. And we will be taking those votes, with our film crew, directly to the politicians.

If they’re doing what you told them to do - their jobs - then being in the spotlight won’t sting; in fact, it will be positive reinforcement which may inspire more of them to do the same! But if they’re evading us, working for the corporations or other interests? Well, let’s see how they take to being called out on camera!

We Need You:

 

We need your votes and voices on the app in order to start shooting the show. When we have enough, we can get our film crew in the politicians' faces in our "Keeping Up with The Politi-cians" type show. We need to know which issues are important to you as both viewers + voters.

Here’s what you need to do to be part of the first episode:

  1. Download the App (iOS or Android) It’s still in beta, but is easy to use and is the first step in making the show a reality. 
  2. Check the issues on the App, vote, comment or record a short video under the ones important to you. Or, record your own issue. 

  3. Every episode will feature the top issue of the week.

Instead of a show like John Oliver (which is awesome) there’s still this sense of “Well, what can we actually do to change this stuff?!”, Underground Network lets us take action. So download the App, vote, and stop these slow-motion political train-wrecks from wrecking our badass country (USA! USA! USA!!!)

While we wait for production:

We'll post videos of issues to vote on, build app updates, post video responses to the most worthy or WTF?! stories from the news, and create a fun and politically informative place to be. Many of the key aspects of Underground Network will be or are already running. 

 

HOW IT WORKS:

1) We cut through the bullshit! And produce a quick 30-second video describing an issue/policy/law, who it benefits, who's proposing it, and any potential conflicts of interest (ie: where the money's coming from and who benefits).

2)  “Ding-Ding!” A notification on your smartphone alerts you to the new policy with a fun video telling you exactly what it is. YOU get to vote - right on your smartphone - and leave video or message comments if you'd like.

3) The follow up! We bring our lobbyists and a film crews to DC to show them your votes. There’s nothing like being put on public display to hold politicians accountable.  A tad extreme? You betcha.

4) See it all! We film the whole process and put these politicians on the spot.  And if they don't do what you want? Then it's "bye-bye" to their job. 

Essentially we all want something to change, and we want that change to benefit us, our families, and the people we love. The process can be triggered right now, by you, by all of us. Join the Underground Network and be part of this right from its beginning. So, let's get started with the basics by buying your country back for a dollar!

Our Ask, You Ask?

Via our Underground Network campaign, we will begin production of the show and finalize the app. You will have already downloaded the app and discussed an issue you’d like to see addressed on the show. And, well, if that’s all you do - that’s awesome. But why not ramp things up a bit, leave a mark . . .

That Cash Money

This part is easy. We want as many individuals involved as possible in funding Underground Network. That way we're not having to answer to the few and powerful, we answer to you! You'll know exactly where our funding is coming from - a crowd funded and transparent film crew to let Washington know that you mean business. 

Impact

By joining our campaign, you actually take back control of your country from The Super Pacs, the Billionaires and the Mega Corporations -- not to mention a much needed shift away from corporate owned media and networks. Collectively, we can prove that their money is useless, and we can, essentially, take our country back from them.

As lovers of democracy, we keep ourselves updated with how the world works, while keeping our media in check through constant research (and harassment!)

Charles Como - (Founder) - after realizing he couldn't start his own country, Charles started Underground Network to instead, fix the country he was born in. Previously he founded one of Hollywood’s first major Internet companies, BoxTop Interactive, which he grew into the world's largest web development company at the time. His clients included Capitol Records, Warner Brothers Records, Fox Entertainment (pre Fox News), United Paramount Network (UPN), Apple, A&M Records, Guess? (that’s not a question..), Mattel’s Barbie (literal objectification, anyone?), Hot Wheels, Major League Soccer, Van Halen, Kid Rock, Lenny Kravitz, Rage Against the Machine, Seal, and Sting, just to name a few. He also created one of the first YouTube channels to hit 1/2 billion video views. Accomplishing all this with incredibly crippling obsessive compulsive hyperactivity.

Katerina Moutsatsos - (Co-Founder) - Notorious actress, creature, writer, producer, in-house political opinionator, educated (Master in Theater Studies - Sorbonne University)... and pregnant! Into politics like no one else on the team (warning: formidable political debate opponent). Not beholden to a single news source, analyzes raw interviews and draws her own conclusions - gotta agree or else. Created various short movies, and YouTube videos reaching millions of views. Author and producer of “Sara and Mara” a political TV satire which refers to the crisis of her native Greece. Speaks 6 languages, and thinks in 7!

Jon Como - (CTO) at Underground Network. A moving pile of atoms, occasionally pushing air through its vocal chords + articulating its extremities due to transient patterns of neural activity. Likes computers and technology, wants to make machines conscious. Is cynical optimist. We're all going to die.

Chris Dela Cruz - (Producer) - Chris is a multi-media Producer with over 12 years experience. He’s produced over 1500+ videos in his career and he’s just getting started. He’s also currently working with one of the most successful song writers and Producers, Philip Lawrence of the Bruno Mars band, and is launching new television and film projects. In his free time, he loves watching comedies on Netflix, taking long walks on the beach and swimming in Student Loan debt.

Vannick Douglas - (Chief Animator) - Former active duty Marine turned animator. Born in New Orleans, he joined the military to finance college, graduated from the Art Institute of Phoenix, and move to Los Angeles to pursue his dream creating something that changes the way we live. After working with the BBC, Young Hollywood, the Mighty Network, Inc, he somehow he ended up working with the scrawny (in comparison to him) motley Underground Network crew, creating such originals as Political Mammals, Angry Kitty and a mean grilled rack of ribs.

Kevilina Burbank - (Researcher/Writer) - Former educator - responsible for creating awareness in thousands of students. Crowdfunding startup founder. Acrobat. Goat farmer. Quilter. Traveller. Writer. The person who wins most of the chess games around here. 

Elin Kazar Mikaelian - (In-House Economist) - Chandler Bing personality. Leslie Knope work ethic. She has two last names and doesn’t really know why. Studies political economy and is wired on just a little too much coffee. Honestly shows up just to pet Boomer. Loves bashing kale and the MSM when she’s making small talk at the water cooler.

Shane Barbera - (Animator) -  Writer, producer, animator, actor, and creator of the hit political satire web series Bernie Sand Wars. Herbivore intent on inspiring social and environmental integrity though comedic narratives. 

Michael Nevradakis - (Researcher/Writer/Columnist) -  Ph.D.  candidate in media studies at the University of Texas at Austin. Fulbright Scholar. Perpetual student. When he isn't busy interviewing Chomsky, producing his weekly radio program airing in 22 stations worldwide, regularly contributing with articles and commentaries to publications such as Mint Press News or Truthout (just to name a few), or working on finishing his Ph.D - one day!... Michael provides the team with the most amazing research along with his signature scripts and articles.

Boomer - (Corruption Sniffer) - Woof!

Q. How does Underground Network deal with new legislation?

A. We don't want to be the ones who decide if a piece of legislation is right or wrong; but, what we can do is point out potential conflicts of interest. Each new piece of legislation is proposed by certain politicians. If those politicians are getting their campaign dollars, or future employment opportunities (revolving door) from the corporations/industries/specials interests affected by that legislation, we let you know.

Q. What experience does Underground Network have in television? 

A. Combined, the team has produced some of the most successful YouTube channels that generated over ½ billion video views; put two entire television networks online; was responsible for bringing a significant number of major record labels online as well. Produced over 1,500 videos including for such behemoths as Bruno Mars, Philip Lawrence, Iggy Azalea and Napeson Hymen III.

Q. Will there be an episode every time a bill comes into action? 

A. Because we’re a TV show, we focus on major pieces of legislation, where the public is on one side and the government/special interests are on the other. There will typically be one issue per week.

Q. What will my money do for Underground Network? 

A. The money raised here will help finalize the app and produce the show. Once the show gets in motion, it will start to fund itself.

Q. What’s currently available on the app? How does the app work?

A. The app, though still in beta, has a few cool features built already. We can push out new issues, which you can then discuss and vote on. You can also vote on individual videos or comments, and sort by the most controversial or popular. When posting video responses, the app has built in video editing (iOS only right now), allowing you to combine clips and shoot retakes to get that perfect shot. You can also choose to be alerted when other people with the app are nearby, and actually chat with them "off the grid" (using Bluetooth; remember it's in beta and still needs your help to finish!). 

Q. What was the inspiration behind Underground Network?

A. Political apps get attention at election time, yet the attention withers away right after - just like interest in politics.  We wanted something to keep people interested at ALL times, especially between elections, when things actually happen. Politics may be boring, complex and downright exhausting, but democracy depends on its citizens remaining engaged at all times. If not, we end up policies and candidates that don’t reflect who we are.

Q. What's the significance of the 10,462 number?

A. It's the number of unique, registered lobbyists who have actively lobbied in 2016 in Washington DC. Since Underground is effectively a crowd based lobbying platform we’re raising a dollar for every lobbyist on Capital Hill to to take back the control from them, to change the face of our democracy and put the power back in the hands of the people, you!

Risks and challenges

Well, Democracy could suddenly fix itself, the media could bring honest reporting back and smartphones could become obsolete. Do you see that happening the way things are currently going? We don't either, which is why we are here.

Other ways you can help

We'd love you to be a backer, or you can simply just download the App, record a video or write a comment. No money? No problem.

Just spread the word about the Underground Network app or the launch of this campaign -- the last piece of the puzzle. Indiegogo’s share tools make it pretty easy.

Stay tuned. Tell your friends and let's change the world simply by lifting a finger!

story:
Summary

My name is Wesley Smoot and I am the creator of Weslo's Home-O-Erotic Cookbook. I am a creative director and publisher for my own start up, Weslo Publishing.  
Weslo's Home-O-Erotic Cookbook features Delicious Men preparing Delicious Recipes and shows you, the reader, how to prepare them at home. We have beautiful photography, gorgeous models, witty commentary, stylish design, and of course  very delicious recipes! With over 100 recipes, there's bound to be something for everyone's taste. Our chapters include: Rise and Shine (Breakfast), Afternoon Delight (Lunch), Foreplay (Appetizers), All the Way (Entrees), On the Side (Side Dishes), A Sweet Finish (Dessert), What had Happened was.. (Cocktails), and Recovery (Protein Shakes, Fruit Smoothies, and Veggie Juices). 

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $30,000 to help us complete our deluxe edition, eBook, and attend the major book expos and conventions around the world. 

For our deluxe edition we will be shooting some big names in Los Angeles. We will need to fly out to LA with our team, rent locations, and pay our talent. Many of the big names we have been talking to are willing to shoot with us for a very modest price, because they love our project and the first edition. Some of these names are musicians, tv and internet personalities, underwear models, and my favorite.. RuPaul Drag Race contestants. 

We will also be attending Book Expos and Conventions that put us in front of industry professionals including literary agents, buyers, and press. These are the people that can get our book in major stores all over the world and spread the word much easier than we can with our limited budget. While these contacts are very important to make, some of these trade shows cost as much as $5,000 just for a booth. This is not including flight and hotel expenses. So this is definitely where we could use your help. 

The Impact

By contributing to our campaign you are helping us have our book seen all over the world. Buyers will be able to easily make purchase orders and press who are constantly bombarded with press releases will be able to see what us boys in Texas are making, face to face. The big names we are introducing for our deluxe edition will also give us credibility and no doubt contribute to more sales. 

With a very limited budget we have been able to find models, locations, photographers, chefs, and designers to make a beautiful book. Your contribution will help us take this title and deluxe edition to the next level. 

I think you will love what we have already created. We have got some amazing feedback and reviews. With every purchase of the first edition you will receive an eBook of the Deluxe Edition to see what your contribution has helped us accomplish. 

Risks & Challenges

We have no shortage of talent: great photography, delicious recipes, gorgeous models, beautiful design, wonderful PR, and so on.. But honestly our biggest challenge we'll be facing this quarter is financial. We have been able to accomplish our first book with a shoe string budget. I think with this experience we will be able to finance our goals with the modest amount we are trying to raise. We are always open to a challenge anyway. We plan on renting an AirBNB where we can stay and shoot our talent in Hollywood during our time there. This will help us minimize our costs while in such an expensive city. Also when we are at trade shows, we'll most likely be staying at La Quinta and enjoying Subway sandwiches. We can make it work. We'll be sure to post lots of photos so you can see what your contribution is helping us make

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you love our project but can't commit to purchasing a book or any of the other perks? Well we want to tell you every contribution help no matter the size. Your $5 contribution can do wonders. They really add up. 
If you can't do that, we completely understand. Show your love by sharing our campaign on your social media by using the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you for your contribution in helping us reach our goals in advance.

We plan on renting an AirBNB where we can stay and shoot our talent in Hollywood during our time there. This will help us minimize our costs while in such an expensive city. Also when we are at trade shows, we'll most likely be staying at La Quinta and enjoying Subway sandwiches. We can make it work. We'll be sure to post lots of photos so you can see what your contribution is helping us make   Other Ways You Can Help
Do you love our project but can't commit to purchasing a book or any of the other perks? Well we want to tell you every contribution help no matter the size. Your $5 contribution can do wonders. They really add up. 
If you can't do that, we completely understand. Show your love by sharing our campaign on your social media by using the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you for your contribution in helping us reach our goals in advance.

story:
What's Going On Here...

I have always loved science fiction, especially short stories.  (If you're reading this I bet you're a fan, too.)  After a number of years using my writing skills in the exciting world of business--hey, it pays the bills--I've decided to try my hand at sci-fi.  My friends' reactions to my stories?

  • Gripping!
  • Wow!
  • Gripping *and* wow!
  • I thought you were just good at numbers...

I've written over half a dozen stories over the last year or so, they're all ready to publish.  But I also realized that nothing sparks the imagination like reading other people's work, too.  So, I came with the idea of publishing a sci-fi magazine.  Like Asimov's or Analog, you know?  But all digital.  And less expensive!


What You Get

So what's in it for you?  As an ESTEEMED READER you'll get:

  • Awesome sci-fi stories...
  • Dirt cheap!
  • Did I mention cheap?
  • And awesome!
  • No "bleh".  I promise.  Individually reviewed and edited stories from a number of independent authors. 

All of that for just a dollar!


And what's in it for you if you are a CONTRIBUTING AUTHOR? 

  • A real review.  No form letters.  Constructive, detailed critiques, whether you're selected or not.
  • The chance to be published if your story is selected.
  • ...which would mean YOUR NAME on the cover (oh yeah!) 
  • If you're published in issue #1 (or are strongly in the running), I'll contact you in advance for future issues to see if you have something you'd like to submit.  Still has to go through the review process, of course.
  • Twitter!  Shout outs and free publicity.  If you're published, I'll let everyone know you wrote a little slice of excellence!

Yeah, I'm asking for a little more for the review, but it's still less than that trenti mondochino latte at the coffee shop.

I'm expecting to publish at least 35,000 words per edition, probably more like 40,000-50,000, with an average story size of maybe 3,000-4,000 words?  I'm hoping for like 8 to 10 stories from other authors, and I'll probably put in two of my own.  (I have 8 ready-to-publish stories ready, averaging about 4,500 words each.) 

(Question for Mr. Alter:  Do you use as many exclamation points in your stories as you do in your pitch?  Answer:  No!!!)


Where Am I Going With This Thing?

Long-term goal:  a paid 'zine, starting with the second edition.  Instead of paying per word directly, I'd share a portion of the receipts from paid sales, with bonuses going to the best-rated stories.  The more sales, the more paid out, with a formula to be determined.  Costs are very low (just the cost of processing payments), ya gotta love digital publishing!

Maybe I'll Indiegogo it for every edition?  Request stories from my existing authors (only if the quality is good enough, and paid by the formula), and ask for submissions from new authors on Indiegogo (unpaid per Indiegogo's rules).  A mix of pros and amateurs each time.  Still thinking about the structure, I'm open to suggestions.

How often do I want to do this?  I'm thinking two editions a year.


Some Notes If You're Submitting A Story

More bulleted lists, but it has to be done:

  • PG-13 or tamer. 
  • No fantasy or spells & sorcery.  May accept a "tales of the weird" kind of thing.  Light horror in the sci-fi vein is quite welcome.
  • Please proofread and spellcheck!  If I see "baited breath" one more time...
  • Submissions will be text-only in an email, the published version can have things like *italics* and underlining and bold.  No pics for now.
 

Risks & Challenges

Financial risks: none!  The day job pays pretty well.  I'm just looking for some spending money, here.  Take my wife out for a nice dinner, that kind of thing.  I know I'm asking for free work in the first edition, but in the future, I'm willing to give a fair cut to all non-Indiegogo-campaign authors.


Other Ways You Can Help

Let your friends know!  Social media, and all that!  Use the Indiegogo Share Tools (whatever those may be, I'm a noob).

And did I mention how great you all are?  I love you guys, thanks for reading my whole pitch!

story:
Welcome! You have arrived at the beginning of my long (hopefully) and illustrious (probably not) career as an author. 


I want to write for a living not because it'll make me famous, but because after years of searching unsuccessfully I finally found my passion. I am a 25 year old human who finally found something they love doing and now I don't want to let it go. Cheesy I know, but it's the truth. Maybe you can relate.  The book I am writing is a modern sci-fi fantasy novel which you can read a little blurb about right below. 


What the Book is about

Here is the link to the first two chapters. 

https://curseddcp.wordpress.com/


I have a couple of chapters I'm going to put up here for you to read, but let me summarize it for you. This novel is about the struggles of a son and a father. The struggles of a man trying to find his place in the world. Of a desperate city that goes through a tragedy unheard of in this millennium. It's also about heroes. Super heroes. That last part is more telling than the others, but I promise that you won't have read this story before. And yes while some cliches will be unavoidable, I will do my best to make sure my first book is original and unique. Read the chapters and see what you think. If you don't have the time right now, then here is a brief actual summary. 


"Frank wakes up to the biggest crisis that his generation has ever seen. Stranded in a city with nothing, not even the clothes on his back, and no home to go to our would be hero has to rely on a burned bridge from his past to get back on his feet. But everything has strings attached, every action has consequences. In this case the consequences are getting himself embroiled in a plot years in the making that went tragically wrong. Will Frank be able to pull the city together after its tragedy, or will he be destined to be just another statistic? Also people have super powers."


Forewarning, this isn't a kids novel, characters will probably die. Not to say that the whole book is just going to be violence, but I thought I had better warn you now instead of the alternative. 




Here's where you come in

I need to pay my bills, eat, get to work, and also invest a considerable amount of money and time into my novel. The book itself needs cover art, editing, finishing, re-editing, re-writing, and numerous other details in order to get it finished and into your hands to read. And possibly the hands of thousands of other people.

And I honestly can't do it without you. I've been working on it for over a year now and while I was working 60 hours a week I couldn't find the time to make it happen. I don't have supermom-esque skills sadly (wish I did). So, I need your help. I need at a bare minimum the amount that I have listed on this campaign to keep eating and to get some cover art for my novel. With that first sum of money I can get by long enough to finish my book and get it to you. 

This $5000 does not include budgeting for coffee. Just let that sink in. I am willing to go without caffeine to finish my book. An author without caffeine is a sailboat with no wind, but I'll coast my way through that rocky shore because I refuse to give up on this. 

Now, anything past $5000 dollars goes straight to caffeine. I'm only mostly kidding. Mostly. What it actually goes to are another editor to edit for various other things, or just more editing time in general. Maybe someone to read through it and make sure I don't break any copyrights. Then some more art for either the cover or the back of the book itself. Honestly you can't have too much art for things like this. And the money will also go to keeping a roof over my head. That part is important too I guess. 

If we don't manage to reach our goal however don't fret. The money that you donate will go to the novel and me, and though it will take more time because I'll have to find a second job, I will get it done. It just may take another couple of years. My timeline with funding is to have the book done in six months. 

And with that I make you a simple promise, if you pledge 5 dollars or more, you get the book as soon as I'm done with it. Period. That's the ground floor. Donations past that get a few perks. Nothing too crazy, but a few incentives never hurt right?

But what if I have no money?

For people who can't contribute money there are other options too. If you share my campaign around that always helps. Indiegogo has a ton of tools for that and the more people who view it the better. If you want to suggest things anyway I'll be setting up a forum for that. And if you just want to get your hands on the book if you get your friend to donate $10 I'll give them another copy so you can also have a copy. Or maybe hook me up with a publisher. If any of you do that, well I'm not sure there are enough words to express my gratitude.

For those of you who want to contribute but can't immediately don't worry. The book is going up on a website after I finish it for just $5 digital. You can get it there, or you can continue to contribute after the campaign is finished because Indiegogo is great like that.


_____________


And that's it. Contribute if you can, share if you can't. And to everyone who read this all the way through you are an amazing human being. To those who didn't you are only slightly less amazing. Aww, who am I kidding you are all great people. Thanks for your time and consideration. 
Future author,
DCP

story:
ABOUT LOST HALLWAY


"Hail to Canada's Dr. Seuss! Peter G. Reynolds and Keith Grachow have produced a charming children's book that will make a perfect gift. Bravo!"

- Robert J. Sawyer, Hugo & Nebula award winning author


Hello. My name is Peter Reynolds and I’m the author of Lost Hallway. I'm very excited to introduce you to my first children's book, which has been illustrated by Keith Grachow.

Keith and I have worked hard to make Lost Hallway a wonderful story that is sure to find a place on children’s bookshelves everywhere. We just need your help to print it. If you support us, you can have your name printed in the book, will receive one of the first copies, and will maybe get the inside scoop on where to find those keys and socks you’ve been missing.



MY INSPIRATION

I'm a filmmaker by trade and so my first thought was for Lost Hallway to be a short film. I actually did end up writing and directing one for BravoFACT a few years ago.

But after my son Griffin was born it became clear (with my wife's encouragement) that Lost Hallway needed to be a children's book. A book that we could read to him and that eventually he could read to his own children.

It’s that sense of connecting to future generations that really inspires me. The idea that my son could be reading this book to his own children or even his grandchildren. Could it get any better than that?


STRETCH GOAL

I've been working with the Deaf community for many years and I'd love to create a sign language version of Lost Hallway to make it accessible to Deaf children.

If we reach our stretch goal of $20,000, we'll create an interactive e-book that will include an American Sign Language (ASL) version of Lost Hallway. If we get to $25,000, we'll add a version in langue des signes quebecois (LSQ).


THE STORY

Lost Hallway is a modern fairy tale that asks the question: Where do lost things go?

It can be very frustrating. I mean, where the heck is my phone? It was just here a second ago. And my socks. How can just one be missing? I can tell you they're not in the dryer. I’ve looked.

It turns out, all lost things end up in the Lost Hallway, a magical place where you’ll find everything that’s ever been lost.

   

There are rooms filled with keys,                                                                                             Rooms filled with pets,                                                                                                               Rooms filled with socks,                                                                                                              And even lost bets!”

    


Lost Hallway follows the adventures of Griffin, a young boy who has lost his dog and his ball. He searches everywhere, but what he doesn't know is that the Lost Hallway doesn't like to give things back. If Griffin is ever to succeed, he's going to have to learn some tricks to finding what he's lost.



OUR ILLUSTRATOR

Lost Hallway is illustrated by Keith Grachow. Keith has been a graphic artist for the last 20 years and has worked for companies like Play Along Toys (a subsidiary of Jakks Pacific) on the Bruce Lee, Enter the Dragon series; and for Disney Animation, as a digital ink and paint artist on the animated flicks Princess and the Frog and the reboot of Winnie the Pooh (2011). 

Keith has also published three children's books, "On A Planet Named Up-In-The-Sky", "What would Slog do?" and "Above a Planet Named Up in the Sky".


COSTS

We really believe in this project and have already invested $3,600 in the artwork.

Here’s what you’ll get:

  • 8 x 10 hardcover book
  • Glossy laminated cover
  • 36 fully illustrated and written pages 
  • High quality, bright, full colour

This is where the money will be going

  • Illustration  $  0.00  (we’re covering that)
  • Printing & Shipping  $  8,500.00
  • Indiegogo/Credit Card/Paypal Fees $ 850.00
  • Total $ 9,350  (CDN)



A VISUAL GUIDE TO OUR PERKS
(Plus a sneak peak at some of the beautiful artwork)



WHAT THE FUTURE HOLDS

My journey to become a children's author has been amazing. My wife Kathy and my son Griffin continue to be an incredible source of inspiration and support. They are my biggest supporters but also my toughest critics. Lost Hallway would not have happened without them and I can't thank them enough for getting me this far.

I've already written my second book, Lost Hallway 2: Lost & Found which will be ready in early 2017  My third book, My Baddy, will be available in late 2017.  

My Baddy is something my son Griffin called me once when I was being a little naughty in his eyes. It inspired the story of a boy who wishes his strict father was just a little bit bad. Here's a short sample:

But once in a while,                                                                                                                                I get kind of sad.

I wish that my Daddy,                                                                                                                       Was a little bit bad.

My Baddy I’d call him,                                                                                                                       He wouldn’t mind.

He’d let me do bad things,                                                                                                                Any old kind.

He’d throw out my homework                                                                                                       He’d jump on my bed                                                                                                                      

He’d laugh at all                                                                                                                                   The bad words that I said.


SUPPORT US ANY WAY YOU CAN

Please share our campaign with your friends and family. It's amazing how powerful an email, share or tweet can be!

You can find the share button at the top of this page. Thanks in advance!

story:
Meet Lindsay:

  • Lindsay is a Motivational Speaker, Writer, Yoga Instructor and Spiritual Joy Restoration/Health Coach, helping to bring light back into people that promotes inner healing. She spends most of her time taking care of her two young "blondie" daughters and all that motherhood entails. She’s also a mother to her angel son above, whose love shines through her every day. Her greatest passion is writing to inspire through my heart and through Spirit. 
  • This is my story of hope, healing and forgiveness. I hope to inspire others with my words.
  • Helping me to achieve my first book would bring me the utmost joy because I know that it will impact their lives more as the reader.

My Story 

This is a story about loss of innocence through a violent act of rape, attempted murder and the death of her baby. With brutal violence, her innocence was taken away at 16 years old and her entire perception of life changed. Her heart became dark and she lived in a world of denial and deep, relentless anger. She struggled to find approval and acceptance with others.

Summary

Matthew Ward-Jackson and Matthew Odlum are charged with trafficking weapons that ended up in the hands of Dellen Millard, convicted murderer of  Tim Bosma. 

They are pleading not guilty. Originally they were supposed to be tried together at a two-week-long trial is set to begin on May 23, 2017. But, at the last minute, Matthew Ward-Jackson's trial was adjourned until later this summer to allow him more time to prepare. Now, Matthew Odlum will stand trial alone.

Based on what I saw at the preliminary hearing, these trials will be very interesting.

If the funding goal is met, I will provide full coverage—including realtime tweets and daily summaries—for 10 days of trial .

The plan is to make you feel as if you are inside the courtroom watching the case unfold.

What We Need & What You Get

I have set the cost of trial coverage at $600 per day. 

For every $600 I raise, I will provide a day's worth of trial coverage including live tweets from the courtroom. I will also provide a summary article  or video of the day's events, post available court exhibits, and do regular Q and A's.

The Impact

Journalism as we know it is dying. Reporters are being laid off, advertisers are going elsewhere, newspapers are shutting down.

We need to find new ways of getting the news we want. This is an experiment to see if people are willing to pay for in-depth court journalism.

Readers will be able to give feedback on the type of coverage they want. And if this campaign is a success, I'll definitely try crowd funding again

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is that there is not enough demand for the service I am offering to supply.

You may plunk down $25 expecting coverage for 10 days of trial, but if not enough money is raised, you might not get that many days of trial reports. That would definitely be a drag so please keep this in mind when you decide how much you are prepared to pay as a backer.

That said, the campaign will continue throughout the trial and if people find the evidence as compelling as I expect they will, they can contribute and ensure full coverage of the entire trial. 

Also, no matter what happens, I am committed to providing paid readers with bang for their buck. I want you to feel you got something of value. And I will not, under any circumstances, be absconding to Costa Rica with the funds.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word, spread the word, spread the word. The more potential paying readers hear about this campaign, the better the chances for success.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools to tell your Facebook friends and Twitter followers all about this campaign.

story:
Short Summary

Help me to help others.

I've always thought that the secret to life was living long enough to understand it. But, at 77, I now realize that there's a huge chunk about myself that I'll never understand. Like, why was I kidnapped three times? Why did someone hate me enough to have my official birth records burnt by the government? And, why did I have to leave school when I was 14?

Would I change my background? No. Why not? It taught me to hope and put hope deep within me. As well, different people in different times and places helped me. I want to help others who feel life is futile and have no hope. Please lend them a helping hand through supporting the publication of The Temerity of Hope.

The writing is done and most of the revisions but I need your financial help and support for the final push. I've been prayed for all my life and people have died not knowing their prayers were answered. You may never know how important your contribution was or who you helped.The important thing is that if only one person was helped, if one person didn't succumb to the siren call of suicide because of The Temerity of Hope, my life, the hard work of writing and your support will have been worth it.

What We Need & What You Get

Editors, especially good ones (and I have a great one) are always fiendishly expensive.

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

A BIT OF CHAPTER 1

Alphabets are astounding.

            From the moment someone takes our chubby little finger and traces it over a shape and then connects it with the picture of a fruit, we learn that A is for apple, and a pulsating, ever-changing world of hundreds of thousands of words opens up for us.

            A is also for Adam, our Biblical and genetic forefather. A is for adventure; such as the first time we deliberately splash in puddles because we like the sound of the water. A is for anxious as we trudge home in sodden clothes to the inevitable scolding. A is for adamant when we promise not to do such a thing again, and A stands for abuse when we dishonour that promise when the next rainfall arrives.

            The alphabet, when its letters are grouped into words, enhances our experiences. A bird on a bush becomes “A purple bullfinch in a lilac tree” to T.S. Eliot. Words express emotions, such as John Donne’s exasperation with his talkative lover: “For God’s sake, hold your tongue and let me love.” The Foo Fighters use them to evoke memories when “we built these paper mountains and sat and watched them burn”.

            Letters and words define. S.P.Q.R., for example, identified the Roman Republic throughout the ancient world. They also refine – René Descarte’s “I think, therefore I am.”

How unfortunate, then, that the alphabet can also confine, as it did with my grandmother. Her alphabet began with R and skipped through every other letter until she came back around to P. That was it, an alphabet of just two letters – R and P.

 

Evelyn Cunningham was born in 1893 at a time when everything was changing. Indoor toilets were replacing outhouses. Charles Darwin’s theory of evolution was converting many from their Christian faith. For thousands and thousands of English people, change meant coming to the cities in vain searches for work and living a precarious day to day existence. Queen Victoria clung to life, although to her frustrated subjects it seemed that she’d given up on both them and her reign.

Britain, the mother country, had always governed Australian attitudes up to this point. In her remote colonial outpost of Sydney, local politics ruled the day. People didn’t particularly care what changes Edward, Prince of Wales, might make to English life when his mother finally died. They were more concerned with the future of their fledgling country. The six Australian colonies were about to amalgamate into one nation. Its future citizens wanted their new constitution to reflect a forward-looking country rather than a colonial past, and vigorous debates were the order of the day as the citizens discussed what their future might be like. The lawmakers looked across the Tasman Sea to a radical New Zealand that allowed its women to vote in parliamentary elections. Not to be outdone, Australia extended the same right to its female citizens in 1901 and went even further, making voting compulsory with significant fines for non-compliance. The Suffragette movement in England could only observe from afar with envy.

            This was the world into which my grandmother, Evelyn Cunningham, was born in 1893 and the world in which she lived her early life. James, her father worked for a famous brewery’s temperance division. When Evelyn was born, the family lived in Redfern, a notorious inner-city suburb of Sydney. As the second oldest in the family, she was expected to help Olive, her elder sister, with the younger children and together they took over the management of the house during their mother’s frequent pregnancies. Both girls probably missed a lot of school as a result and, although education was prized in the family, neither went to high school.

The new constitution emboldened Australia, so that when Britain went to war in 1914, men immediately enlisted in the Australian Army Corps, motivated not so much by the desire to defend England, but by the necessity to prove their nationhood on the world stage. Like all Australians, Evelyn was shocked by the horrific death and casualty rates suffered by the new army at Gallipoli in the Dardanelles, and then later in France. However, an exciting development in her life dulled the pain and worry of wartime because a young man, Victor Lionel Thorsen, had begun courting her.

The Thorsen family had emigrated from Denmark in the 1850s, settling first in the Maryborough district of Queensland and moving to the inner west of Sydney shortly after Lionel was born, the fourth of nine children, in the 1890s. Lionel was popular, attracting friends like a magnet. He had the most amazing knowledge and asked questions about things nobody else thought about.

One afternoon in 1915, Lionel took Evelyn to a library and showed her pictures of famous artists’ works. Time and again he returned to one book, telling her to look at the portraits. She dutifully studied them, choosing one of a girl with a blue and white headscarf and a pearl earing as her favourite. She left the library thinking that all the houses in the book had black and white tiled floors exactly like those in her father’s new house in the northern suburb of Hornsby. Just before they said goodbye, she told Lionel about this similarity. He laughed. “If I had all the money in the world, I’d take us to Holland, and we’d go to that artist, and I’d beg on my knees for a chance to learn from him.”

            “Vermeer is dead, Lionel,” my pragmatic grandmother scoffed.

            “I know, and I know it’s only a dream. But I keep wondering if time could ever be elastic, and if it was maybe I could study under Vermeer,” he replied.

            Another time he took her for a great treat – day tripping across Sydney Harbour to Manly Beach with a few of their friends. On the way back, he manoeuvred things so that they were alone on the ferry’s outside deck. On the pretext of protecting her from the wind, he pulled her close to him and then pointed to the sky. “See the Southern Cross?”

            After Evelyn pointed it out, he told her the names of the main stars -- Acrux. Becrux. Gacrux and Delta Crucis. This was typical Lionel, knowing all sorts of obscure information, but he became pure Lionel when he added, “Do you know that Jesus probably saw them too? From what I’ve read, astronomers lost the Cross for hundreds of years and then found it in our hemisphere. Funny, isn’t it? First it was north and now it’s our southern icon.”

            That was exactly what she loved most about Lionel. Although he knew the most interesting bits of information, he didn’t go on about them like some other people. He just said things and left her to think them over.  Then, as the ferry ploughed it way through the heavy swells guarding the entrance to Sydney Harbour, Lionel tugged her even closer. “In Job, God talks about a time when the morning stars sang together.”

            “But, there’s only one morning star,” Evelyn protested.

            “That’s true now,” Lionel said. “But think, Evie. Dream a little. If the Southern Cross used to be a northern cross, surely things aren’t necessarily as black and white as those tiled floors. Things change. God says there was a time when morning stars sang together and angels shouted for joy. Wouldn’t it have been wonderful? To see singing stars and everyone shouting for joy? I wish for that even more than the chance of learning from Vermeer.” They sat in silence with Evelyn imaging the wonder of singing stars and joyous shouts until Lionel whispered, “You’re the star that brings me joy. Shall I stand right now and shout it across the harbour?”

story:
About Katelyn Mariah MA, BFA

Katelyn is an award winning author in the field of Alternative Medicine.  She writes books that empower adults and children to grow, transform and stay healthy. Her first book was Empowered Health and Wellness: awakening your inner physician. Her two children's books are Hindy Hedgehog's Magical Garden which teaches children how to connect with their inner physician and Mocha Mouse Creates a Magical Day, teaches children about the law of attraction.

Are you interested in alternative medicine and innovative ways to heal?  Empowered Health and Wellness is loaded with alternative methods that Katelyn used personally to heal.  

Here is a professional review of her first book, Empowered Health and Wellness, to give you a flavor of her writing:

Professional review:
"The author’s impressive knowledge in health and wellness impresses, particularly given the vast amount of fresh material provided in spiritual elements. I found myself turning pages left and right, impressed by so many new-to-me facts and insights. It’s a beautiful thought on page 7 – so impressive at the start of this book and deepening the immersion the already-impressed reader feels: ‘what if every illness has an angel attached to it?’ Readers who are currently caring for a sick loved one, or battling an illness themselves, will take great comfort in this idea. Beautifully done. The book is very well organized, with complex concepts broken down into manageable snippets, and we’re treated in between to great quotes. Well done. I loved it that the author had the excellent instinct to save her own personal stories until after she welcomed the reader into the book with instructional and inspirational material. It’s a mark of writing maturity not to want to jump right into ‘my story.’ Well done. The ‘woe’ vs. ‘whoa’ part made me smile. There is a lot to love about this book, including health facts that show the author’s expertise and dedication to building a multifaceted book filled with helpful information and a solid guide into better living."

 You can find her books at http://www.mystickcreekpublishing.com She is also the author of a best selling children's game called Angry Animals and Angry Animals 2, which teaches the healthy expression of anger using art, play, roll play and other techniques.  Katelyn was a psychologist for 26 years working with children and their families from all walks of life. She is also a visionary artist.  She has been an entrepreneur since she was in her early 20's.

Why is this important to me 

They say that if your why doesn’t make you cry, it isn’t big enough.  This WHY brings tears to my eyes every time I talk about it!

I had to have 3 heart attacks, in ten months, to learn everything there was to learn about the heart, on the body, mind and spirit level.  I learned so much about having a healthy heart and how to avoid heart issues that I feel compelled to share it. I knew from the beginning of this triple heart transformation that I was not only taking this journey for myself but I was doing it for many others and those people where in my mind all the time.

I was outraged when I learned that 80% of all heart disease and heart attacks are preventable…PREVENTABLE!!!  I heard that and I was determined to discover how to prevent it for me and you.

I was furious when I discovered that what caused my heart attacks, elevated Lipoprotein (a), wasn’t even tested or treated in the US because there isn’t a pharmaceutical to treat it. Bob Harper from Biggest Loser almost died from the same thing. I learned it wasn't treated or tested here directly from my doctors who argued with me on many occasions because I wouldn’t take the pharmaceutical of choice and chose to go the natural way. They never told my about the risks from having elevated Lipoprotein(a) I had to discover it on my own.

I learned about elevated Lipoprotein (a) by accident before I even knew I had it.   60 million people have this issue in the US, or 1 in 5 and many are dropping dead because they don’t even know they have it or because their doctor isn’t treating it! Damn that makes me angry! I have had close friends drop dead from heart attacks and to think they might not have had to.  Normal Lipoprotein (a) is below 30.  When I had my first reading it was 110!  I discovered how to successfully treat elevated Lipoprotein(a) through my own research and I also share that in the book.

High cholesterol isn’t the issue in the heart disease paradigm but that is what doctors treat in everyone who has a heart attack/heart disease because there IS a pharmaceutical that might work for some. In fact if you have a heart attack you get the 5 pill protocol no matter who you are. There isn't a one size fits all solution and many people have adverse reactions to those 5 medications.  I was one of them.

I feel blessed to be alive!  I not only got a second chance  but a third, and fourth chance to live and make a difference!! 

I learned SO much about healing your heart and having a healthy heart so you can avoid having issues and I share all the secrets in Resilient Heart. This isn't a dreary book about heart disease but an uplifting book about prevention and living a healthy life. 

I know how to heal my body and I want to teach other people how.  I want to make alternative solutions for a healthy heart available to everyone.  I want to be part of the solution to wiping out heart disease and my book and subsequent products will help make that happen!

I am writing this book to help anyone, whether you suffer from heart issues or you want to maintain a healthy heart.  This book will support you to do both.

Benefits to the reader of Resilient Heart: 

*Learn about nutrition that will support heart health

*Learn about prevention strategies.

*Discover techniques that support health and Wellness 

*Learn about resilience and perseverance and miracles through Katelyn's story

*Learn about information that the medical field isn't telling you that can save your life

*Learn about heart health on the physical, spiritual, emotional level

*Learn what the experts are saying about heart health

*Find resources for heart health

Let's Start Saving Hearts!

My story, the short version

One would think that someone who had 3 heart attacks over 10 months must be unhealthy.  That wasn’t true of me. I was healthy, ate healthy food and had worked on personal development for years. I had no warning when I had the first heart attack on March 20, 2016, which was caused by a fire in my dryer.  That fire turned into a blessing because that uncovered the issue that was happening in my arteries. I had the second heart attack in Austria and was hospitalized for a week in a hospital where 95% of the people didn’t speak English. That by itself taught me a lot. The third heart attack happened January 2017.  All three of them were the result of elevated Lipoprotein (a) and I tell these transformational stories and how I healed my heart in Resilient Heart along with techniques for you can use to strengthen, enhance your health and open your heart.

The same thing that happened to me happened to Bob Harper of the Biggest Loser. Talk about healthy and in great shape. Lipoprotein(a) doesn't discriminate. Healthy, not healthy, young and old. It happens to anyone. And NO one is telling us!!! I am changing that. I am telling everyone! 

The importance of this mission wasn’t lost on me and through my own transformation and healing I found pearls that will help you!  That is the kind of deep sea diving I like! It made this difficult journey worth it for me.

Watch the video to hear one of the miracles that happened to me in this process.

Why do I need help to launch this book? 

This is an important book and this information needs to be out there now.  People are dying from heart attacks and heart disease everyday.  They are our friends and family members.  I discovered things through my journey that will help them and help anyone have a healthier heart.  The time is now. By joining me in making a contribution to this campaign which will publish Katelyn's book, Resilient Heart,  you will become part of the solution to ending heart disease.

The support that I receive from this crowd funding campaign will go toward the stages of production and marketing of Resilient Heart including:

1-Proofing and editing the book (which is already written and ready for this stage) $1500-$2000

2-Formatting and getting it ready for printing $300-$400

3-Cover and book design $500

4-Printing books (200) $1200 on Createspace

5-Distributing and shipping of the books and prints that are pre-ordered (200) $900

6-Branding design $300

7-Beginning Marketing campaign 

8-Producing the perks $200-$600

9-Anything that I haven’t thought of

Thank you so much for supporting me to create this book and get it out into the world!

Let's Start Saving Hearts!

7. Other ways you can help

Every contribution, whether $10 or $1500 helps us reach our goal in 30 days. So, too, does getting the word out about our project! Word-of-mouth and your excitement helps multiply the value of your support.

Please tell a friend, or 25 friends, or even a 100 friends, acquaintances and co-workers, clients, about Resilient Heart

Get the word out by phone, email, and talking it up.

Post a message on your Facebook page.

Even better, post a link to the campaign video.

Tweet a link to our IndieGoGo page.

Share the perk pictures on Instagram!

*Some people are not yet familiar with the power of crowd-funding. Explain how it works and motivate someone to check out our Resilient Heart campaign.

Thank you for supporting my efforts to end heart disease.  Let's start saving Hearts!

story:
The Responsive “Thin is a Thought” Weight Loss System

Slim down and improve your life by changing your automatic thought patterns

Self-paced audio program by best-selling author Jeff Kooz

~

Did you know that one in five US deaths is associated with obesity?

It's true. One in five people in the US die prematurely (from obesity-related diseases including type 2 diabetes, hypertension, heart disease, liver disease, cancer, and more).

And the worst part of this …

Many of these people are not lazy; in fact, they’re desperately trying to reverse the problem.

How?

Through a 61 billion-dollar industry replete with drugs, gyms, health equipment, diets and diet programs, and the list goes on.

For many, this works … but FOR SO MANY OTHERS it doesn’t.

I know because I’ve been there.

For 10 years I tried dozens of diets and worked out a total of (brace yourself) 5,000+ hours.

However, after some initial results, I typically ended up in the same boat, or even worse.

A 97% fail rate

As it turns out, I wasn’t alone. A little research shows that diets typically succumb to a statistical 95% fail rate, and new research shows the figure is more accurately 97%.

Silent Shame. Silent Killer

So, how does this make you feel? 

Frustrated.

I know from first-hand experience – the sinking, silent shame of feeling hopeless, like you’ve “failed,” and let yourself (and others) down.  

And yet, beyond the silent shame lies an even greater ill – the silent killer of obesity-related illness.

But I found a way out – and NOT through traditional prescriptions.

One day I realized something fascinating: despite the vast sea of weight loss solutions, we hardly EVER hear about the mind, and yet the mind (particularly our subconscious mind) is where so many of our habitual behaviors originate.

It dawned on me that my mind was like a computer, storing programs infused by social conditioning, which I wasn’t even aware of.

The “push-button” and "instant gratification" messaging I'd absorbed culturally made it nearly impossible to change my behavior.

Fortunately, I learned how to reprogram my mind, and for the first time in my life, eating in a balanced, enjoyable way seemed easy! 

And weight loss was really one of many healthy, automatic, bi-products.  

>> It’s my mission to help others learn this method through an innovative set of self-paced audio recordings!<<

Initial pilot testers (spring 2017) testimonials:

“Thank you so much! Your method helped me uncover some new insights into why the maintenance phase after successfully losing weight has always been such a failure.” Marie Clappsaddle  

“Your step by step system is helpful in organizing your thoughts to getting where you want/need to go in life. It helped me clearly realize my health goals and it clearly outlined achievable ways to reach them.” Cathy Parthan 

 “Your system reminds me 7 Habits, One Minute Manager and The Secret in one. I’m amazed at how much wisdom you packed into it.”  Gary Graham

So, how would YOU like to add years to someone’s life today?

You CAN – by backing my launch!

Now, I’m not saying this is a cure-all or silver bullet, but I am convinced what I’ve learned can save many lives.

And you can help make this possible by backing my product at any level you can afford. (Plus, you can enjoy some of the coolest perks in town.)

You can also help by sharing this with others.

A MILLION thanks in advance, and I look forward to sharing the good news about this product rollout in the near future!

Jeff Kooz

Sources:

https://articles.mercola.com/sites/articles/arc...

http://www.slate.com/articles/health_and_scienc...

 

OKAY JEFF I'M IN - WHAT WILL I ACTUALLY RECEIVE?

I’ve asked the best script writer I know, and someone who is a professional sound engineer, to help me create a series of transformational audio recordings that can help you experience the same results I've enjoyed.

The recordings will use theta binaural beats sound technology (which can put your mind in a receptive state ... mirroring advanced meditation) to help you slim down and change your life for the better!

Specifically, the system includes 3 short recordings you can listen to over the course of 3 weeks, anywhere and anytime in a comfortable setting.

BONUS ITEMS: It also includes 3 free e-books that cover the same system in greater depth, and how to double your productivity in any endeavor!

And the cost for all this will be just $47!

The target date of completion is December 1, 2017. You'll receive everything via email.

PS Don't forget to check out the perks in levels 2 and 3 that give you far more guidance in your transformational journey.

~

Note: I’m raising $3,000 to pay for professional script-writing, voice-over narration, original music, theta wave tone incorporation, and audio editing.

Additionally, I’m asking for $7,000 to pay for costs associated with creating a Website to sell the system, and startup promotional and advertising costs.

The total amount I’d like to raise is at least $10,000.

Everyone who backs my product will receive this system for free, including the 3 companion e-books.

story:
Video above, on previous page if viewing on a mobile:  

Bayo is one of three writers newly-publishing with New Myths Press.


New Myths Press

 

The World Needs New Core Stories.

New (ancient) ways of relating to nature, to each other, to notions of economics, of "enough," to our human place within a larger planetary community

...for A Future.


The planet, life on this only planet we know of which supports life, is facing great challenges and stresses at the hands of humankind.  Humans in this global culture know many of the causes, but only speak of "reducing" fossil fuel emissions and other hyperabundant pollution which techno-industrial global society produces to maintain what are considered the minimum requirements of civilization.  Carbon dioxide, methane and other forms of pollution, meanwhile, increase each year despite promises and goals to "reduce" what must actually be discontinued for the planet to avoid extreme changes already occurring, already damaging life and its future prospects.  Today's humans are flattening global forests, overfishing the oceans, driving myriad species extinct, daily.

Humans once lived within the boundaries of the ecosystems that support life; those cultures which did not live within nature's boundaries (Easter Island, the Mayan civilization) disappeared.  Those cultures which lasted tens of thousands of years without overshooting the carrying capacity of the land they lived upon, and what the land provided them to continue living, had stories which taught each succeeding generation to fundamentally respect, hold and treat as sacred the land and life around them, grateful for the sacred privilege of life and understanding their own place as co-existent strands within the fabric of life.  These peoples did not see themselves as "separate from," "above" nature and the life they saw about them.

We call the stories of these peoples "myths," frequently with a condescending tone and underlying intent.  

Today's techno-industrial humanity, which William R. Catton, Jr. called "Homo Colossus" in his important book Overshoot, do not even see the myths currently driving them (us) to destroy that which makes life on this planet possible, as quickly as its ever-"improving" machines can accomplish the task.

We need new stories.  We need New Myths, more like those of former (and still existing here and there upon the planet) humans.  We need those ancient stories, told in a way that today's humanity, those of us concerned for A Future, can reshape the destiny currently mapped-out and inexorable, unless we can imagine and pursue a new (ancient) path.  To even see that path, we need stories which point the way, and affect the actions we take, the beliefs we hold.

Humans love stories.  They are fundamental to who we are, how we see the world, ourselves, and our place within the world and life.  You might say, to use a techno-industrial metaphor, that they contain our operating system.

New Myths Press has its own origin story.  I know we live in a sound-byte, YouTube, Twitter-pated world in which few have the time to read more than 140 characters about something new, so I have included a Who? What? Where? When? Why? summary just below, and below that a breakdown of how New Myths Press will spend the funds contributed to this crowdfunding campaign.  The New Myths Press story is below these, and you are welcome to read it, or bookmark this page to read later when you have some time.


This IndieGogo campaign is designed to fund an exceptional launch to match the importance and vision of the writers about to publish with New Myths Press.  Along with their collections, a newly revised, edited version of the novel World of Wounds will also be published, all being launched soon after this campaign is complete.  We have made exciting Perks available to those who contribute— whatever you are able and inspired to contribute will greatly assist in providing these writers, and the Mission of New Myths Press as an endeavor, with the exposure they certainly deserve. Help by contributing to this campaign, and by spreading the word directly to those you know who would like and support New Myths Press. 

Thank You.

-Zack Lehtinen

Father, Author, Collaborative Publisher, New Myths Press

“Like” the New Myths Press Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/worldofwounds/


 Kindred Souls-- Bayo, Charles and Manish: 

Bayo, Charles, Manish: a Kinship Tale
Bayo, Charles and Manish are like-minded friends on parallel missions.   Charles has agreed to contribute the foreword to Adebayo's book, Manish an afterword.



 
 
 

Who?

New Myths Press, featuring writing by:  Zack Lehtinen (writer/publisher, U.S.),

 

Several opening chapters of the novel World of Wounds:

Shahbano Aliani’s poetry, ‘blog: Contemporary Sufi Poetry 'blog

New Myths Press is also seeking others, readers and writers, poets and novelists, essayists and speakers, all who are passionately committed to the search for and creation of New (and Ancient) Stories, new ways of seeing the world and our place in it, living with instead of at the expense of the planet’s living systems.

 

In this campaign, your participation will help fund the rollout and marketing of three excellent writers in their first New Myths Press collaborations.  Adebayo Akomolafe is a Professor,  an international speaker, essayist and spiritual adventurer, questioning preconceptions and bending consciousness into a primal, direct-experiencing.  He offers counterintuitive wisdom such as:  “The times are urgent; let us  slow down.”  Jason Hine writes compassionate, powerful “alternative” sermons, frequently as short as a single paragraph, also several paragraphs and pages in length, all of which speak directly to the heart, releasing anxieties and evoking purpose, empathy, sacred attention and active participation in the birthing of a More Beautiful World.  Aliani Shahbano is a modern Sufi poet, distilling the passions of sacred Love and inspiring readers to attention and the presence of sacred beauty and Love in their own daily lives and smallest moments.  These are poems to read and re-read, to share and savor.  Aliani provides contextual introductions to each section of her collection, drawing a comparative  connection to the celebrated lineage her poetry belongs within: that of Rumi, and generations of sacred poets since.

The campaign will also support the rollout and marketing of the newly revised and edited edition of Zack Lehtinen’s novel World of Wounds.  All who previously contributed to the crowdfunding campaign for that novel, or who have purchased World of Wounds in its existing form, will receive their chosen contribution “perks”  for this campaign,  and will also receive a signed copy of the newly-revised edition of the novel World of Wounds, regardless of the level of contribution.  You only have to ask.

What?

New Myths Press:  an independent, print-on-demand imprint collaborating to create attractive trade-paperback and Kindle eBooks.  New Myths publishes novels, collections of essays, poetry, speeches, stories and transcribed interviews/ conversations, and is open to publishing other types of writing as well.  All have in common the commitment to enVisioning ways of living in alignment with this one planet we share, seeking paradigms beyond what Charles Eisenstein has called the “space between stories” where many of us currently  reside:  the old, destructive, still-commonplace stories of infinite growth on a finite, deeply damaged planet, myths of techno-industrial utopian Progress, habits of seeing the earth and its beauties, its habitats and provisions as “resources” to exploit, even if that means polluting earth, air and oceans, razing ecosystems, driving species to extinction and compromising our own children’s ability to live on a survivable planet, much-less to thrive; and the necessary New (Ancient) Stories which embrace the beauty, resilience and sacred privilege of our place as humans, shared voices in the chorus of life, not disconnected, hubristic Masters and Conquerors of  the earth.  We have the ability, option, the sacred Privilege to live as a timeless dance with the beautiful world we have been born-into; but we require New (Ancient) Stories, new Myths, magical and sacred ways of seeing our relationship with our fellow-travelers, because the Core Stories currently being lived into existence have taken humanity and all life on this planet to a dangerous, existential brink. 

Stories have brought us here, and fuel the tremendous momentum of destruction which cannot be denied, and cannot be transcended from within the same stories.

As Albert  Einstein famously  said, “We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.”  This simple truth is also profound, and points squarely to our culture’s core Myths.  Some might say, “Myths?  Those are ancient stories of magic, of pagan Gods, indigenous peoples and ignorant, pre-scientific times, fables and origin stories disconnected from what progress and scientific inquiry have allowed us to access in these post-Enlightenment times.”  Many cannot see, are too ensconced within the fluid of the stories they are swimming in to even acknowledge or understand that they ARE stories—they are today’s myths.  Myths of techno-industrial limitless growth and constant progress, myths of human control over the planet, a myth (to give just one specific example) which says that because our species “discovered” how to split atomic particles, that gives us the right to inflict the mass-destruction of nuclear chain reactions upon fellow human beings and other living things, to “harness” the energy of split atoms without any effective plan to protect the future from the radioactive “waste” such energy “production” manufactures…  And speaking of waste: current myths  tell us that it is a “normal” side-effect of being human to dump mountains of non-degradable plastics into the oceans, to heap carbon, methane and dioxin, synthetic “man-made” chemicals and genetically-modified life-forms  into the air and soil, water and biosphere, where their consequences are widespread, devastating and frequently last centuries in their destructive, disruptive potential.

These are stories our culture tells itself, and these underlying stories support the continuing onslaught, fuel the attitudes and rationalizations which allow us to see wanton destruction of the capacity for life as the normal “business of life.” 

We need new stories—New (Ancient) Myths.

New Myths Press is dedicated to finding, to collaborating with creators of  stories, those able to envision and describe paradigms of understanding and action required for A Future, and to sharing their writings  with you.

Where?

Distribution and participation are international.  New Myths Press titles are available anywhere Amazon operates (thus, can also be ordered by most physical bookstores upon request), anywhere Kindle books can be ordered and accessed.  Many New Myths Press writings will even be available free, online, but we are producing attractive trade-paperback volumes and Kindle eBooks, as affordable as we can make them, because we want you to be able to have these writings in your permanent library, available to read and re-read, share and gift.  New Myths contributors span the planet already—from the U.S. to Nigeria, from Pakistan to the U.K.—and we plan to expand this trend as we grow our community of Visionaries and eccentric communicators of unseen paradigms unfolding in our midst already, but invisible until enunciated.

When?

As we initiate this IndieGogo campaign, the writing described above is written, collected, being fine-tuned and edited, and should be ready for publication by the completion of the crowdfunding campaign in 40 days, or very soon thereafter.  Our goal is to publish by or before the second week in May, and by the end of this IndieGogo campaign we will likely have the publication date established and available.

Why?

For A Future.



Breakdown of how funds will be spent:

$1,000 to establish an SEO campaign using AdEdge online marketing, Westport, CT, including ad designs and upgrade to website and social media presence/ appearance/ effectiveness.

I have done my research, and AdEdge is the best at what it does: they are expert at leveraging the advanced tools of SEO (search engine optimization online), targeting online marketing, in compelling but non-invasive ways, using the latest and best tools of GoogleAds, Facebook and social media generally, making sure the ads we use, our website and social media pages are designed and placed to attract those seeking exactly this sort of "product."  The expansion of New Myths Press will be in the best of hands; your contribution will make the greatest difference possible in spreading this endeavor, these great writers and their urgent words, without access to a large publisher's budget and marketing department.  

$500 for a targeted online marketing campaign using AdEdge online marketing.

$500 for a targeted, specialized social media campaign using AdEdge online marketing.

$300/ month, first 12 months of ongoing online marketing costs:  $3,600

$50 for review/ promotion services from Serious Reading:  serious reading.com

$250 for business expenses, startup

$500 for readings/appearances by New Myths Press writers

 

This totals $6,400, an amount which will establish New Myths Press with all initial advertising and marketing costs for an independent launch campaign, lasting nearly a year in which the Press can establish itself, advertise its authors, expand awareness of this essential offering.  If we do not reach this goal, we will use the funds in as effective and targeted a way possible to maximize and expand existing social media and online presence, upgrading and launching the New Myths Press website and whatever GoogleAds funding achieved will allow us to make and place.  If we exceed this funding goal, all funds will go into further marketing and expansion efforts of New Myths Press, to promote the writers current and future who contribute to its crucial mission of providing urgently needed New (Ancient) Myths-- for A Future.

 

Your Contribution

New Myths Press has reached a key state of potential to grow-into, to identify  and communicate with  its ideal audience.  We will continue finding and publishing  essential writings,  introducing more international contributors into the New Myths Press canon.  Adebayo, Jason and Aliani are exciting, richly expressive, rewarding writers who have demonstrated ongoing commitment to playing their parts in ushering-in the More Beautiful World our hearts imagine and hope to co-create. 

Your contribution, even of the smallest pledge-amount, will play a key, very direct role in allowing New Myths Press to expand the readership these writers deserve, as well as providing an empowering platform for bringing new writers to the attention of those seeking this sort of writing:  urgent, beautiful voices writing their hearts’ vision for A Future.

 New Myths Press will continue gathering an impressive cadre of further writers, poets, storytellers and philosophers, those whose words open New (Ancient) vistas of planetary healing and, just possibly, a thriving future rather than the one currently being approached headlong at maximum velocity.

Supporting New Myths Press is an investment in a better Future for our kids and future generations.  They will need new stories to get through difficult times already encroaching—New Myths to frame the struggle of constructing a More Beautiful World.

THANK YOU for your contribution!  These writers have created beautiful, urgent, vital writing—they deserve a large, appreciative audience.  This campaign represents a commitment to expand that audience with all the targeted, customized power that a well-designed, professional online advertising and social media campaign can provide.  If we make less than our target amount, we will economize the effort with the same intention and pursuit; the compelling opportunity of reaching or exceeding our fundraising goal is that these writers, and the expansion of New Myths Press, will have the opportunity to expand just at the moment that these exciting, important international voices are published.

Support these writers.  Support the search for the New (Ancient) Stories our damaged world needs, which our children and future generations can benefit from our having brought-into the world..  Stories, poems, speeches, essays, sacred insights from everyday people who have tapped-into their concerns, their gift for words, their deepest, most honest and authentic expression of what will be required of our human generation.

New Myths:  for A Future.
