story:
Otkrivanje korespondencije i početak projekta

 

"Iako mnogo sigurno znate o situaciji  ovdje - stvarnost se ne može vidjeti na TV-u ni ispričati. To treba proživjeti i preživjeti. Nisam baš paničar - ali stvarno je grozno. Sad znam šta znači golo preživljavanje za opstanak..." (22/09/1992)

          Prije točno godinu dana, u moje ruke dospio je fascikl pun poštanskih kuverata na kojemu je pisalo "Pisma Sarajevo." U svakoj od kuverata nalazilo se pismo, s nekoliko dodatnih pisama bez svoje odgovarajuće "kućice". Nije trebalo dugo kako bih shvatio da u rukama držim ratnu korespondenciju (Raspad SFRJ - Rat u BiH) između moje bake koja je živjela u Zagrebu te njene sestre, koja je kao Hrvatica odselila u Sarajevo zbog ljubavi, davnih 1960-ih godina. Potonju sestru i njenog supruga, kao i sve ostale građane Sarajeva, rat je zatekao potpuno nespremne. U njihovom slučaju još i na prvoj crti bojišnice (granica između četvrti Hrasno i Grbavica - što je ujedno bila i granica između dviju zaraćenih strana.) Bio je to travanj 1992. godine. Nisu niti slutili što ih čeka u, pokazat će se, jednoj od najduljih opsada u povijesti modernog ratovanja - trajala je punih 44 mjeseci. Gotovo trenutačno, započeo sam proces transkribiranja navedenih pisama, ne shvaćajući u potpunosti ni sam kakav materijal držim u rukama.

"Moj muž je iscjepao jednu stalažu pa tako na drvcima na balkonu u posudi kuham, a granate fijuću okolo. Sve radim u čučećem položaju. Kako peremo sebe i veš - ne pitajte. Još nisam popila nijednu tabletu za smirenje, niti tablete za pritisak. Što je veće pucanje - kod mene manji pritisak!" (22/09/1992)

          Nakon uspješnog transkribiranja (prepisivanja) pisama u pregledni, digitalni format, rezultati su bili sljedeći: punih 130 stranica zapanjujućeg teksta po standardnom formatu (TNR; 12; 1,5). Odmah mi je bilo jasno kako stvar ne smije ostati samo na tome. Oprezno u početku, najbližoj rodbini i prijateljima spomenuo sam svoje namjere. Ohrabren njihovim reakcijama (hvala svima na tome!), odlučio sam dalje kontaktirati i nekoliko institucija, za koje sam smatrao kako bi mogli biti zainteresirani za suradnju na ovom projektu. Moram ponosno reći kako sam i u tom pogledu sa svih strana dobio pozitivne reakcije, a posebnu zahvalu želim iskazati Historijskom muzeju BiH, koji je ponudio svoju punu podršku i suradnju na ovom projektu ( http://muzej.ba/ )

"...jučer je taj mrtav čovjek ležao 2 sata nasred dvorišta. Prvih deset minuta gledali smo kroz prozor, a onda smo nastavili pričati i piti kavu. Tek nakon dva sata je došao oklopni transporter. Bacili su dimnu zavjesu i izvukli i one mrtve i ranjene koji su sami sebi podvezali noge remenjem od hlača i čekali spas. Krvi je bilo malo jer ga je pogodio ravno u srce. Očito neki kvalitetni snajperista. Sad manje bacaju granate, ali su se dali na precizno ubijanje stanovništva." (27/05/1993)

 

O meni

 

          Po struci magistar povijesti (trenutno na poslijediplomskom studiju moderne i suvremene povijesti na Filozofskom fakultetu u Zagrebu), magistrirao sam ni više ni manje nego baš na - korespondenciji ( https://zir.nsk.hr/islandora/object/hrstud%3A1150 .) Upravo mi ta slučajnost daje dodatno samopouzdanje, a donekle i onaj pozitivni osjećaj kako je "suđeno" da se ovaj projekt u potpunosti ostvari.

          Osim navedenog magistarskog rada, iza sebe imam još nekoliko objavljenih radova ( Npr: https://www.hrstud.unizg.hr/_download/repository/Lucius_sv._22_%282017%29.pdf.pdf ) Navedeni radovi primarno su imali znanstveno-istraživački pristup, dok će ovaj projekt biti u svojoj osnovi ipak nešto drugačiji te znatno bliži popularnoj literaturi.

 

Kako i zašto podržati ovaj projekt?

 

          Na žalost, situacija u današnjem nakladništvu, kao i bilo kakva formalna potpora projektima (knjigama) u nastajanju prilično je loša. Iako ne nepostojeća, financijska sredstva koja se mogu očekivati na taj način nisu ni blizu dostatna za dovršiti projekt, a posebno projekt ove vrste. Iz tog razloga odlučio sam se za pomoć obratiti svima Vama. Sredstva koja se prikupe biti će korištena da se pokriju sljedeći troškovi:

  • Trošak putovanja i smještaja na relaciji Zagreb - Sarajevo; Zagreb - Split; Zagreb-Rijeka; Zagreb - Beograd. Na sve navedene lokacije zbog opsega posla i istraživanja biti će potrebno ići u više navrata (intervjuiranje osoba koje se spominju u pismima, prikupljanje foto materijala iz ratnog perioda, fotografiranje bitnih lokacija i njihovog današnjeg izgleda, posjeta raznim institucijama itd...)
  • Honorar za fotografa, ilustratora, lektora i ostale suradnike koji će imati puno posla
  • Troškovi javnog bilježnika i pravnika (autorska prava i osiguravanje teksta)
  • Potencijalno samostalno izdavanje knjige, a svakako u najmanju ruku izrada i printanje nekoliko oglednih primjeraka
  • Svi ostali dodatni, skriveni troškovi koji se, na žalost - uvijek pojave

          Trudio sam se da ukupan iznos koji se potražuje u kampanji zaista bude što je moguće realniji. Nije mi namjera zaraditi na Vama koji iskreno želite podržati ovaj projekt, ali niti skromno odabrati iznos koji neće biti dostatan da se projekt napravi do kraja i kako treba. S obzirom da ovaj projekt radim i s velikom dozom emocija (jer se radi o obiteljskoj ostavštini), trudit ću se da kvaliteta zaista bude na razini. Uz navedena sredstva, ako ih zajedničkim snagama uspijemo prikupiti - vjerujem kako je upravo to i moguće!

 

Što možemo postići?

 

          Ovaj naslov nije slučajno u množini. Bez Vas ovaj projekt ne bi bilo moguće kvalitetno napraviti, a možda čak niti napraviti uopće. Vašim sudjelovanjem omogućit ćete da na svijet dođe knjiga koja na prvo mjesto stavlja običnog čovjeka i običnu obitelj koja se našla u vrtlogu prljavog rata. Knjiga koja opisuje svakodnevnicu preživljavanja u opkoljenom gradu u kojem mjesecima nema osnovnih sredstava za život: vode, hrane, struje, plina, drva, novca...Knjiga koja donosi i opisuje sve poteškoće oko naizgled banalnih stvari - pranja veša, tuširanja, grijanja, kuhanja...Knjiga koja donosi cijene namirnica u ratnom razdoblju, "ratne recepte" za jela, metode preživljavanja prilikom pokušaja odlaska na poštu ili na tržnicu. Ukratko, ovo će biti knjiga koja neće pisati o politici, političarima i ratnoj kronologiji, već o posljedicama te politike koje osjećaju "obični građani."

          Takvih knjiga na tržištu općenito je vrlo malo, a pogotovo ako uzmemo u obzir isključivo primjer opsade Sarajeva. S punim pravom možete biti ponosni što ćete pridonijeti realizaciji ove, istovremeno potresne i tople, knjige koja je prije svega - životna.

 Napomena: navedena knjiga u potpunosti će biti apolitična te ni na koji način neće biti nacionalno obojena. Takva su i pisma (na što sam jako ponosan na svoju tetu) te je moja dužnost i želja da knjiga bude isto takva. Za svakog čovjeka, nevezano koje je nacionalnosti, vjeroispovijesti i boje kože.

 

Izazovi

 

           Kao i kod svakog projekta, velika je vjerojatnost da se u nekom trenutku naiđe na određene prepreke. One mogu biti financijske prirode, ali i razne druge: birokratske, kreativne itd. Moja obaveza je prema svima Vama koji ćete u projektu sudjelovati (ili već na neki način sudjeluju), da se isti uspješno i privede kraju.

          Trudim se te ću se i dalje truditi kako bi sve moguće poteškoće i rizici bili svedeni na minimum. Iako nema garancije kako će ova kampanja biti u potpunosti uspješna, unaprijed se zahvaljujem svima Vama čiju podršku već imam, ali jednako tako i onima čiju podršku ću tek dobiti!

 

Kako još pomoći?

 

Potpuno je razumljivo ako niste u mogućnosti financijski pomoći realizaciju ove knjige. U tom slučaju, projekt možete podržati i na sljedeće načine:

  • Podijelite kampanju na svojim društvenim mrežama (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram...)
  • Proslijedite pojedinačno link za kampanju osobama za koje smatrate da bi ih ovaj projekt mogao zanimati
  • Vašim konstruktivnim savjetom ili informacijom koja bi mogla pridonijeti ukupnoj kvaliteti konačne verzije teksta u knjizi

 

Hvala na podršci!

 

Ukoliko imate dodatnih pitanja, budite potpuno slobodni obratiti mi se direktno na e-mail adresu: kristijan.beric@gmail.com

Važna napomena: kartica MAESTRO nije podržana. Doprinosi se mogu uplatiti isključivo s VISA ili MASTERCARD karticama!

 

//////////////////////////////////////////////

 

The discovery of the correspondence and the start of the project

 

''Although you probably  know quite a lot about the situation here –  the reality cannot be seen on TV or described – the only way to understand it is to experience it and stay alive in the process. I'm not usually the one to spread panic – but it's truly horrendous. Now I know what it means to struggle for existence...'' (09/22/1992)

            Exactly one year ago, I managed to get a folder full of postal envelopes in my hands addsressed as ''Sarajevo Letters''. Each envelope contained a letter with a few additional letters. It did not take long for me to realize that I held a war correspondence (the breakup of Yugoslavia - Bosnian war) between my grandmother, who lived in Zagreb, and her sister who, as a Croat, moved to Sarajevo for love reasons in the 1960s. The latter sister and her husband, as well as all the other citizens of Sarajevo, were caught completely unprepared for war. Moreover, they were being on the front line of the battlefield (the border between Hrasno and Grbavica district – which was also the border between the two belligerent sides.). It was April 1992. They did not even suspect that it was about to happen one of the longest sieges in the history of modern warfare – that lasted full 44 months. Almost instantly, I began the process of transcription, not fully aware what kind of material is in my hands.

''My husband has chopped up one wooden shelf which I used to cook in the pot on the balcony, with the sounds of grenades flying around. Everything I do, I do it crouching. Don't ask us how we wash our clothes or ourselves. I have not managed to take a single sedative or pill for high blood pressure. The bigger the impact of shooting  – the lower  blood pressure I have'' (9/22/1992)

            After successful transcription of letters into a transparent digital format the results were the following: 130 full pages of stupendous text written in standard format (TNR; 12; 1,5). It was perfectly clear to me that it must not stop at this. At the beginning and with discretion, I mentioned my intentions to my closest relatives and friends. Encouraged by their reactions, I decided to contact several institutions which I thought might be interested in cooperation on this project. I am proud to say that I have received positive reactions from everyone and this way, I would like to express my gratitude to The History Museum of Bosnia and Herzegovina, which offered its full support and cooperation on this project. ( http://muzej.ba/ )

''...yesterday, this dead man was lying for 2 hours in the middle of the forecourt. The first ten minutes, we were watching through our windows and then continued to talk and drink coffee. Two hours later, the shielded transporter arrived, threw a smoke bomb and took the dead and the wounded who strapped their legs themselves with belts and waited for the rescue to come. There was a little blood because sniper has hit him straight in the heart. Clearly they were some high quality snipers. The rain grenade intensity is falling, but now they have focused on the more precise way of killing the population.'' (05/27/1993)

 

About me

 

            I have a master's degree in History (currently in the postgraduate study of modern and contemporary history at the University of Zagreb, Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences in Zagreb.) My MA thesis was also based on a transcription of letters ( https://zir.nsk.hr/islandora/object/hrstud%3A1150 ), and it is precisely this coincidence that gives me more confidence and a positive feeling that this project is ‘destined’ to be fully realized.

      Apart from my master’s thesis, I have several other published works (e.g. https://www.hrstud.unizg.hr/_download/repositor...).

     The mentioned works had primarily scientific research approach, while this project will be fundamentally different and much closer to the popular literature.

 

How and why to support this project?

 

             Unfortunately, the situation in today's publishing world, as well as any formal support to emerging projects (books), is not very promising. Though not non-existent, the financial resources that can be expected in this way are not nearly enough to complete the project, especially the project of this kind. For this reason, I have decided to turn to all of you for help. The collected funds  will be used to cover the following costs:

• Travel and accommodation costs on the route: Zagreb-Sarajevo; Zagreb-Split; Zagreb-Rijeka; Zagreb - Belgrade. Due to the range of work and research, all these locations will be visited on multiple occasions (interviewing people mentioned in the letters, collecting old photos, photographing important locations and its present appearance, visits to various institutions, etc.)

• Fees for photographers, illustrators, lecturers and other associates who will have a lot of work

• Notary public and lawyer (copyright and text security)

• Possibility of independent production and issuing of the book

• All other additional, hidden costs that unfortunately always appear

            I've been trying to make the total amount claimed in the campaign as realistic as possible. I do not intend to make a profit, especially on you who really want to support this project. But, I also want to avoid insufficient funds that will leave the project unrealized or unfinished.  Since I am working on this project affected by strong emotions (because it is a family legacy), I will try to make this my prime work. Along with these resources, if we are able to collect them together - I believe it is possible!

 

What can we achieve?

 

            This title is not in plural by mistake. Without you, it would not be possible to make this project a quality work, or at all. Participating in this project, you will bring the world a book that places the common man and ordinary family in the swirl of a dirty war in the first place. A book that describes everyday survival  in a besieged city that lacks the basic means of living : water, food, electricity, gas, logs, money... A book that describes all the difficulties of apparently trivial things such as washing clothes, showering, heating, cooking ... A book that delivers food prices in the war, “war recipes” for meals, methods of survival when trying to go to the post office or at the market. In short, this will not be the book about politics, politicians, and war chronology, but about the consequences of the policy that “ordinary citizens experienced.”

          Number of books similar to this one is limited on the market, if any, especially those  that deal with topic of siege of Sarajevo. With full right, you can be proud of your contribution for the realization of this, at the same time moving and heartwarming  book that concerns primarily with life itself.

          Note: This book, along with letters,  will be fully apolitical and will not be nationally colored in any way. I feel very proud of my aunt and it is my duty and a great desire to make the book in the same tone - for every man, unrelated to the nationality, religion and color of the skin.

 

Challenges

 

            As with any project, it is very likely that at some point there will be certain obstacles. They can be of a financial nature, but also of various others: bureaucratic, creative etc. My obligation is, to all of you who will participate, to succeed and to realize this project.

          I work hard and I will continue to do so to minimize all possible difficulties and risks. While there is no guarantee that this campaign will be fully successful, I would like to thank all of you whose support I already have, but also to future supporters!

 

What else can you do to help?

 

            It is absolutely understandable if you are unable to financially assist in the realization of this book. In that case, you can support the project in the following ways:

• Share a campaign on your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram ...)

• Pass a campaign link to people you think might be interested in this project

• Your advice or information that could contribute to the overall quality of the final version of the text in the book

Thank you for your support!

 

            If you have additional questions, feel free to contact me directly at the e-mail address: kristijan.beric@gmail.com

Moram ponosno reći kako sam i u tom pogledu sa svih strana dobio pozitivne reakcije, a posebnu zahvalu želim iskazati Historijskom muzeju BiH, koji je ponudio svoju punu podršku i suradnju na ovom projektu ( http://muzej.ba/ )
"...jučer je taj mrtav čovjek ležao 2 sata nasred dvorišta. Prvih deset minuta gledali smo kroz prozor, a onda smo nastavili pričati i piti kavu. Tek nakon dva sata je došao oklopni transporter. Bacili su dimnu zavjesu i izvukli i one mrtve i ranjene koji su sami sebi podvezali noge remenjem od hlača i čekali spas. Krvi je bilo malo jer ga je pogodio ravno u srce. Očito neki kvalitetni snajperista. Sad manje bacaju granate, ali su se dali na precizno ubijanje stanovništva." (27/05/1993)

 
O meni
 
          Po struci magistar povijesti (trenutno na poslijediplomskom studiju moderne i suvremene povijesti na Filozofskom fakultetu u Zagrebu), magistrirao sam ni više ni manje nego baš na - korespondenciji ( https://zir.nsk.hr/islandora/object/hrstud%3A1150 .) Upravo mi ta slučajnost daje dodatno samopouzdanje, a donekle i onaj pozitivni osjećaj kako je "suđeno" da se ovaj projekt u potpunosti ostvari.
          Osim navedenog magistarskog rada, iza sebe imam još nekoliko objavljenih radova ( Npr: https://www.hrstud.unizg.hr/_download/repository/Lucius_sv._22_%282017%29.pdf.pdf ) Navedeni radovi primarno su imali znanstveno-istraživački pristup, dok će ovaj projekt biti u svojoj osnovi ipak nešto drugačiji te znatno bliži popularnoj literaturi.
 
Kako i zašto podržati ovaj projekt?
 
          Na žalost, situacija u današnjem nakladništvu, kao i bilo kakva formalna potpora projektima (knjigama) u nastajanju prilično je loša. Iako ne nepostojeća, financijska sredstva koja se mogu očekivati na taj način nisu ni blizu dostatna za dovršiti projekt, a posebno projekt ove vrste. Iz tog razloga odlučio sam se za pomoć obratiti svima Vama. Sredstva koja se prikupe biti će korištena da se pokriju sljedeći troškovi:

Trošak putovanja i smještaja na relaciji Zagreb - Sarajevo; Zagreb - Split; Zagreb-Rijeka; Zagreb - Beograd. Na sve navedene lokacije zbog opsega posla i istraživanja biti će potrebno ići u više navrata (intervjuiranje osoba koje se spominju u pismima, prikupljanje foto materijala iz ratnog perioda, fotografiranje bitnih lokacija i njihovog današnjeg izgleda, posjeta raznim institucijama itd...)
Honorar za fotografa, ilustratora, lektora i ostale suradnike koji će imati puno posla
Troškovi javnog bilježnika i pravnika (autorska prava i osiguravanje teksta)
Potencijalno samostalno izdavanje knjige, a svakako u najmanju ruku izrada i printanje nekoliko oglednih primjeraka
Svi ostali dodatni, skriveni troškovi koji se, na žalost - uvijek pojave

          Trudio sam se da ukupan iznos koji se potražuje u kampanji zaista bude što je moguće realniji. Nije mi namjera zaraditi na Vama koji iskreno želite podržati ovaj projekt, ali niti skromno odabrati iznos koji neće biti dostatan da se projekt napravi do kraja i kako treba. S obzirom da ovaj projekt radim i s velikom dozom emocija (jer se radi o obiteljskoj ostavštini), trudit ću se da kvaliteta zaista bude na razini. Uz navedena sredstva, ako ih zajedničkim snagama uspijemo prikupiti - vjerujem kako je upravo to i moguće!


 
Što možemo postići?
 
          Ovaj naslov nije slučajno u množini. Bez Vas ovaj projekt ne bi bilo moguće kvalitetno napraviti, a možda čak niti napraviti uopće. Vašim sudjelovanjem omogućit ćete da na svijet dođe knjiga koja na prvo mjesto stavlja običnog čovjeka i običnu obitelj koja se našla u vrtlogu prljavog rata. Knjiga koja opisuje svakodnevnicu preživljavanja u opkoljenom gradu u kojem mjesecima nema osnovnih sredstava za život: vode, hrane, struje, plina, drva, novca...Knjiga koja donosi i opisuje sve poteškoće oko naizgled banalnih stvari - pranja veša, tuširanja, grijanja, kuhanja...Knjiga koja donosi cijene namirnica u ratnom razdoblju, "ratne recepte" za jela, metode preživljavanja prilikom pokušaja odlaska na poštu ili na tržnicu. Ukratko, ovo će biti knjiga koja neće pisati o politici, političarima i ratnoj kronologiji, već o posljedicama te politike koje osjećaju "obični građani."
          Takvih knjiga na tržištu općenito je vrlo malo, a pogotovo ako uzmemo u obzir isključivo primjer opsade Sarajeva. S punim pravom možete biti ponosni što ćete pridonijeti realizaciji ove, istovremeno potresne i tople, knjige koja je prije svega - životna.
 Napomena: navedena knjiga u potpunosti će biti apolitična te ni na koji način neće biti nacionalno obojena. Takva su i pisma (na što sam jako ponosan na svoju tetu) te je moja dužnost i želja da knjiga bude isto takva. Za svakog čovjeka, nevezano koje je nacionalnosti, vjeroispovijesti i boje kože.


 
Izazovi
 
           Kao i kod svakog projekta, velika je vjerojatnost da se u nekom trenutku naiđe na određene prepreke. One mogu biti financijske prirode, ali i razne druge: birokratske, kreativne itd. Moja obaveza je prema svima Vama koji ćete u projektu sudjelovati (ili već na neki način sudjeluju), da se isti uspješno i privede kraju.
          Trudim se te ću se i dalje truditi kako bi sve moguće poteškoće i rizici bili svedeni na minimum. Iako nema garancije kako će ova kampanja biti u potpunosti uspješna, unaprijed se zahvaljujem svima Vama čiju podršku već imam, ali jednako tako i onima čiju podršku ću tek dobiti!
 
Kako još pomoći?
 
Potpuno je razumljivo ako niste u mogućnosti financijski pomoći realizaciju ove knjige. U tom slučaju, projekt možete podržati i na sljedeće načine:

Podijelite kampanju na svojim društvenim mrežama (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram...)
Proslijedite pojedinačno link za kampanju osobama za koje smatrate da bi ih ovaj projekt mogao zanimati
Vašim konstruktivnim savjetom ili informacijom koja bi mogla pridonijeti ukupnoj kvaliteti konačne verzije teksta u knjizi

 
Hvala na podršci!
 
Ukoliko imate dodatnih pitanja, budite potpuno slobodni obratiti mi se direktno na e-mail adresu: kristijan.beric@gmail.com
Važna napomena: kartica MAESTRO nije podržana. Doprinosi se mogu uplatiti isključivo s VISA ili MASTERCARD karticama!
 
//////////////////////////////////////////////
 
The discovery of the correspondence and the start of the project
 
''Although you probably  know quite a lot about the situation here –  the reality cannot be seen on TV or described – the only way to understand it is to experience it and stay alive in the process. I'm not usually the one to spread panic – but it's truly horrendous. Now I know what it means to struggle for existence...'' (09/22/1992)
            Exactly one year ago, I managed to get a folder full of postal envelopes in my hands addsressed as ''Sarajevo Letters''. Each envelope contained a letter with a few additional letters. It did not take long for me to realize that I held a war correspondence (the breakup of Yugoslavia - Bosnian war) between my grandmother, who lived in Zagreb, and her sister who, as a Croat, moved to Sarajevo for love reasons in the 1960s. The latter sister and her husband, as well as all the other citizens of Sarajevo, were caught completely unprepared for war. Moreover, they were being on the front line of the battlefield (the border between Hrasno and Grbavica district – which was also the border between the two belligerent sides.). It was April 1992. They did not even suspect that it was about to happen one of the longest sieges in the history of modern warfare – that lasted full 44 months. Almost instantly, I began the process of transcription, not fully aware what kind of material is in my hands.
''My husband has chopped up one wooden shelf which I used to cook in the pot on the balcony, with the sounds of grenades flying around. Everything I do, I do it crouching. Don't ask us how we wash our clothes or ourselves. I have not managed to take a single sedative or pill for high blood pressure. The bigger the impact of shooting  – the lower  blood pressure I have'' (9/22/1992)
            After successful transcription of letters into a transparent digital format the results were the following: 130 full pages of stupendous text written in standard format (TNR; 12; 1,5). It was perfectly clear to me that it must not stop at this. At the beginning and with discretion, I mentioned my intentions to my closest relatives and friends. Encouraged by their reactions, I decided to contact several institutions which I thought might be interested in cooperation on this project. I am proud to say that I have received positive reactions from everyone and this way, I would like to express my gratitude to The History Museum of Bosnia and Herzegovina, which offered its full support and cooperation on this project. ( http://muzej.ba/ )
''...yesterday, this dead man was lying for 2 hours in the middle of the forecourt. The first ten minutes, we were watching through our windows and then continued to talk and drink coffee. Two hours later, the shielded transporter arrived, threw a smoke bomb and took the dead and the wounded who strapped their legs themselves with belts and waited for the rescue to come. There was a little blood because sniper has hit him straight in the heart. Clearly they were some high quality snipers. The rain grenade intensity is falling, but now they have focused on the more precise way of killing the population.'' (05/27/1993)
 
About me
 
            I have a master's degree in History (currently in the postgraduate study of modern and contemporary history at the University of Zagreb, Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences in Zagreb.) My MA thesis was also based on a transcription of letters ( https://zir.nsk.hr/islandora/object/hrstud%3A1150 ), and it is precisely this coincidence that gives me more confidence and a positive feeling that this project is ‘destined’ to be fully realized.
      Apart from my master’s thesis, I have several other published works (e.g. https://www.hrstud.unizg.hr/_download/repositor...).
     The mentioned works had primarily scientific research approach, while this project will be fundamentally different and much closer to the popular literature.
 
How and why to support this project?
 
             Unfortunately, the situation in today's publishing world, as well as any formal support to emerging projects (books), is not very promising. Though not non-existent, the financial resources that can be expected in this way are not nearly enough to complete the project, especially the project of this kind. For this reason, I have decided to turn to all of you for help. The collected funds  will be used to cover the following costs:
• Travel and accommodation costs on the route: Zagreb-Sarajevo; Zagreb-Split; Zagreb-Rijeka; Zagreb - Belgrade. Due to the range of work and research, all these locations will be visited on multiple occasions (interviewing people mentioned in the letters, collecting old photos, photographing important locations and its present appearance, visits to various institutions, etc.)
• Fees for photographers, illustrators, lecturers and other associates who will have a lot of work
• Notary public and lawyer (copyright and text security)
• Possibility of independent production and issuing of the book
• All other additional, hidden costs that unfortunately always appear
            I've been trying to make the total amount claimed in the campaign as realistic as possible. I do not intend to make a profit, especially on you who really want to support this project. But, I also want to avoid insufficient funds that will leave the project unrealized or unfinished.  Since I am working on this project affected by strong emotions (because it is a family legacy), I will try to make this my prime work. Along with these resources, if we are able to collect them together - I believe it is possible!
 
What can we achieve?
 
            This title is not in plural by mistake. Without you, it would not be possible to make this project a quality work, or at all. Participating in this project, you will bring the world a book that places the common man and ordinary family in the swirl of a dirty war in the first place. A book that describes everyday survival  in a besieged city that lacks the basic means of living : water, food, electricity, gas, logs, money... A book that describes all the difficulties of apparently trivial things such as washing clothes, showering, heating, cooking ... A book that delivers food prices in the war, “war recipes” for meals, methods of survival when trying to go to the post office or at the market. In short, this will not be the book about politics, politicians, and war chronology, but about the consequences of the policy that “ordinary citizens experienced.”
          Number of books similar to this one is limited on the market, if any, especially those  that deal with topic of siege of Sarajevo. With full right, you can be proud of your contribution for the realization of this, at the same time moving and heartwarming  book that concerns primarily with life itself.
          Note: This book, along with letters,  will be fully apolitical and will not be nationally colored in any way. I feel very proud of my aunt and it is my duty and a great desire to make the book in the same tone - for every man, unrelated to the nationality, religion and color of the skin.
 
Challenges
 
            As with any project, it is very likely that at some point there will be certain obstacles. They can be of a financial nature, but also of various others: bureaucratic, creative etc. My obligation is, to all of you who will participate, to succeed and to realize this project.
          I work hard and I will continue to do so to minimize all possible difficulties and risks. While there is no guarantee that this campaign will be fully successful, I would like to thank all of you whose support I already have, but also to future supporters!
 
What else can you do to help?
 
            It is absolutely understandable if you are unable to financially assist in the realization of this book. In that case, you can support the project in the following ways:
• Share a campaign on your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram ...)
• Pass a campaign link to people you think might be interested in this project
• Your advice or information that could contribute to the overall quality of the final version of the text in the book
Thank you for your support!
 
            If you have additional questions, feel free to contact me directly at the e-mail address: kristijan.beric@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

It is the mid 1600’s. The Sultan of Hayat has conceived a contest shrouded in mystery. Applicants solely brandishing brawn and bravery are turned away. Those selected will learn the Sultan’s Three Wishes and their remarkable challenges, risking extended isolation in the palace if they fail at any stage. 

So, when Safi, a poor farm boy, receives the Sultan’s approval, he is shocked. The first task appears to be impossible…to retrieve a ruby ring lost in the Igritis river 10 years before.  Will he succumb to his habitual self-doubt and give up? Is he tough or clever enough to survive encountering an alleged giant? Is he resourceful enough to confront a powerful hag and acquire her magical elixir for the Sultan? Safi ignores the risks he will face in the hope that he might win the monetary prize that will save his critically ill aunt and uplift his family. 

During his journey, Safi encounters several extraordinary beings like the genderless sage, Nujoum, who authored the cryptic manuscript in his possession; the giant who fervently guards an enchanted well; the four mystics who are expecting him; and the feared hag who lives in the Mountains of Mist.

Between the incredible completion of each wish, Safi rests for a day in the palace where he meets and falls for the raven-haired princess Jameela. He learns of her progressive ideas, her skills as a swordswoman and her daring to disguise herself as a boy to rescue orphans from hopeless circumstances.

The incredible connections that slowly unfold between Safi, the Sultan, the people he meets and events during his journey rewrite his understanding of life. Through the Three Wishes we learn how destiny, personal choice, and a benevolent universe collaborate to teach us life lessons. Safi is awakened to a world beyond human sight. Learning to cultivate self-trust, his confidence and character mature. Inspirational people and themes are woven throughout.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Your generous contribution will help pay for my chosen professional editor, and for 8- 10 illustrations + Cover.
  • A $20+ contribution will entitle you to the first 5 chapters, and a free copy of the published novel.
  • A $40 contribution entitles you to the first 5 chapters now, and 2 autographed free copies of the published novel.
  • $100 contribution entitles you to 2 autographed books + mention in Acknowledgements.
  • $200 entitles you to a free autographed copy of the novel and an original autographed drawing from novel.
  • Even if I don't reach my goal, the funds will help pay for part of the expenses.

The Impact

I hope to inspire young adults to embrace the values in my book: courage, honesty, family ties, integrity, tuning into and trusting intuition and having self-confidence.

The Princess in the novel is gentle and kind, and she is also a visionary and skilled swords-woman.  She oversees an orphan education program, and encourages girls to learn non-traditional skills like swordplay and others that enable them to be independent wage earners.

The Hero, Safi, on the other hand, is honest, courageous and sympathetic... as well as wise. 

Then there is the ancient gender-less Astrologer, Nujoum.  She/he is a wonderful character who is also a shape-shifter, appearing as a wolf to aid Safi.

Risks & Challenges

This has been long in the making.  I left it after a disappointing event, for 30 years!  When I picked up the threads, the story flowed on its own and morphed into this wonderful adventure.

I don't see that there is great risk, since I did have a UK publisher tell me it has promise!  The Challenge is finding the right Publisher, since I don't want to change the message or characters if possible.

Funding the next batch of expenses is the current challenge - Editor ($2500) and a wonderful illustrator who is excited to work with me (@ $3600).

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute, I would be most grateful if you share my page with your friends, especially those with children!  You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

That one small act may make all the difference.  

Thank you in advance!

story:
So You’ve Been Diagnosed with Cancer and Now You’re In A Panic Handbook is an easy-to-read 75 page booklet with an overview of treatment options, designed to be a great starting point for someone who has been diagnosed with cancer.

I’m Dr. Leyla Ali, I’m a pharmacist and author. I’ve been a pharmacist for 20 years, and I’ve seen people struggle with health conditions, taking medication after medication only to get sicker and sicker. I then took time to learn about holistic and natural healthcare options. When I studied these, I learned that our medical professionals are no longer being trained in the basics of health. As a result, people are struggling for YEARS with their health when they don’t need to; when their health would be much better served with a more holistic and natural approach.

Examples:

  • Diabetes costs on average about $16,000 per patient per year. It is an expensive and very difficult disease to live with, including a strict diet, testing the blood glucose sometimes several times per day, and taking medications regularly. But often diabetes can be reversed in a matter of weeks.
  • Pain often causes patients to struggle and suffer for years. Standard medical doctors often only offer narcotic pain medications and surgery. Addictions to opiates ruin lives, and this is now making headlines and recognized to be an epidemic. Yet there are a lot of ways to relieve pain, including acupuncture, hypnotherapy, muscle releasing techniques, to name a few. Yet these are typically not offered to patients in standard medical care.
  • Cancer is another area where medical doctors only provide a limited perspective and options, including chemotherapy, radiation, and surgery. Yet there is so much more that can help.

So You’ve Been Diagnosed with Cancer and Now You’re in a Panic Handbook includes information about your health and cancer that is not readily available from most medical doctors, including:

  • Nutrition
  • Detoxification
  • Emotional Health
  • Power of the Mind
  • Natural Products
  • Cannabis
  • Cancer Free Lifestyle
  • Treatment Options
  • Theories on Cancer
  • Other Resources

Chemotherapy, radiation, and surgery have become the standard treatment options recommended by medical doctors. The reason is because the pharmaceutical industries have a large influence on the education system of medical doctors and pharmacists.

Read this booklet to:

  • gain an understanding of the many facets of health and cancer,
  • learn about an overview of the different treatment options available to you.
  • understand what you can expect from your medical doctors, as well as their limitations.
  • learn where you can get resources for more information.
  • get information on cancer treatment centers.

What We Need & What You Get

Funds we receive will be for printing costs and promote to get the word out.

Ten percent of proceeds will go to the charitable partners listed below.

We appreciate each and every dollar we receive!

Charitable Partners

Optimum Health Institute is a holistic healing program for over 40 years located in San Diego, California and Austin, Texas. A percentage of proceeds (5%) will go to their OHI Scholarship Fund, which has helped hundreds of people to experience positive healing transformation in body, mind, and spirit including cleansing the body, quieting the mind, renewing the spirit.

Cancer Control Society, a non-profit started almost 50 years ago, distributes literature, books and videos on everything in Alternative Medicine. They also answer many calls each day, giving direction and hope to those in need. CCS representatives attend many conventions and public events throughout the year, distributing information on CCS and the latest findings in Alternative Medicines. Additionally, they hold an Annual Cancer Control Society Convention. A percentage of proceeds (5%) will go to support their mission.

 

The Impact

Cancer has a major impact on society in the United States and across the world. Cancer is a huge problem for many, and a diagnosis causes fear, sadness, anxiety, confusion, and pressure to make quick decisions.

Many people have been affected or know someone who has been; the effects of cancer are widespread. The information in this booklet is not readily available from standard medical doctors.

This information helps people recover from cancer. In addition, it is also a great resource for those who want to take steps to prevent cancer.

About Me

I am a holistic pharmacist and author. I went to pharmacy school to become a healthcare practitioner, but along the way I noticed that something was very wrong. To summarize:

  • I didn’t learn the basics of health in pharmacy school: I didn't learn anything about nutrition, or emotional health, or natural products or herbal remedies. Only drugs.
  • People depended upon me as a healthcare practitioner.
  • When I went beyond pharmacy school and learned about holistic and natural health care, I found people that were able to heal themselves from health conditions that pharmacy customers literally struggle with for years. These include pain, diabetes, addictions, chronic fatigue, depression, neuropathy, and cancer, and many other chronic conditions.

I have made it my mission to help people find more natural and holistic solutions for their health conditions where doctors and drugs fall short.

My first book is Off Balance, The American Way of Health, A Pharmacist’s Perspective on Why Drugs Don’t Work.

And my second book coming out soon is: Off Balance 2, Adventures in a Mail Order Pharmacy

Risks & Challenges

My biggest challenge is marketing and spreading the word. Back in 2012 I finished my first book with a big “Ta Da!” and there were only crickets. Then I started reading and learning about all the things I need to do to market and promote and build my audience.

I’m confident the information in my first book and this booklet are useful and insightful, but the biggest challenge for me is marketing and promotion. I’ve learned a lot since then. So I plan to spread the word by:

  • Reaching out to groups
  • Facebook ads
  • Giving lectures
  • Videos
  • Word of mouth - Asking people to support the cause and please spread the word.
  • And of course this crowdfunding campaign.

Thank you for your support!

Dr. Leyla Ali

So You’ve Been Diagnosed with Cancer and Now You’re In A Panic Handbook is an easy-to-read 75 page booklet with an overview of treatment options, designed to be a great starting point for someone who has been diagnosed with cancer.
I’m Dr. Leyla Ali, I’m a pharmacist and author. I’ve been a pharmacist for 20 years, and I’ve seen people struggle with health conditions, taking medication after medication only to get sicker and sicker. I then took time to learn about holistic and natural healthcare options. When I studied these, I learned that our medical professionals are no longer being trained in the basics of health. As a result, people are struggling for YEARS with their health when they don’t need to; when their health would be much better served with a more holistic and natural approach.
Examples:

Diabetes costs on average about $16,000 per patient per year. It is an expensive and very difficult disease to live with, including a strict diet, testing the blood glucose sometimes several times per day, and taking medications regularly. But often diabetes can be reversed in a matter of weeks.
Pain often causes patients to struggle and suffer for years. Standard medical doctors often only offer narcotic pain medications and surgery. Addictions to opiates ruin lives, and this is now making headlines and recognized to be an epidemic. Yet there are a lot of ways to relieve pain, including acupuncture, hypnotherapy, muscle releasing techniques, to name a few. Yet these are typically not offered to patients in standard medical care.
Cancer is another area where medical doctors only provide a limited perspective and options, including chemotherapy, radiation, and surgery. Yet there is so much more that can help.

So You’ve Been Diagnosed with Cancer and Now You’re in a Panic Handbook includes information about your health and cancer that is not readily available from most medical doctors, including:

Nutrition
Detoxification
Emotional Health
Power of the Mind
Natural Products
Cannabis
Cancer Free Lifestyle
Treatment Options
Theories on Cancer
Other Resources

Chemotherapy, radiation, and surgery have become the standard treatment options recommended by medical doctors. The reason is because the pharmaceutical industries have a large influence on the education system of medical doctors and pharmacists.
Read this booklet to:

gain an understanding of the many facets of health and cancer,
learn about an overview of the different treatment options available to you.
understand what you can expect from your medical doctors, as well as their limitations.
learn where you can get resources for more information.
get information on cancer treatment centers.

What We Need & What You Get
Funds we receive will be for printing costs and promote to get the word out.
Ten percent of proceeds will go to the charitable partners listed below.
We appreciate each and every dollar we receive!
Charitable Partners
Optimum Health Institute is a holistic healing program for over 40 years located in San Diego, California and Austin, Texas. A percentage of proceeds (5%) will go to their OHI Scholarship Fund, which has helped hundreds of people to experience positive healing transformation in body, mind, and spirit including cleansing the body, quieting the mind, renewing the spirit.
Cancer Control Society, a non-profit started almost 50 years ago, distributes literature, books and videos on everything in Alternative Medicine. They also answer many calls each day, giving direction and hope to those in need. CCS representatives attend many conventions and public events throughout the year, distributing information on CCS and the latest findings in Alternative Medicines. Additionally, they hold an Annual Cancer Control Society Convention. A percentage of proceeds (5%) will go to support their mission.
 
The Impact
Cancer has a major impact on society in the United States and across the world. Cancer is a huge problem for many, and a diagnosis causes fear, sadness, anxiety, confusion, and pressure to make quick decisions.
Many people have been affected or know someone who has been; the effects of cancer are widespread. The information in this booklet is not readily available from standard medical doctors.
This information helps people recover from cancer. In addition, it is also a great resource for those who want to take steps to prevent cancer.
About Me
I am a holistic pharmacist and author. I went to pharmacy school to become a healthcare practitioner, but along the way I noticed that something was very wrong. To summarize:

I didn’t learn the basics of health in pharmacy school: I didn't learn anything about nutrition, or emotional health, or natural products or herbal remedies. Only drugs.
People depended upon me as a healthcare practitioner.
When I went beyond pharmacy school and learned about holistic and natural health care, I found people that were able to heal themselves from health conditions that pharmacy customers literally struggle with for years. These include pain, diabetes, addictions, chronic fatigue, depression, neuropathy, and cancer, and many other chronic conditions.

I have made it my mission to help people find more natural and holistic solutions for their health conditions where doctors and drugs fall short.
My first book is Off Balance, The American Way of Health, A Pharmacist’s Perspective on Why Drugs Don’t Work. 
And my second book coming out soon is: Off Balance 2, Adventures in a Mail Order Pharmacy
Risks & Challenges
My biggest challenge is marketing and spreading the word. Back in 2012 I finished my first book with a big “Ta Da!” and there were only crickets. Then I started reading and learning about all the things I need to do to market and promote and build my audience.
I’m confident the information in my first book and this booklet are useful and insightful, but the biggest challenge for me is marketing and promotion. I’ve learned a lot since then. So I plan to spread the word by:

Reaching out to groups
Facebook ads
Giving lectures
Videos
Word of mouth - Asking people to support the cause and please spread the word.
And of course this crowdfunding campaign.

Thank you for your support!
Dr. Leyla Ali

story:
About Darrin Drda

I am an author, designer, illustrator, Art & Design Teacher, a festival goer, and a father. In 2009, I co-founded an astrologically-themed Burning Man camp called Cosmicopia that continues to host lectures and workshops and offer free 15-minute chart readings to the residents of Black Rock City. After six consecutive years on the playa, I became a parent in 2014 and have not been able to return Home, although I hope to do so in 2019, ideally with my preschool daughter in tow!

I have written several non-fiction books for adults, including "The Four Global Truths" and "Overcoming Empire." This will be my third children's book, following "Welcome to Earth" and "A Taste of the Universe" (both offered as perks).

   

You can find out more at my website.

About the Book

As far as I know, Black Rock Kiddie will be the first-ever illustrated children's book about Burning Man!

The book, already written in over 50 rhyming stanzas, is the first-person account of a young girl who goes to Burning Man for the first time with her parents. The girl is never named, though she does eventually receive a playa name. The story follows the classic trajectory of the heroine's journey, involving adventure, challenge, and self-discovery. Along the way, our protagonist meets a host of colorful characters (including a mysterious fairy named Larry ;) who teach her about sharing, creativity, responsibility, friendship, and living joyfully in the present moment.

About the Illustrations

Apart from some minor edits, the writing is finished. I am very excited to now turn my attention to the illustrations, which will be done in a unique style that combines elements of tattoo art, vintage circus and carnival posters, old-school animation, Victorian grunge, and steampunk. I would love to make the book as visually rich as Burning Man itself! So far, I have completed the first few pages, which are featured in the video above. Here is another example:

About the Funds

Tech stuff: My ancient MacBook is on its last legs, so I will need to buy a new computer, which will necessitate a new subscription to Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, etc). Fortunately, as a teacher, I qualify for a substantial discount!

Art Supplies: I have access to lots of supplies at work, but unfortunately I will be working on this project on my off days. So I will need to buy paper, paints, pens, and a few other staples.

Living Expenses: In order to devote as much time as possible to this project, I have reduced my teaching schedule to half time, which of course means half pay. So I will need to supplement my income while working on the illustration, design, and promotion of the book over the next four months, approximately.

Rough Breakdown:

  • Refurbished or used Mac laptop: ~$1500
  • Annual subscription to Adobe CC (Educational Rate): $240
  • Art Supplies: ~$100
  • Living expenses: ~$1000/mo x 4 months projected = $4000
  • Incidentals, like postage for the perks: $150

The Perks

In exchange for your kind contributions, I am pleased to be able to offer some awesome gifts in return, including copies of the book, copies of my previous books, temporary tattoos (which play a substantial role in the book), and the chance to have your Burning Man art project or art car featured in one of the illustrations!

Please see the perks column for details.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not currently able to make a financial contribution, please consider giving a moment of your time by sharing a link to this page with your friends on Facebook and other social media platforms. Thank you in advance for helping to spread the word!

Also, if you happen to know anyone in the publishing business who might be interested in taking this book to the next level, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Gratitude and Love!

story:
This is Kay-Tee Olds, food truck entrepreneur and co- curriculum-developer of the mobile food entrepreneurship program at Madison College in Wisconsin.  

 

THE BOOK

Fueling a Food Truck is a 150+ page business guide that aims to help aspiring entrepreneurs navigate the startup landscape of the mobile food industry. It is:

  • A cost-efficient alternative to a traditional entrepreneurship course.
  • A supplemental resource throughout their entrepreneurship journey. 
  • A road map for bringing ideas to market.
  • A guideline for on-going growth and evaluation.

 

PURPOSE

Many people are drawn to the mobile food industry due to its relatively low barriers to entry and shifting consumer demands in recent years. However, the diverse backgrounds of food truck owners—many of whom are minorities or those without formal business education—and the lack of available resources surrounding the mobile food industry, have created a need for a text that is targeted and current. 

Fueling a Food Truck demonstrates academic rigor and applicable real-world scenarios to help aspiring entrepreneurs of mobile food vending businesses decide whether to launch and if so, to prevent some of the most common mistakes. It examines the opportunities and threats of the food truck industry while helping readers to apply the material to their pragmatic planning process.

Filled with personal anecdotes from Kay-Tee and other participants in the mobile food industry and the food industry at-large, Fueling a Food Truck presents a more nuanced and holistic perspective that aims to educate based on long-term outlooks.
 

YOUR HELP

Your support will help keep the book price accessible for entrepreneurs who may soon serve up their street fare in your community and throughout the country! 

Project cost breakdown:

  • Ebook and paperback publishing: $1499
  • Copy edit ($0.02/word): $910
  • ISBN (x2 for ebook and paperback at $85 each): $170
  • Marketing: $876
  • Indiegogo fees (5%): $173

Total: $3628

Risks & Challenges

Currently, I am working with my editor to make sure the book is accessible and easy to read for audiences of diverse backgrounds while meeting the academic standards of educational institutions. 

As always, unpredictable issues with layout design, printing and shipping may occur, especially when making a book with images and flowchart inserts. However, my publishing team has the experience and confidence to make sure you get a beautiful and high-quality book.

I will continue to provide updates on the production process as the books are being printed and shipped to me and mail out the books as soon as I receive them to minimize delays.

For those who made pledges for individual sessions and/or group workshop, there will be uncertainties surrounding scheduling and traveling logistics, but I will make the best efforts to accommodate your schedules and I appreciate your flexibility.

While you are waiting for the book to be printed, please visit www.mobilecontessa.com/fueling-a-food-truck for entrepreneurship resources and book launch updates.

Your support is deeply appreciated. Please help me spread the word and bring this project to life.

THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

We've created something that's never been done before.  We call it a "BookVerse".  And its owned and driven by storytellers.

Star Wars, Star Trek, Conan... those are trademark "franchises" owned and managed by giants.  Not that they aren't kind of cool, but they are managed by corporations that hire writers to pump out stories where nothing ever really happens.  Where there's no danger, no change... no consequences.  In short, nothing to get excited about.   Sure, the characters go on adventures and villains die, but, we all know that earth-shattering game-changers rarely happen.

It's a reality that many brand worlds are driven by sales numbers and not what's best for the story. Decisions are made, not because they serve the story, raise the stakes, or give the reader an unforgettable adventure that'll change them forever and leave them tattooed with the marks of a great tale. 

We, Wonderment Media, want to make "story" the building block of our DNA. 

We're looking to take our characters and our world and break it for your amusement.  We're looking to wreck stuff and let you have fun reading it.  We're building something... and we're tearing it apart.  It's called The Apocalypse Weird.  It's run by writers so writers and readers can finally do what they've wanted to do regardless of some "bottom line" that saves us from the consequences of great storytelling.  What we're doing is  dangerous, but we think that's where the fun is.  

What is the Apocalypse Weird?  It's Lost meets the End of Civilization.  It's the Island in the middle of suburbia coming apart at the seams of reality.  It's kinda like King's Dark Tower, but a whole lot stranger.  But, most importantly, it's a story for readers and lovers of books like something that's never been done before.  

It's dangerous, thrilling and it's definitely Weird.  We even have a FREE introductory novel called Apocalypse Weird: The Red King to get you started.

But don't worry, we're not just making it up as we go.  We have a five year story arc that's going to take our heroes, and villains, on a very strange and WYRD adventure.  And at the end, it will resound in a stunning conclusion that will leave its mark on the publishing world, and you the reader.  

In February of 2015, Wonderment Media did something that, as far as we know, had never been done before. As a start-up publishing company, we launched 5 weird post-apocalyptic novels (all written in the same Apocalypse Weird brand universe, but by different authors) on the same day. 

With our launch novels we built a Sandbox, a carefully orchestrated collection of overlapping possibilities, where readers can come in and watch the adventures of small bands of survivors as they attempt to survive the catastrophic events taking place.  Here, the machinations of 88 demons will tear them apart, and bring them together, forging a whole new reality within the Apocalypse Weird.  

We've already put out 9 full novels, and we're launching two more books a month for the next five years!  As of right now we have over 571 reviews on Amazon, collectively, and books 11 and 12 are in final production now.

Everything the industry has said can't be done, Wonderment Media and our growing stable of talented authors is doing.

They said an author can only write one GOOD book a year - well, that is nonsense. They said readers don't want "different," and that a MARVEL-like connected world could not work in literature. They said "releasing books like TV producers release episodes will never work." 

But, we've done it just that -- and we need your help to keep on doing it.

We've proven the concept, now we want to take it to the next level.  We want to push out more books, hire more writers, pay artists, editors, and professionals, and deliver the absolutely best literary entertainment out there.

With  10 books out to date, not only are readers embracing a new and exciting way to receive their kind of stories, but they are eager for more. 

So now we want to fund our Apocalypse Weird project through the end of the year!

This means we'll be handing out more writing contracts, paying indie artists, freelance editors, and more.  We'll be giving readers more good stuff to read, one Apocalypse at a time.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our goal is to raise $10,000 as a bare minimum to help us expand and meet expenses as we grow. This means paying our super-talented cover artist and our awesome editors. And it means more money for marketing and promoting our books!
  • To get to our goal, we're offering a bunch of pretty awesome stuff including  signed books and posters, special edition prints, limited run hard backs, and even more great perks.
  • We have every expectation of meeting our funding goal, but even if we don't, the funds we do raise are going to operating expenses, promotion, and marketing. 
We're going to make this concept work, and believe me, our way is the way publishing will be done in the future!

The Impact

So many of the stories we see or read on television and in books are driven by committees within big Corporations using spreadsheets and computers that focus only on the bottom line.  Big corporations don't always think of the story and the reader first.  These writer-gobbling giants too often make crucial storytelling decisions based on "data" or business decisions that have nothing to do with the story or what the readers want out of their fiction.  

The Apocalypse Weird is driven by writers who are storytellers.  We think that makes for better storytelling that won't pull punches and won't hesitate to go places other corporations might be to afraid to go.  The impact will be incredible within the books, the Sandbox we're developing, and the publishing community as writers finally take back the reins of their stories that are too often surrendered in the name of corporate greed.

Wonderment is proving that developing new authors while demanding high production quality, rapid pacing, and fair contracts CAN and SHOULD be the new path for publishing.

Risks & Challenges

The Challenge for us is to continue to produce high quality manuscripts that look and read like something the The Big Five Publishers would be proud to distribute.  We believe that you get what you pay for. 

To that end we've hired editorial staff, professional formatters, and the THE BEST cover and interior artists.  We've paid them what they're worth instead of trying to get by with less.   Take a look at our launch books and check out the reviews - our high standards are definitely paying off.  

But to do this requires enough cash flow to keep all of this going in between earnings checks from Amazon and other retailers.  We know it will take a year until our cash flow balances.  We are raising money so we can continue producing top quality books.

We have the talent, the stories, the method, and the pipeline to make this effort work -- we're doing it right now.  We need your help to keep doing it.

Other Ways You Can Help

We don't just want to make some money.  We want to entertain you.  Take our free novel and give it an honest read.  We've even hidden some fun little surprises within, so make sure to follow the rabbit trails you find.  Then talk about it and share it. Also, meet us over at Apocalypse Weird on Facebook and talk with the actual writers.  Tell them which characters you like and what you'd like to see happen.  Encourage them because writing is a lonely business.  We even have a place where you might write a little fan fiction if you're so inclined... to get caught up in the action.  

In short, come join the movement to build the next BIG thing in Digital Publishing.  Come go where no readers or writers have ever ever gone before.  Come and explore the Apocalypse Weird. 

And remember to share this fundraiser! So many people would love to help build this crazy new thing if only they knew it existed!

    Other Ways You Can Help We don't just want to make some money.  We want to entertain you.  Take our free novel and give it an honest read.  We've even hidden some fun little surprises within, so make sure to follow the rabbit trails you find.  Then talk about it and share it. Also, meet us over at Apocalypse Weird on Facebook and talk with the actual writers.  Tell them which characters you like and what you'd like to see happen.  Encourage them because writing is a lonely business.  We even have a place where you might write a little fan fiction if you're so inclined... to get caught up in the action.  
In short, come join the movement to build the next BIG thing in Digital Publishing.  Come go where no readers or writers have ever ever gone before.  Come and explore the Apocalypse Weird. 
And remember to share this fundraiser! So many people would love to help build this crazy new thing if only they knew it existed!

story:
Are you interested in the Theory of Relativity of Albert Einstein & Astro-Physics? Would you like to see it in a science-fiction book? Would you like to see it all bound together with the ancient Kabbalah? And see it all through the eyes of Destiny ? If so, ME TOO!

Hi, my name is Keren Naor, and I'm an aspiring author. I need your help in launching my book! 

The book is a matrix of several areas of interest, primarily:

1) The Theory of Relativity of Albert Einstein & Astro-Physics,

2) Kabbalah, 

3) Destiny & Faith.

The main character of the book, the heroine, shall have a strong Feministic approach to life & will be a brave character (or forced to be brave by circumstance...you decide....). She will be amazing, especially in dealing with our world as it is today! She & her life are at the center of the book, together with the unique events she goes through in her life. I will mention, though, that I intend the heroine to be accompanied by some special characters and an intriguing story-line.

Why Do I Need Your Help?

Currently, I am an aspiring author. In order to make the book excellent, I need time to finish the extensive research needed for it. But as you can guess, I have bills to pay & rent.

These days, I am supported by unemployment benefits, which will soon end. I really wish that I could sit down and complete all of the research needed for the book with a quiet mind, being free to be highly creative and calm. For that I need to be free from the day to day financial worries.

That's where you come in! I really hope that you can appreciate that this will be a most exciting sci-fi book, intended for those young at heart, who like science and are open minded.

I wish that you could see the beauty of the book as I see it, and let me have a chance at writing it with all of my energy, mind and heart. I promise you won't regret it! I am an excellent writer, and I intend to make this book the peak of my writing!

I plan to publish the book within one to two years.

Do support me! I think that you'll love the perks I'm offering too.

THANKS!!!

More Details: What I Need & What You Get

The financial goal for this project was calculated the following way: it is the amount I need for my living expenses for two years; also the money is intended to pay for editing the book & adding professional  drawings to it.

The goal of the project was calculated in a very conservative way i.e. according to my basic expenses in the month of April 2015. The expenses are not supposed to change very much in the coming two years. Basically, they’re supposed to pay for my rent, taxes, and credit cards, in addition to groceries. And as mentioned, I intend to have the book edited, and get professional drawings for the book, at least for the beginning of each chapter.

I really hope that you will support my goal! I absolutely know that being an author is my life’s destiny…

You can expect to get your perk within one to two years. I will do a fabulous job on the book, & on the extensive research needed for it. I truly believe that my idea is really unique. I keep the content of the book a bit mysterious in order to protect my ideas & copyrights. I hope that you can identify with that.

You could really enjoy the perks I’m offering, and have a piece of history in your hand: From having a PDF copy of the book, to owning a printed copy of it; from getting a personalized Thank-you note from me, to enjoying a Skype conversation with me on the book & its writing process… And the last but not least perk, is perhaps the most interesting one: having your OWN NAME appear in the book as a character (I still don't know exactly which one) (you'll appear in ALL the copies of the book!).

I just want to mention, that even if the project’s goal is not met, I will write the book anyway, for those who believed in me, only it will be much harder, and might take longer. So please, MAKE MY DREAM COME TRUE!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

First of all, I want to thank in advance to all of my contributors! This is my life’s work, and it’s very important to me!

And even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank-You and I look forward to you being a reader of my book!!!
