story:
Everyone knows A Christmas Carol. It’s a mainstay of every Christmas season. Scrooge has been played and parodied on the screen and on the stage - even the Muppets have their own rendition! Every Christmas Scrooge is redeemed and we get a warm glow when Tiny Tim says, “God bless us, everyone.” 

What few people realize is how truly creepy this story is. Dickens opening words are:

Marley was dead to begin with.

Creepy, right? That’s why I have kept it for this retelling.

Story Synopsis

Ebenezer Scrooge: Ghost Hunter expands the original text of Charles Dicken’s classic with all-new scenes of malicious ghosts, soul devouring wraiths, deadly doppelgangers and other terrors from the netherworld. Our story opens seven years after Marley’s violent death. Ebenezer Scrooge has given up ghost hunting and embraced an inevitable slow death by alcohol poisoning.  When the spectre of his deceased partner appears to him on Christmas Eve, Scrooge learns that he must face three Ghosts – one who will try to help him, one who will try to harm him and one that cannot be killed.

In a story that spans a lifetime of torment, Scrooge must face the demons of his past and his failures in the present in order to prevent the horror that is his future. The stakes for Scrooge’s soul have never been higher than in this wicked retelling of the classic, A Christmas Carol.

Why Crowdfund?

Writing this book has been enormously fun and I hope that you enjoy reading it, too!

I’ve decided to publish independently but need some help funding the last touches. The funds raised from this indiegogo campaign will be used to get the book properly illustrated and published (all writing is complete). Campaign ends May 6!

Indiegogo EXCLUSIVE

Only Indiegogo contributors of $50 or higher will get a special edition copy with full color illustrations and a unique cover! This special edition will NEVER be available to the general public!

Stretch Goal

$10,000 – we produce an audiobook!

About the Authors

Jaqueline Kyle is a ghost writer and native Californian. She enjoys running and international travel. A typical day will find her tapping away on her computer at the local coffee shop. Her biggest ambition for this book is to see it made as a movie. Maybe that will be the next campaign!

Charles Dickens was one of the most prolific and influential writers of his time. He started writing A Christmas Carol to bring attention to the plight of the poor and uneducated children of London. That story eventually morphed into the classic tale of redemption.

#ScroogeHuntsGhosts
Media Kit

***All perks associated with the Great Dickens Fair are solely the responsibility of the author who is not affiliated with the Great Dickens Christmas Fair except as a customer.

story:
In Short

Hi. My name is Timothy Taylor and I'm a writer and an artist. I've written all kinds of things, from articles on cooking and travel and art to web content for companies such as eBay and StubHub. My passion, however, is fiction. Recently, I released my debut novel called The Singer, an epic adventure set in a fantastic world built  on music. 

It's just the first in The Last Singer Trilogy, and I have a golden opportunity to write the second book in the series and promote it. That's where you can help. 


How You Can Help

For the next 6 to 12 months I'll be interning with Defining Moments, a ministry devoted to helping people discover their calling and achieve their goals. I'll be serving as a staff writer, and in exchange I'll be receiving one-on-one coaching to market my work and expand my platform and audience as a writer. 

I'll also be living in Dallas during that time, which will provide me with several opportunities to network across multiple industries. This season will also give me a chance to focus on my writing and complete The Seer, the sequel to The Singer.

I just need to raise support to cover day-to-day, general living expenses and to help me promote the book and donate copies. For every $100 the campaign raises, I can give one copy each of The Singer and The Seer to a library or school.

I don't expect something for nothing so I want offer some fun perks to make it worth your while. I'm offering things like advanced copies of The Seer and a short story that you'll get access to before anyone else does. I've also got some original art work in the mix and an opportunity to see your very own name in print. 

Every donation will also be tax deductible.

The Impact

The Last Singer Trilogy tackles subjects of faith in an alternate world. 

I've wanted to write uplifting books for kids and young adults for some time. I spent several years as a teacher and I love the wonder and joy with which children approach the world. There's a lot out there vying for their attention, and some of it can be pretty bleak and dark. I wanted to write a story where young adults can see that they have purpose and destiny, something uniquely beautiful that is theirs to accomplish, and show them God who loves them unconditionally. 

The Singer has gotten an overwhelmingly positive response. Readers tell me how much it made them think, challenged them, and inspired them.




Here's the cover description for The Singer.
Darkness is spreading, and the world needs a Song. 
Cephra A'Fallel was born to privilege as a daughter of one of Aryam’s noble houses. Her pampered life, however, is little more than a gilded cage of which she has faint hope of escape. Her only solace is her music, her unique gift that relieves the tedium of her regimented existence. Though her golden voice enchants all who hear it, Cephra’s singing of an ancient text reveals its true power. 
She is a Singer. More than a natural talent, her Gift is an echo of the power that called the universe into being – the power of Olam, who gave life to all things. The scriptures tell of the Singers, and of the Sundering, a terrible moment when the world was divided in two and Aryam was cast into shadow. For untold millennia, faithful Singers maintained the balance between the worlds, calling forth light and keeping the darkness at bay. Now, in an age of peace and prosperity, the Singers are fading into myth and Olam is forgotten. 
A dark and alluring cult is gaining influence over the nobility. Living shadows are stalking the halls of power, threatening to plunge all of Aryam into eternal night. 
Cephra finds herself at the threshold of an ancient, invisible war. The scriptures foretell the time of the last Singer, who will battle the darkness and challenge the Sundering itself. As she comes to terms with her destiny, Cephra’s voice will reveal a hidden world more terrifying and more wondrous than she could have ever imagined.


Risks & Challenges


The biggest risk is time, if I don't raise the funds then it takes that much longer to finish this project. I have a limited window in which to work, and I want to make the most of the opportunity I've been given. That and a lot of folks are chomping at the bit to find out what happens to these characters. 
I have complete control over the publishing process, and I put my work through a lengthy and layered process of critique and revision to make sure that what is being presented to the public is work worthy of their money and time. 



Other Ways You Can Help

Share the campaign with your friends and anyone you think might be interested. Whatever you can do, you have my heartfelt gratitude. Thank you for your support!

story:
English version of the video is here : 

 

À propos

Je suis Audrey Desrosiers, intervenante en zoothérapie depuis 2008 et je partage mon quotidien avec les enfants qui parfois doivent relever certains défis. J'ai eu l'idée de développer cette histoire comme outil d'intervention alors que le "trop-cool-pré-ado" avec qui je travaillais ne parvenait pas à surmonter ses difficultés et à trouver des solutions avec les outils disponibles. L'histoire a fonctionné! 

 

About 

I'm Audrey Desrosiers, I have been an Animal-Assisted Therapist (AAT) since 2008 and I share my day to day with children who are often confronted with rather particular challenges. I created this story as an intervention tool when dealing with a pre-teen client who's budding rebellious nature was preventing him from successfully using the tools that had been put at his disposal.
The story worked!

 

Au cours des deux dernières années, Élias et les doigts magiques a été au coeur de plus d'une centaine d'ateliers que j'ai offerts dans les multiples bibliothèques de Montréal et un peu partout au Québec. Les enfants sont unanimes...ils adorent l'univers d'Élias et se reconnaissent en lui. Leur rétrospection est spectaculaire (ne le sont-ils pas toujours, spectaculaires?)

En plus d'être touchante, drôle, accessible et actuelle, elle est également pédagogique et empreinte de sensibilité. Elle parvient à ouvrir tendrement une porte vers le monde intérieur des enfants.

Throughout the past two years, I have given over a hundred workshops using this story throughout a multitude of libraries in Montreal and all around Quebec. The reaction from children (and in most cases their parents) was unanimous, they adored Elias, and without fault they all fell in love with the tale; they saw something of themselves in him. And their retrospections were spectacular(Aren't they always).

Not only is the story touching, funny, accessible, and current, it is also pedagogical, sensible and manages to gently open a door to the interior universe of children.

 

Approuvée par les professionnels, parents conquis!

Dans le cadre de ma profession, j'ai eu la chance de côtoyer des familles extraordinaires ainsi que des collègues attentionnés qui, dans leur milieu respectif, l'ont mise à l'essai. Les commentaires sont plus que positifs. Le livre, à être publié dans les deux langues (français et anglais), a réellement été apprécié. Élias est donc maintenant prêt à voir le jour officiellement!

 

Approved by Professionals and Parents Alike

Throughout my practice I've had the chance to meet some wonderful people, families of patients and colleagues alike, who all in their respective fields, tried the story and returned to me with extremely positive feedback and results. Elias is now officially ready to be unveiled to the world.

 

Mon parcours

Diplômée du monde des arts et de la musique, j'ai terminé mon cursus scolaire en zoothérapie en 2008. Créative et grandement motivée, je démarre mon entreprise "Au bout du Museau". La zoothérapie n'en était alors qu'à ses balbutiements. Aussi, m'investis-je corps et âme dans le développement, l'expansion et la reconnaissance de celle-ci.

En 2010, forte de mes deux années de succès et d'efforts, je codémarre la clinique Un Museau vaut mille maux. Ma passion brûlante pour les enfants et les défis quotidiens qu'ils rencontrent m'a poussé vers l'enseignement pendant trois ans en plus d'offrir de nombreuses formations et ateliers, de développer leur contenu et bon nombre d'outils d'intervention. Il s'en suit des mois et des années de labeur pour constituer une équipe du tonnerre et parfaire mes connaissances, ajoutant ainsi plusieurs cordes à mon arc. J'ai aussi eu la chance en 2016 de mettre à l'épreuve cette histoire ailleurs dans le monde, confirmant ce que je savais déjà;  ici ou là-bas, les enfants restent les mêmes, leurs besoins, leurs désirs... les yeux brillants!

 

My Career Path


I graduated from the world of Arts and music, and obtained my AAT diploma in 2008.
Creative and  highly motivated, I founded Au bout du Museau. At the time, AAT in Canada was still in its infancy, I dedicated every waking moment to the propagation and development of my company.

In 2010, after two years of hard work, I found a business partner and we co-founded Un Museau vaut mille maux. Throughout this period, my passionate interest in children's special needs and their daily challenges led me to teaching for a period of 3 years where after having extensively studied in the field, I perfected and innovated a variety of classes and formations pertaining to special needs education. Following this, I created a star team of employees and coworkers, constantly expanding the clinic and refining my knowledge. In 2016 I had the chance to test run my Elias and the magic fingers story elsewhere in the world, the results were as I had expected, wherever I went, the children were still children, their needs... their desires....and that twinkle in their eyes!

 

Le projet

 Maintenant, "Élias et les doigts magiques" a besoin de votre soutien pour voir le jour!

Je désire que ce magnifique univers, cette histoire, prenne vie dans vos familles et dans vos écoles. Non seulement le livre sera-t-il publié, mais les figurines d'Élias et de la petite fée "pas fine" seront également au rendez-vous!  

Et si vous rêvez avec moi, vos jeunes pourront également s'endormir avec le livre audio. Et pourquoi ne pas viser la publication de cette histoire en diverses langues? Il n'en tient qu'à vous!!!

 

The Project

Now, "Elias and the magic fingers" needs your support so it can see the day!

I want my universe to come alive, I want Elias to spring to life and take up residence in the hearts of your families, of your schools, and not only as litterature; Elias and his little faerie sidekick will also have a physical form!

And if you dream as I do, your children will be able to fall asleep listening to the audio book.
And while we're at it, why not have this story translated into multiple languages. The choice is yours!

 

L'équipe, LA rencontre ! 

Plus de deux ans se sont écoulés, à évoluer dans l'univers d'Élias et à attendre LA rencontre professionnelle, la rencontre "nucléaire", qui permettra de donner vie aux traits, à l'imaginaire, à la vision d'Élias, celle qui lui revient... et 2016 me l'a offert! 

Par les mains magiques d'Émilie Huot le rêve devient enfin réalité! Nos deux univers et nos sensibilités artistiques se complètent à merveille. Notre vision de l'enfant et nos valeurs communes ont finalement donné lieu à cette magie tant espérée! Nos rêves sont nombreux, nos créations naturelles et nécessaires. C'est le "match" parfait! 

The Team

I had spent many years searching vainly for that special person who's vision was similar to mine, someone with whom the magic could happen, someone who's imagination could conjure up images to go with the words, and this year, I found her.

It is through the magical hands of Emilie Huot that the dream will spring to life!
Our two universes and artistic sensibilities meld seemlessly together as though it were meant to be, our views on children, and our values, everything, like nuclear fission, it is springing to life, naturally, and necessarily, it is truly the perfect match!​

 

Émilie Huot 

Crayons à la main dès son jeune âge, remplissant les marges de ses cahiers d'écoles de dessins, Émilie complète un parcours académique en arts visuels, incluant quelques volets en architecture et design. Une quête afin de rendre une vision du monde, à sa façon.

Fascinée depuis toujours par le monde du vivant, elle explore de multiples médiums. Depuis quelques années après l'arrivée de son fils, Émilie se concentre sur l'art du tatouage qui lui permet de réaliser un rêve; illustrer à temps plein.

Et aujourd'hui le rêve continue ! 

/ 


She spent her childhood; crayons in hand; filling up the margin of her school books with artwork. Searching for the tools too portray the world through her eyes, 
Emilie completed her studies at an academy of visual arts, she also studied in architechture and design.
She has always been fascinated with the world of the living, and has explored multiple artistic mediums.
Since the arrival of her son in her life, Emilie has concentrated her time on being a tattoo artist 
in order to her to make her dream of illustrating full time a reality. 
And so the dream continues!

 

Le budget / The Budget 


Le livre: correction/révision, illustrations, sérigraphie, mise en page, graphisme, recherche de maison d'édition ou recherches légales pour sa création, recherche d'imprimeur, impression des livres, emballage pour distribution, distribution.
Produits dérivés (accessoires livre (tatouage, ongles), figurines et emballage de ces produits): conception originale, recherche d'imprimeur et de fabricant, conception/graphisme pour production ou publication, illustrations, correction/révision, recherches légales et droits d'auteur/copyright, test de production, impression ou fabrication selon le produit dérivé, emballage des produits, distribution.
Le livre audio: conception, recherche pour sa production et studio, production, postproduction, Conception de l'emballage, illustrations, correction/révision, recherches légales/droits d'auteur/copyright/guilde, recherche d'imprimeur, impression, emballage du livre audio, distribution.
Divers: processus de traduction en espagnol, offrir les ateliers animés.

*Une partie de la somme amassée sera consacrée à offrir des ateliers, animés à partir de cette merveilleuse histoire, dans les écoles, les classes et les centres qui ne pourraient pas s'offrir ce genre d'atelier pour quelques raisons que ce soit. Nous vous suggérons également de communiquer avec nous si vous souhaitez inscrire votre groupe pour voir cet atelier prendre vie dans votre milieu. Dites-nous pourquoi et en quoi cet atelier serait bénéfique pour vos cocos. Les détails de l'organisation vous seront communiqués ultérieurement et personnellement si votre candidature est retenue. 

*A portion of the funds raised will be dedicated to offering an animated workshop activity based on the story in schools, classes, and centers who, for whatever reasons it may be, cannot afford it.  We also encourage you to contact us if you would like to register your group to recieve this activity. Tell us why this activity would be beneficial to your group, and details regarding organisation will be personally communicated to you if you are withheld.

 

Les paliers/The Phases 

13 475$ 

Nous avons besoin de réunir cette somme pour réaliser intégralement notre projet tel qu'il est illustré dans le graphique précédent. L'aventure d'Élias est officiellement lancée ! Le livre sera publié, les figurines ainsi que les accessoires en lien avec l'histoire seront fabriqués. Une partie de la somme amassée servira à offrir l'atelier d'animation dans une des classes qui ne pourraient pas se l'offrir autrement.

We need this amount to produce the basic project, as illustrated in the preceeding graph. With this amount Elias' adventure can officially begin! The book, figurines, and accessories surrounding the story will be produced. A part of this amount will also go towards providing animated workshops in schools that do not otherwise have the funding to pay for it.

 

16 500$ 

Si vos contributions nous permettent d'amasser cette somme, en plus de tout ce qui est indiqué précédemment, nous pourrons produire le livre audio, payer la postproduction et la fabrication. Nous pourrons également ajouter la traduction en espagnol pour rejoindre encore plus d'enfants!

If your contributions allow us to reach this amount, on top of everything else that has previously been mentionned, we can produce the audio book and pay for the post production and creation of it. We can also add a spanish version so as to offer Elias ' story to as many children as possible.

20 000$ 

Si votre soutien s'enflamme et que nous atteignons cette somme, en plus de tout ce qui a été énuméré aux deux autres paliers précédents, nous pourrons à la fois produire le livre audio en plusieurs langues et traduire le livre dans plusieurs autres langues, puis offrir le livre aux enfants qui participent à l'atelier animé d'Élias!

If we are lucky enough for your support to attain this sum, on top of everything we listed previously, we will be able to offer the audio book in a variety of languages, and as well as having the book itself translated, we will be able to give the book to children who attend the animated workshop!

 

Étapes de production / Production

Compléter les illustrations, les révisions, les corrections, la mise en page et le graphisme et les recherches légales et de production requises/ Complete illustrations, revisions, proof-reading,  page set-up, final design as well as all required legal and production research

Préparation et lancement de la production du livre et des accessoires inclus dans le livre (emballage inclus) /Book and accessory preparation and production launch (including packaging)

Préparation et lancement de la production des figurines (production locale et éthique) (emballage inclus)/ Figurines preparation and production launch (locally and ethically produced)​ (including packaging)

Préparation et production/montage du livre audio (emballage inclus)/ Audiobook preparation and production launch (including packaging)

Mise en place des ateliers qui seront offerts dans les classes, les centres, les bibliothèques, etc, et distribution des livres et produits dérivés!/ Workshops in classes/centers/libraries, etc, and shipping! 

 

D'autres façons d'aider/ Other ways to support

Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer, mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  • Un bon mot et vos commentaires sont essentiels !
  • Faire connaître notre projet, notre campagne, et
  • Le partagez avec vos amis, vos contacts et dans vos réseaux respectifs pour que la magie opère ! 

For those of you who cannot make a financial contribution, there are other ways that you can help our cause:

  • Spread the word, talk about our project, our campaign, your imput and commentaries are essential to us!

  • Share with your friends, contacts, spread it through your social network and help make the magic happen!

 

De la part de toute l'équipe, acceptez nos sincères remerciements!

                                                            From all the members of the team, great thanks !

À propos

Je suis Audrey Desrosiers, intervenante en zoothérapie depuis 2008 et je partage mon quotidien avec les enfants qui parfois doivent relever certains défis. J'ai eu l'idée de développer cette histoire comme outil d'intervention alors que le "trop-cool-pré-ado" avec qui je travaillais ne parvenait pas à surmonter ses difficultés et à trouver des solutions avec les outils disponibles. L'histoire a fonctionné! 
 
About 
I'm Audrey Desrosiers, I have been an Animal-Assisted Therapist (AAT) since 2008 and I share my day to day with children who are often confronted with rather particular challenges. I created this story as an intervention tool when dealing with a pre-teen client who's budding rebellious nature was preventing him from successfully using the tools that had been put at his disposal.The story worked!
 
Au cours des deux dernières années, Élias et les doigts magiques a été au coeur de plus d'une centaine d'ateliers que j'ai offerts dans les multiples bibliothèques de Montréal et un peu partout au Québec. Les enfants sont unanimes...ils adorent l'univers d'Élias et se reconnaissent en lui. Leur rétrospection est spectaculaire (ne le sont-ils pas toujours, spectaculaires?)
En plus d'être touchante, drôle, accessible et actuelle, elle est également pédagogique et empreinte de sensibilité. Elle parvient à ouvrir tendrement une porte vers le monde intérieur des enfants.
Throughout the past two years, I have given over a hundred workshops using this story throughout a multitude of libraries in Montreal and all around Quebec. The reaction from children (and in most cases their parents) was unanimous, they adored Elias, and without fault they all fell in love with the tale; they saw something of themselves in him. And their retrospections were spectacular(Aren't they always).
Not only is the story touching, funny, accessible, and current, it is also pedagogical, sensible and manages to gently open a door to the interior universe of children.
 
Approuvée par les professionnels, parents conquis!
Dans le cadre de ma profession, j'ai eu la chance de côtoyer des familles extraordinaires ainsi que des collègues attentionnés qui, dans leur milieu respectif, l'ont mise à l'essai. Les commentaires sont plus que positifs. Le livre, à être publié dans les deux langues (français et anglais), a réellement été apprécié. Élias est donc maintenant prêt à voir le jour officiellement!
 
Approved by Professionals and Parents Alike
Throughout my practice I've had the chance to meet some wonderful people, families of patients and colleagues alike, who all in their respective fields, tried the story and returned to me with extremely positive feedback and results. Elias is now officially ready to be unveiled to the world.
 
Mon parcours
Diplômée du monde des arts et de la musique, j'ai terminé mon cursus scolaire en zoothérapie en 2008. Créative et grandement motivée, je démarre mon entreprise "Au bout du Museau". La zoothérapie n'en était alors qu'à ses balbutiements. Aussi, m'investis-je corps et âme dans le développement, l'expansion et la reconnaissance de celle-ci.
En 2010, forte de mes deux années de succès et d'efforts, je codémarre la clinique Un Museau vaut mille maux. Ma passion brûlante pour les enfants et les défis quotidiens qu'ils rencontrent m'a poussé vers l'enseignement pendant trois ans en plus d'offrir de nombreuses formations et ateliers, de développer leur contenu et bon nombre d'outils d'intervention. Il s'en suit des mois et des années de labeur pour constituer une équipe du tonnerre et parfaire mes connaissances, ajoutant ainsi plusieurs cordes à mon arc. J'ai aussi eu la chance en 2016 de mettre à l'épreuve cette histoire ailleurs dans le monde, confirmant ce que je savais déjà;  ici ou là-bas, les enfants restent les mêmes, leurs besoins, leurs désirs... les yeux brillants!
 
My Career Path
I graduated from the world of Arts and music, and obtained my AAT diploma in 2008.Creative and  highly motivated, I founded Au bout du Museau. At the time, AAT in Canada was still in its infancy, I dedicated every waking moment to the propagation and development of my company.
In 2010, after two years of hard work, I found a business partner and we co-founded Un Museau vaut mille maux. Throughout this period, my passionate interest in children's special needs and their daily challenges led me to teaching for a period of 3 years where after having extensively studied in the field, I perfected and innovated a variety of classes and formations pertaining to special needs education. Following this, I created a star team of employees and coworkers, constantly expanding the clinic and refining my knowledge. In 2016 I had the chance to test run my Elias and the magic fingers story elsewhere in the world, the results were as I had expected, wherever I went, the children were still children, their needs... their desires....and that twinkle in their eyes!
 
Le projet
 Maintenant, "Élias et les doigts magiques" a besoin de votre soutien pour voir le jour!
Je désire que ce magnifique univers, cette histoire, prenne vie dans vos familles et dans vos écoles. Non seulement le livre sera-t-il publié, mais les figurines d'Élias et de la petite fée "pas fine" seront également au rendez-vous!  
Et si vous rêvez avec moi, vos jeunes pourront également s'endormir avec le livre audio. Et pourquoi ne pas viser la publication de cette histoire en diverses langues? Il n'en tient qu'à vous!!!
 
The Project
Now, "Elias and the magic fingers" needs your support so it can see the day!
I want my universe to come alive, I want Elias to spring to life and take up residence in the hearts of your families, of your schools, and not only as litterature; Elias and his little faerie sidekick will also have a physical form!
And if you dream as I do, your children will be able to fall asleep listening to the audio book.And while we're at it, why not have this story translated into multiple languages. The choice is yours!
 
L'équipe, LA rencontre ! 
Plus de deux ans se sont écoulés, à évoluer dans l'univers d'Élias et à attendre LA rencontre professionnelle, la rencontre "nucléaire", qui permettra de donner vie aux traits, à l'imaginaire, à la vision d'Élias, celle qui lui revient... et 2016 me l'a offert! 
Par les mains magiques d'Émilie Huot le rêve devient enfin réalité! Nos deux univers et nos sensibilités artistiques se complètent à merveille. Notre vision de l'enfant et nos valeurs communes ont finalement donné lieu à cette magie tant espérée! Nos rêves sont nombreux, nos créations naturelles et nécessaires. C'est le "match" parfait! 
The Team
I had spent many years searching vainly for that special person who's vision was similar to mine, someone with whom the magic could happen, someone who's imagination could conjure up images to go with the words, and this year, I found her.
It is through the magical hands of Emilie Huot that the dream will spring to life!Our two universes and artistic sensibilities meld seemlessly together as though it were meant to be, our views on children, and our values, everything, like nuclear fission, it is springing to life, naturally, and necessarily, it is truly the perfect match!​
 
Émilie Huot 
Crayons à la main dès son jeune âge, remplissant les marges de ses cahiers d'écoles de dessins, Émilie complète un parcours académique en arts visuels, incluant quelques volets en architecture et design. Une quête afin de rendre une vision du monde, à sa façon.
Fascinée depuis toujours par le monde du vivant, elle explore de multiples médiums. Depuis quelques années après l'arrivée de son fils, Émilie se concentre sur l'art du tatouage qui lui permet de réaliser un rêve; illustrer à temps plein.
Et aujourd'hui le rêve continue !

story:
Hello, as you already know, my name is Manal Faris, I’m thirteen years old and I live in the UK. So that’s the basics. A bit more about me is that I love writing and art-to me, they are both connected. Also, my background is Sri Lanka, a small island below India, I’m part of a family of six and I’m the middle one among my siblings (it’s not as bad as some make out). So, now you know me a little more- I hope.

What this campaign is about

This campaign is all about my book: The boy in the well, the story of Prophet Joseph. It’s the life of our inspirational Prophet Joseph in the style of fiction, the reason I chose to write it like that is because there are so many fact books out there, but while reading them-most of the time-I found myself yawning. For teens like me, the adventure, the lessons and the amazingness of Prophet Joseph’s life was lost. And so I thought, why not capture it in fiction; it’s still moralistic, interesting and full of life changing lessons.

What you will do by helping me

By helping me raise money to publish this book, you will be part of putting a book out in the world that is both fun to read and beneficial. You’ll be assisting a future author (me: grinning as I say this) and you’ll get a copy of ‘The boy in the well’ for yourself!

How much do we need and where will it go?

Well, we are planning to raise £5,000. From that, £3,500 will go to printing 1000 copies of the book, the remaining £1,500 will go towards editing and marketing-I don’t want to write it and no one to read it!

Quote of a printers on printing 1000 copies

Now you know all there is to know. If you believe this is a worthy cause, then go ahead and jump on board the ‘Funding’ train (It’s not funny! I know!). You can share with your friends and family by clicking the share button and telling others about it too.

Thank you for giving up your time and reading this and…

 Goodbye. For now…:) 

What others said about book and the author...

Soft Touched T-shirts

Jersey

story:
Introduction to the Project

Hello Prospective Supporters!

I'm Ashley Kim and I'm a Certified Professional Coach helping moms who feel trapped, stuck, or rage-y find freedom and fulfillment and take advantage of each trip around the sun.

My interest in this work is the result of several years of feeling trapped in my own life and finding out that I wasn't alone. Both major setbacks and conscious choices paved the way for me to rediscover myself and ease into a life that, despite its imperfections, I adore. The women I work with are often just as stuck as I was, exhausted, lacking mental stimulation and time to themselves, wondering where the joy is they assumed was inherent in being a parent, and anxious for the kids to get older and things to get easier.

This book is an opportunity to share a story that’s bubbling within me eager to be released into the world—a story of my experience of powerlessness and strength, despair and faith, losing freedom and finding it again—that can inspire others to set aside notions that motherhood and self-determination are incompatible, ask themselves uncomfortable questions and embrace the answers, and take responsibility for their experience of life even in the face of grief, fear, disapproval, or uncertainty.

In the last few years I've noticed a gap in our recognition of motherhood as an opportunity for and driver of transformational growth. Parenting is often billed as challenging yet rewarding, but its nuances and possibilities and potential to affect change far exceed the complaints and feigned and genuine joy typically associated with it. For me, the goal of growth is freedom, and my definition of freedom encompasses joy, fun, fulfillment, service, and peace—things that are not, as it turns out, mutually exclusive with motherhood and instead, amplify parenting and life.

My intention in addressing this gap is to inspire readers to recognize they can make their lives as free as they dream of them being and take action to do so. I won’t offer a step-by-step plan or imply the reader should do things my way, however. Just as in coaching, my aim is to form a relationship, a partnership, in which the reader, like the client, is able to develop a unique vision for bettering her life, the confidence to know she can do it, and the certainty that we all deserve to thrive as we cruise around on our limited number of trips around the sun.

What Your Contribution Will Do & What You'll Get For It

Your investment will cover:

  • Editing and proofreading
  • Copywriting
  • Graphic design
  • Interior layout and design
  • Social media advertising
  • Author’s advance

If financial backing amounts to less than the $10,000 goal, the first four items on the list will receive priority funding.

Ebooks and softcover versions of Uncaged: Finding Freedom in the Midst of Mothering, as well as my eternal gratitude, are all available to you for your investment. Those who contribute $35 or more will receive all three! Also, there’s the perk of knowing you’re helping put an engaging, compelling, and needed work out into the world.

What’s the Risk to You in Contributing?

Several years ago I gave $75 to a crowdfunding campaign and I’ve yet to receive the goodies that were promised as part of my donation, and the project itself hasn’t been completed either. I understand what it’s like to invest in someone/something and be let down. Rest assured, your contribution will go to a quality project that actually gets finished and is made available to the public.

There will be setbacks along the way, days I don’t want to write or times when I do but it’s a struggle to put anything meaningful onto the screen. This is to be expected when it comes to writing and will be overcome through my own personal bag of tricks (hiking!, dancing!, journaling!, being patient with myself!, getting coached!, etc.) The drive to create and deliver, however, will remain steady and my passion won’t fade. And if by some chance it does (I’m only human after all) you and my commitment to you will push me forward. I’m also a mom, and if having kids has taught me anything it’s that I can do the relentless.

Support for Uncaged & Ashley's Work

"I've always been a big fan of Ashley's writing and have believed that's how she is going to become a household name. Martha Beck should start pulling up a chair or schooching over on the couch." -Natasha Ganem

"I can't wait to read it!" -Miranda Wolfe

"I am not the same person as I was before I started working with Ashley. She has guided my awareness to what really matters in my life and helped me find the strength to make some tough decisions. I feel more clear, capable, and confident than I have in a long time." -Coaching Client

Not Ready or Able to Contribute?

Use the Indiegogo share tools and invite others, especially any moms of young kids in your life, to check out this campaign!

Thank you for your support!

The women I work with are often just as stuck as I was, exhausted, lacking mental stimulation and time to themselves, wondering where the joy is they assumed was inherent in being a parent, and anxious for the kids to get older and things to get easier.This book is an opportunity to share a story that’s bubbling within me eager to be released into the world—a story of my experience of powerlessness and strength, despair and faith, losing freedom and finding it again—that can inspire others to set aside notions that motherhood and self-determination are incompatible, ask themselves uncomfortable questions and embrace the answers, and take responsibility for their experience of life even in the face of grief, fear, disapproval, or uncertainty.In the last few years I've noticed a gap in our recognition of motherhood as an opportunity for and driver of transformational growth. Parenting is often billed as challenging yet rewarding, but its nuances and possibilities and potential to affect change far exceed the complaints and feigned and genuine joy typically associated with it. For me, the goal of growth is freedom, and my definition of freedom encompasses joy, fun, fulfillment, service, and peace—things that are not, as it turns out, mutually exclusive with motherhood and instead, amplify parenting and life.My intention in addressing this gap is to inspire readers to recognize they can make their lives as free as they dream of them being and take action to do so. I won’t offer a step-by-step plan or imply the reader should do things my way, however. Just as in coaching, my aim is to form a relationship, a partnership, in which the reader, like the client, is able to develop a unique vision for bettering her life, the confidence to know she can do it, and the certainty that we all deserve to thrive as we cruise around on our limited number of trips around the sun.What Your Contribution Will Do & What You'll Get For ItYour investment will cover:
Editing and proofreading
Copywriting
Graphic design
Interior layout and design
Social media advertising
Author’s advance
If financial backing amounts to less than the $10,000 goal, the first four items on the list will receive priority funding.Ebooks and softcover versions of Uncaged: Finding Freedom in the Midst of Mothering, as well as my eternal gratitude, are all available to you for your investment. Those who contribute $35 or more will receive all three! Also, there’s the perk of knowing you’re helping put an engaging, compelling, and needed work out into the world.What’s the Risk to You in Contributing?Several years ago I gave $75 to a crowdfunding campaign and I’ve yet to receive the goodies that were promised as part of my donation, and the project itself hasn’t been completed either. I understand what it’s like to invest in someone/something and be let down. Rest assured, your contribution will go to a quality project that actually gets finished and is made available to the public.There will be setbacks along the way, days I don’t want to write or times when I do but it’s a struggle to put anything meaningful onto the screen. This is to be expected when it comes to writing and will be overcome through my own personal bag of tricks (hiking!, dancing!, journaling!, being patient with myself!, getting coached!, etc.) The drive to create and deliver, however, will remain steady and my passion won’t fade. And if by some chance it does (I’m only human after all) you and my commitment to you will push me forward. I’m also a mom, and if having kids has taught me anything it’s that I can do the relentless.Support for Uncaged & Ashley's Work"I've always been a big fan of Ashley's writing and have believed that's how she is going to become a household name. Martha Beck should start pulling up a chair or schooching over on the couch." -Natasha Ganem"I can't wait to read it!" -Miranda Wolfe"I am not the same person as I was before I started working with Ashley. She has guided my awareness to what really matters in my life and helped me find the strength to make some tough decisions. I feel more clear, capable, and confident than I have in a long time." -Coaching ClientNot Ready or Able to Contribute?Use the Indiegogo share tools and invite others, especially any moms of young kids in your life, to check out this campaign!Thank you for your support!

story:
THE STORY BEHIND THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK

Telling the real story of New York — offering an account that’s more inclusive, accurate and accessible than what you usually find in travel guides or academic cultural studies — has never been more important than it is today.  The United States is the world’s largest economy, ahead of China, Germany, Japan, the UK, and France; and New York is the biggest driving force within America’s economic picture. In fact, not only is New York the largest economy in America, it’s the world’s most economically powerful city.  New York is also deeply influential in the arts and entertainment industries, as well as other industries that help shape and define culture.  Finally, in a world where tolerance and multiculturalism has recently come under serious threat, New York remains as a beacon for the broad scope of the human experience.  So it's no wonder then that millions of people gravitate to New York every year.

But New York is a very complex city.  While it is certainly a place full opportunity and excitement, it is also a place that can be quite unforgiving, especially to those who are unfamiliar to its unique flow and general character.  This is why before you move to New York, you should know what you’re really getting into.  And if you’re already living in New York, but haven’t quite figured things out yet or would like to expand your understanding of this town, then there are a number of things you need to know if you plan on extending your stay or if you simply want to get more out of the time that you still have left here.

Typical travel guides won’t really help you in this regard, as they tend to focus primarily on “what to do” lists, chasing down a fun time and that sort of thing. Instead, people who are interested in living or spending time in New York need something deeper, a guide that explores the real New York in no uncertain terms. Enter The Truth About New York.  

The Truth About New York aims to enlighten those who haven’t been to New York, just as much as it seeks to enhance the understanding of real New York for those who are already here.  And because the vacation-get-away New York will always be a fantastic endeavor, The Truth About New York also serves as a powerful supplement to travel guides for those who just want to visit New York as well as those who like to come to New York periodically.

 

WHAT MAKES THIS BOOK SO AMAZING?

A few things: 

IF YOU LOVE NEW YORK:

  • YOU’RE GONNA LOVE NEW YORK EVEN MORE.  If you ever wondered what makes New York tick, why there’s an endless number of cultural institutions and venues, how there’s more than 800 languages spoken here and why we all still understand each other, why you can come to New York with nothing and still make something big, you will thoroughly understand everything once you read The Truth About New York.

IF YOU HATE NEW YORK:

  • YOU WON'T HATE NEW YORK ANYMORE. Honest!  But you might be more terrified of New York than ever before.  Or you may be inspired, more than ever before, to pick up everything you own — a vicious wit and charm, two cats, a Honda scooter, an art history degree, an old iPod, a silver spoon — and move to New York immediately.

IF YOU WANT ALL THE BIG QUESTIONS ABOUT NEW YORK FINALLY ANSWERED:

ALL OF YOUR BIG QUESTIONS WILL FINALLY BE ANSWERED, like:

  • “What’s the deal with New Yorkers?” (We think we’re the best… Read the book!)
  • “Where can I find a nice, spacious, affordable apartment in New York?” (There’s no such thing in New York… Read the book!)
  • “What is the dating scene like in New York?” (Consider yourself warned… Read the book!)
  • “How do New Yorkers have so much free time to do so much?” (Nobody has free time in this town… Read the book!)
  • “Is Brooklyn really the way it’s portrayed in the television show 'Girls'? (No! But in North Brooklyn, it’s, well, complicated… Read the book.)
  • “Was pizza really invented in New York?”(Sure seems that way… Read the book!)
  • “Was the movie Fame really based on an actual high school in New York?”(O.K., so maybe you didn’t want to know the answer to that question, but isn’t it cool to know that a high school in New York spawned a movie AND a television spin off?)

IF YOU LOVE TO LEARN ABOUT THINGS AS THEY REALLY ARE:

  • YOU’RE GOING TO LOVE THE NATURE OF THIS BOOK.  New York is open and liberal by nature, but this narrative contains many twists and turns.  The Truth About New York includes hard truths about socio-economics, work, race, ethnicity, housing, gender, the arts, friendship, dating, sex, the New York mentality, and more.  No topic is taboo, no punches are held, and everything is covered straight up, no chaser.  And The Truth About New York is far more inclusive and culturally informative than any other book you’ll ever read about life in contemporary New York.

IF YOU LIKE GOOD WRITING:

THIS BOOK IS EXTRA EXCELLENT LITERATURE.  Honest!  It will challenge you.  It will make you laugh.  It will make you cry.  It will make you think.  It will shatter your notions of New York.  It will bolster your notions of New York.  It will enlighten you.  It will entertain you (my accountant even says so).  It will equip you with the sort of knowledge and banter material that will make you the star attraction at any rooftop party, cocktail party, backyard party, post-symposium meet-and-greet, or dive-bar date.  And it’s all very accessible, no tricky dance moves required.

 

TABLE OF CONTENTS

PREFACE

INTRODUCTION

PART 1: THE LAY OF THE LAND

1 THE BASICS

Demographic Snapshot, Economy, Work, Health, Safety, and Weather 

2 NEW YORK, DAY-TO-DAY

The New York Grind, Housing, Transportation, Consumer Habits, Language, and General Customs

PART 2: NEW YORK SOCIETY

3 THE SOCIAL & PSYCHOLOGICAL BACKDROP OF NEW YORK, PART 1

The American Education System and Education in New York, Money & Status, Religion, Political Views, Law, and Police

4 THE SOCIAL & PSYCHOLOGICAL BACKDROP OF NEW YORK, PART 2

Race, Ethnicity, Class, and Privilege

5 THE PARADOX OF NEW YORK’S DIVERSITY & MULTICULTURALISM

The Big Non-Melting Pot and New York’s Most Valuable Asset

6 THE NEW YORK MENTALITY

The Mind Frame You Need, The Recent Roots of the New York Mentality and the American Way, and the Main Ingredients of the New York Mentality

PART 3: CULTURE

7 ARTS AND CULTURE IN NEW YORK

8 NIGHTLIFE

9 STYLE AND FASHION

10 FOOD & DRINKING

PART 4: SOCIAL RELATIONSHIPS

11 FRIENDSHIP IN NEW YORK

12 DATING IN NEW YORK

13 SEX IN NEW YORK

PART 5: INTERVIEWS

14 INTERVIEWS

AFTERWORD

APPENDIX

ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS

455 pages, trim size: 6x9

 

WHAT'S THE MONEY GOING TOWARDS? 

PRODUCTION, PRINTNG, MARKETING, PODCAST AND FILM.

The Truth About New York was published by my company, Superchamp Books, and made available in limited quantities almost a year ago.  I made this move as a business decision to break deeper into a publishing market that now makes it more possible for independent publishers to compete.  

I was astonished when I learned that the Village Voice had selected The Truth About New York as one of its 2016 “Village Voice Gift Guide” books and dubbed it “the ultimate guide to New York City;” and I was equally grateful when Emily J. Smith (Salon) reviewed The Truth About New York and called it a “must read” that is “remarkably useful and deeply relatable.” 

From the start, the objective was to take The Truth About New York mainstream and make it a household name.  Given the recent buzz, I’m now poised to make this objective a reality.  But in order to do this as an independent publisher, I need to raise the level of money that will help grow the buzz that has just begun. This means re-publishing (expansion of production and printing), implementing sustainable marketing, and creating multi-lingual versions of the book.

If we reach our goal for the book, I'll be able to publish and print new hardcover and paperback versions of the book, develop Spanish, French and German language versions, and produce a new eBook version in English, Spanish, French and German.  In addition,  money will be used to retain a publicist and take full advantage of Penguin Random House’s Publishers Services program.

Finally, I will be able to launch and produce the first 12 episodes of “The Truth About New York” podcast; and I will be able to produce and direct The Truth About New York  film.  Thus, money will go to pay for editors, additional contributors, translators, designers, formatting, printing, shipping, a show producer, host and co-host, podcast editor, writer, fact checker, engineer, director of photography, sound person, and studio rental fees.

ABOUT “THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK” PODCAST

“The Truth About New York” podcast is the second dimension of this project.  With writing leadership and structural guidance from writer Darley Stewart, and media advice and guidance from Jamie Claar, Acquisitions Editor, Superchamp Books, we will launch “The Truth About New York” podcast.  This hour-long, weekly podcast will be based around the structure of the book and it will expand on many of the topical areas covered in the book, like culture, race, art, dating, sex, nightlife, gender, politics, and more. 

Each episode of "The Truth About New York," which will be co-written by campaign team member Darley Stewart, will feature at least one New Yorker of note as well as one everyday New Yorker.  Also, I plan to invite as many people as I can that I interviewed during my research for the book to come on the show to expand upon the topics and issues raised in the book.  

ABOUT “THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK” FILM

The Truth About New York documentary film is the third dimension of this project. To be directed by Amir Ali Said and me, this documentary will draw from the book, touching on many of the topical areas covered, like culture, race, art, dating, sex, nightlife, gender, politics, etc., and it will offer the sort of visual narrative that only a film can provide.

The film will feature interviews and commentary from New Yorkers of note, including members of New York arts institutions and organizations and leading industries, as well as a variety of everyday New Yorkers and a number of the people that I interviewed during my research for the book.  

 

WHAT IS INDIEGOGO AND HOW DOES IT WORK?

Indiegogo is a conduit for creatives to bridge the gap between imagination and implementation. The platform gives artists, innovators, and entrepreneurs like me the opportunity to reach audiences directly for funding creative projects.

 

THE ADDED VALUE OF THIS PROJECT

Although The Truth About New York offers a close-up look at New York, fundamentally it delivers a stirring account of the human condition in the world's most complex and powerful city.  Many lessons learned in this book can be applied to any major city in the world.

 

WHY CROWDFUNDING (INDIEGOGO)?

I want this project to contribute to the changing dynamic of publishing, and to demonstrate how anyone with a great idea, regardless of socio-economic background, race, or gender, can produce it and bring it to market.  There are no more gatekeepers.  Anyone who wants to write, create or design can.  Now more than ever, creators need the support of their fans and people who value the arts to successfully create and ship great work.  That's why I'm using Indiegogo: because it allows me to go directly to you and humbly ask for your support.  I hope that the success of my project serves as inspiration for others.

 

ABOUT THE AUTHOR 

Hello, I’m Amir Said.  My family, friends, and colleagues call me Said.  I’m a writer, musician, and the founder of Superchamp Books, an independent publishing company based in New York. I’ve written and published multiple books on a variety of important cultural topics, including The Art of Sampling (copyright law & music sampling), Ghetto Brother (Benjy Melendez's memoir & NYC street gang culture of the 1970s), and The BeatTips Manual (the art of beatmaking & comparative analysis to the Western classical music tradition). 

I'm also the founder and editor-in-chief of BeatTips, the world's most renowned publication for the study of the art of beatmaking, and the founding art director for the Get Off Your Robot music, dance, art, and technology festival (Vienna, Austria).  My writing has appeared in a number of different publications, including About.com, Scratch Magazine, HipHopDX, and The Find Magazine.  I’m currently editing Getting Back My Voice, a memoir by American author Mariah Schwartz, due to be published in the fall of 2017.

 

ABOUT LEAD TEAM MEMBER & PODCAST WRITER DARLEY STEWART

Darley Stewart is a Scottish-Korean fiction writer based in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn. Her work has appeared in Tin House, Funhouse Magazine, The Ocean State Review, Flapperhouse, The Brooklyn Rail, Battersea Review, Electric Literature, and elsewhere. Stewart is the recipient of a 2016 Fiction International Fellowship from Seoul Art Space and 2015 Ocean State Fiction Scholarship from The University of Rhode Island. An alumnus of Brandeis University and The University of Edinburgh, she interviews Brooklyn authors for Park Slope Reader, LitScene and on a freelance basis. She gives regular readings in Brooklyn, most recently Manhattanville Reading Series at Unnameable Books.

 

A CALL TO ACTION

The quickest and easiest way to help us right now is to support us with your generous contribution! We also welcome help in many other ways as well.  If you’re a philanthropist (or know someone who is) who would like to make a more substantial contribution, please contact us.  If you have any helpful ideas to that will bring us to our goal, please contact us.  Last, but not least, please get the word out and help make some noise about this campaign!  Use the Indieggo share tools and share this campaign with your family and friends and within your social networks.

 

Thank you,

Said and Darley

story:
The Home School

I love my life as a single mom and teacher, but finding time to focus on poetry has been challenging.  When I noticed that the dates of The (wonderful) Ashbery Home School lined up with my winter break from my teaching job, and when I found childcare, I decided to apply.  I have a second book of poems started, but tabled it after a burglary last winter meant losing the most recent draft.  The week at The Home School would be a chance to re-immerse myself in that text and reconnect with myself as a poet.  Some of my favorite writers (Maggie Nelson!  Jorie Graham!) will be teachers.  Plus, I will have one week off from my busy New York life to focus exclusively on my writing for the first time in years.  

  • Any donations made will go toward my travel  to Miami, lodging and/or The Home School tuition.
  • Donors will have an option of receiving a copy of my first book, LOOKING FOR SMALL ANIMALS (please indicate if you'd like a copy with your address.) 
  • I humbly ask for any help you might be able to offer.  My poetry and my soul would be most grateful.  


Other Ways You Can Help


If you can't contribute, no problem!  You can also help by spreading the word.

story:
I created a company to publish a book which I thought was an incredible story that needed to be told. Twenty-Seconds, A True Account of Survival and Hope is the true story of an ordinary man who traveled an extraordinary journey from a terminal diagnosis, through a near death experience, a run through Hospice and, ultimately, survival.  There is a shocking side to this story which has fueled the desire to increase awareness of a disease that has evolved while we weren't looking, which sparked the creation of the Give a Buck campaign.

There are statistics that most people don't know about.  Did you know that 25% of people with HIV don't even know they have it? Stigma and fear kill. We believe getting tested is crucial.  Did you know 60% of HIV infections in some locations are in females between the ages of 16-24? Think about that for a moment - those are our daughters and future mothers to our next generation. The fastest growing population being infected are heterosexual, single females.  Did you know that 70% of those infected are not on the treatment to lower the viral load in their body which will reduce, if not disable, the risk of spreading the disease? We can do better. This disease can be stopped!  We have a choice. This isn't just a "gay disease" - it's a human disease. This campaign is an appeal to help make a difference, one dollar at a time. The change in your couch cushion. Isn't it time? 

The company will donate $1 for every book sold to the Give A Buck campaign. Please join us in this mission. All monies raised will be used to support and advocate HIV awareness, including testing and treatment. Please match our $1 pledge yourself.  Feel good about a collective standing up and making a difference. 

Give a Buck.  Follow our journey and please share with your friends!  https://www.facebook.com/Givesabuck

UPDATE: New CDC statistics just released say the 25% of people with HIV that don't know they have it has risen to 60% in the U.S.!!!  SIXTY PERCENT of people with HIV don't know they have it!  The spread of this disease will increase exponentially.  We have to promote testing!!!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Maurice Bassett, a U.S.-based publisher of mind / body / spirit titles and also a lover of classic children's stories.  I released a beautiful, fully illustrated edition of Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol two years ago and this year I am releasing a lovely new edition of Margery Williams' The Velveteen Rabbit, with sixteen color illustrations by Maria Berg.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding for this project will help to cover the cost of the sixteen watercolor illustrations by Maria Berg ( http://www.maria-berg-art.de/ ). I'm offering the ebook version of the book as a perk and you will get download links for both the Kindle ebook and the PDF ebook. (You can also choose to receive the 8 x 10 inch paperback edition or a box of 12 copies of the paperback to share with friends or give as holiday gifts.)

The Impact

Your contribution helps to make this project possible, thank you! And if you find that you absolutely love The Velveteen Rabbit in ebook format you will also be able to purchase the paperback edition on Amazon by December 1st.

Risks & Challenges

I have committed fully to this project and have hired Maria Berg to create the illustrations and she will be delivering them to me the first week in November.  It's all systems go, green lights all the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for sharing this project on Facebook and other social media platforms! love, Maurice

story:
What We Need & What You Get

15% of the proceeds of book perks will be donated to Milenio.org, a Latinx advocacy organization that promotes the importance of political engagement within the Latinx community. The remainder of the goal funding will go towards producing the books and perks, and sustaining the Project through new gear, transport and outreach costs. The goal of$3000 will allow us to print and ship around 150 books, including 10 complimentary copies to local nonprofit organizations. Even if we don't hit our goal, we plan to donate 15% of the book proceeds and print as many books as we can.

Through partnership with local activists, we are able to offer one-of-a-kind perks, including protest signs actually used in historic marches like the Women's March on Portland and the March for Science PDX. Each book backed through Indiegogo will be signed by the author and hand-wrapped with care in the text of inspirational speeches, quotes and tweets. We can also offer limited edition postcards and posters as perks for you, our first supporters.
 

The Impact

The history of the Pacific Northwest is punctuated by larger-than-life figures who fought for what they believed in, and today is no exception. The Northwest Resistance Photography Project stands with the organizers, pulling all-nighters filling Twitter feeds with calls to action. We stand with the leaders, who can imagine a better world and know how to get us there. We stand with you, when you stand for what you believe in.

This book will show the region and the world how diverse and strong our progressive movements are, and highlight our local leaders whose voices lift and unite us, even in our darkest moments.

Risks & Challenges

We have designed this book project to scale, so even if we fall short of our goal, we will still be able to produce the books ordered. Our research indicates there is demand for this book, and that it's unique in this market. Partnering with Milenio.org allows us to maximize our audience and find potential new backers, minimizing risk that the project may not reach its goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this project with a friend (or your mom!)

The photos in this book show a huge range of people taking action in their own back yard. It's our hope that when readers see people like themselves and how easy it is to take action, they will want to get involved.

  • Join our mailing list.

Hear first about the book launch party and other Northwest Resistance Photography Project news.

  • Share this project in your social channels.

Show your support for citizen activism in your city by encouraging your friends to back this project.

story:
I have a BS in Behavioral Science and English. I was lucky enough to have the privilege of teaching children on the Autism Spectrum while I was pregnant with my first child. I attribute how high functioning my son became to implementing the Applied Behavioral Analysis skills we learned together while he was in utero.  

We lived in a state with limited medical care, and one pediatric pulmonology practice. After my son had "end-stage signs" of pneumonia and was hospitalized at 18 months, he became a patient there. He was diagnosed with asthma, and put on a daily maintenance medication. We would later read in his medical records that the doctor noted its benefit to his adenoids, which he had removed before ever meeting the pulmonologist (knowledge of this was previously noted, but apparently forgotten). From age 2-5 my son met the criteria for High Functioning Autism, which wouldn't be properly diagnosed until he received neurological treatment from another state. He developed an allergic reaction to this medication, and became a different boy over night when it stopped. A pharmaceutical genetics doctor later coined what happened as "Transient Autism". When he had his first "happy day", his smile quickly turned to shame, as he was cognoscente of the aggression he'd displayed over the years. I immediately refused to let my little boy feel guilt for something he'd had no control over. I promptly promised him that I would turn his story into something he could be proud of, his own book. His smile returned, and I started writing...

Over 45,000 words later, and approaching my son's 6th birthday, there are only a few chapters left before I'm ready to spread his message. Contributions will help move his story to completion by the New Year. My son stopped his medication January 2, 2017 and on the anniversary of this date, I hope to have kept my promise to him. He smiles now, but he didn't always. If he knew that his struggle meaningfully inspired others, then I believe any shame he once felt would dissipate into pride.

What We Need & What You Get

We have moved our children across the country. Here my son can have better access to medical care and a shorter viral season in order to avoid long term courses of low dose antibiotics. The move significantly reduced our savings. We need about $3,000 to help offset our costs over the course of three months. This will be enough time to complete my son's story and develop his book.

 

Contributors will receive a free electronic copy of the book. They will also receive an invitation to join a support network that will be created, where our son's reader's can receive ongoing updates and share their thoughts and experiences with him.  

 

If our goal isn't reached, we will still finish writing, but may not be finished by the target date. Any additional funding received goes towards our son's newfound experiences in a world that he finally feels a part of. These will also be shared on his support network. With his anxiety gone, he is constantly trying to make up for lost time, because he says, "if you believe in anything, you can do anything".

 

The Impact

We plan donate $5 for every 50 book purchases to Autism research, because we know that those who are still wandering are not lost.

researchautism.org

 

    Risks & Challenges

    Although I have never published a book, both of my parents have. My father had written over one hundred professionally published books by the time he died. I will be consulting with my mother, who also has published work and additional contacts to ensure successful publication. I have an MS in logistics, and plan to focus initially on electronic distribution.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      The goal of our project is to spread our son's story. If you're passionate, but unable to contribute, please help us tell the world that not all who wander are lost. Let our son's story lead by example and start making contributions to Autism research, so that more families can experience their children's happy days.

story:
En busca de poetas es una iniciativa que busca reivindicar y enaltecer la poesía latinoamericana contemporánea, a través de un viaje de veintiséis mil (26.000) kilómetros desde Ushuaia, Argentina, hasta Caracas, Venezuela, pasando por pueblos y ciudades escogidas de Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, Bolivia, Perú, Ecuador, Colombia y Venezuela, con el objetivo de descubrir poetas inéditos y editados, documentarlos y publicar una serie de antologías de poesía latinoamericana, realizando un aporte concreto y significativo a la literatura contemporánea.

 

In Search of Poets is a project that looks to restore and honor contemporary Latin American poetry. It entails a 16,250-mile journey from Ushuaia, Argentina all the way to Caracas, Venezuela, with stops in selected towns and cities of Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, Bolivia, Peru, Ecuador, Colombia and Venezuela. The goal is to discover unpublished and published poets, record them and publish a series of contemporary Latin American anthologies, thus fulfilling a specific and meaningful contribution to contemporary literature.

 

Ushuaia, Tierra del fuego, Argentina

 

La antología

Después de 4 años y medio de viaje, el Proyecto iniciará su serie de publicaciones por países y regiones de Latinoamérica. Nuestra primera antología: “Breve tratado del viento Sur - Antología poética de la Patagonia argentina”, reúne la voz de más de ochenta (80) poetas inéditos y publicados.

La poesía de la Patagonia argentina está llena de aullidos del viento, grandes extensiones, estepas y horizontes abiertos. Es una poesía introspectiva marcada por un fuerte sentimiento de soledad, lejanía y aislamiento, con temáticas sociales como la pobreza y el hambre.

Esta antología es la materialización de la búsqueda que se viene desarrollando. Reúne la poética de una región y muestra el trabajo de poetas que merecen ser conocidos y leídos más allá de sus fronteras. Hablan de un tiempo y un lugar que merecen ser guardados en nuestra memoria.

 

The Anthology

After the four and a half year trip, the project will begin its series of publications classifying each according to the country and region in Latin America.  The first one, “Short Treatise of the South Wind – Poetic Anthology of the Argentinian Patagonia”, collects the work of more than eighty (80) published and unpublished poets.

Argentinian Patagonian poetry brims with the howling of the wind, the images of widespread areas and open horizons. It´s an introspective poetry marked by a strong sense of loneliness, remoteness, and isolation, treating social themes such as poverty and hunger.

This anthology shows the completion of the search being developed.  It brings together the poetry of a region and shows the works of poets that deserve to be known and read beyond their borders. They speak of a given time and place that deserve to be stored in our memory.

 

Nicolás Romano y Eduardo Bechara, Ushuaia, Tierra del fuego, Argentina

 

Estrecho de Magallanes / Strait of Magellan

 

LA CIUDAD SIEMPRE LA CIUDAD

 

Los pájaros vuelan otra vez sobre la ciudad helada

los meses y las semanas pasan veloces y crueles.

Ni los viejos resplandores asoman ya.

¿Hubo gloria antes de la decadencia?

¿Las aguas son las mismas aguas?

Aquí todos los santos días se escribe una gran historia

de miseria y vodevil.

 

 

THE CITY ALWAYS THE CITY

 

The birds fly again over the frozen city

months and weeks go by fast and cruel.

Not even the old shinings glow now.

Was there any glory before decadence?

Are the waters the same waters?

Here all the holly days a great story of misery and vaudeville

is writen.

 

ANAHÍ LAZZARONI

 

Anahí Lazzaroni en su casa / at her home / Ushuaia, Tierra del fuego

 

Los autores

Los más de ochenta (80) poetas incluidos son de diversas edades. Cada uno tiene sus temas afines de acuerdo a sus propias vivencias. Están conscientes de su entorno, de las injusticias que ocurren y de las situaciones que podrían ser mejores. Como lo dijo Eduardo Bechara: “El poeta acepta el desafío de vencer/ la injusticia con belleza,/ de encontrar lo que duele/ y mirarlo de frente,/ o lo que a veces no termina/ de entender”.

 

Maritza Kuzanovic en su oficina / in her office / Rio Gallegos, Santa Cruz, Patagonia

 

The authors

The eighty (80) or more poets vary in age.  Each one has his/her own theme depending on his/her own experience. They are aware of their environment, the injustices that take place, and the situations that could be better. As Eduardo Bechara said: “The poet accepts the challenge to defeat/ injustice with beauty, / to find what hurts/ and look at it in its eyes/ or what some times can´t be fully/ understood.

 

Con / with Julio "Mochi" Leite, Alejandro Pinto & Fredy Gallardo, Río Grande, Tierra del fuego

 

La editorial

Escarabajo editorial fue fundada en Colombia en el año 2006 con el objetivo de promover y publicar nuevos talentos literarios. Ha apoyado el proyecto “En busca de poetas” desde sus inicios, como una forma de generar cultura literaria, enaltecer y generar su aporte a la poesía.

 

Publisher

Escarabajo Publishing House was founded in Colombia in 2006 with the goal of promoting and publishing new literary talents. It has backed up the project In Search of Poets since the beginning, as a way to generate a literary culture, honor, and make its contribution to poetry.

 

Ultimos títulos publicados / Last published titles:

"Ayer terminará mañana", Santiago José Sepúlveda Montenegro, septiembre 2013

"Pensión de animales", Pablo Silva Olazabal, agosto 2013

"El azar y la pérdida / Le Hasard et la Perte" (Edición bilingue / bilingual edition), Stéphane Chaumet, mayo 2013

"Dejemos hablar al viento", Nicolás Dávila, poesía, marzo 2013

"Las maravillas de Alicia", Eduardo Bechara Navratilova, febrero 2013

 

Ver libros en / see books in: http://escarabajoeditorial.com

 

¿Por qué necesitamos de la campaña?

Para iniciar el ciclo de publicaciones e imprimir mil (1000) copias de la antología, necesitamos recaudar DIECIOCHO MILLONES DE PESOS ($18´000.000.oo) M/CTE., aproximadamente SEIS MIL QUINIENTOS DÓLARES (US$6.500), para cubrir los costos de impresión y gastos relacionados de un libro de quinientas (500) páginas. Hay que recordar que Indiegogo toma un cinco por ciento (5%) de lo recaudado.

 

Why crowdfunding is needed?

To start the publishing cycle and print the one thousand (1000) copies of the anthology, around EIGHTEEN MILLION PESOS ($18,000,000.00), approximately SIX THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED DOLLARS ($6,500.00), are needed to cover printing costs and other related costs of a 500-page book. We must remember that Indiegogo charges a five percent (5%) fee on contributions.

 

Con / With / Liliana Ancalao in Comodoro Rivadavia, Chubut, Patagonia

 

Camila Vallendor / poeta inédita / non published poet / Ushuaia, Tierra del fuego

 

Impacto

¿Por qué es importante el proyecto? ¿Qué lo hace único?

La poesía latinoamericana está viva, cambia, se renueva constantemente. Es importante documentar sus cambios, darle espacio a las nuevas voces y escribir la historia de todos como continente. La poesía debe dar cuenta de las circunstancias actuales, debe dialogar con nosotros y con lo que sentimos de forma directa. Al reunir todas estas voces se cuenta la historia de la región.

Esta primera antología materializa lo que nos propusimos desde un principio: fomentar la lectura de la poesía latinoamericana contemporánea, unificar al continente en torno a ella, y hacer visibles a poetas que deben ser tenidos en cuenta y reconocidos.

 

Impact

Why is this project important? What makes it unique?

Latin American poetry is alive, it changes and is renewed constantly. It´s important to record its changes, make space to new voices, and write our history as a continent.  Poetry must shed light on current circumstances, chat directly with us and our feelings. The gathering of all these voices tells the history of the region.

This first anthology is the culmination of what had been planned from the beginning: promote the reading of Latin American contemporary poetry, unite the continent around it, and make poets, who should be noticed and recognized, visible.

 

Graciela Cros en su casa / at her home / Bariloche, Río Negro Tierra del fuego

 

Otras formas de ayudar

Si te resulta difícil ayudarnos con una contribución económica, existen otras formas de ayudar. Comparte esta campaña con las personas interesadas en la poesía y en proyectos como este. Entre más personas lo conozcan, más estarás ayudando. Gracias por apoyar la poesía latinoamericana.

 

Other ways of helping

If it´s difficult for you to help us with a financial contribution, there are other ways of helping. Share this campaign with people who are interested in poetry and projects like this one. The more people know about it, the more you help. Thank you so much for supporting Latin American poetry.

 

Lago argentino / Argentinian Lake / Chaltén, Calafate, Patagonia

 

Medios en los que ha salido el proyecto / Media where project has been advertised:

 

Entrevistas / Interviews / TV & Internet

AkaBOOM, “Entrevista a Eduardo Bechara”, Asunción, Paraguay, mayo 2017:
